1b1: rgya gar snang byin ma k+Sha su / bod skad du/ 'dul ba phran tshigs kyi gzhi/ bam po dang po/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// phran chags
1b2: cigazhi'i sdom pog tshon pa chos gos dang / / shing tshad dang ni gnas brtan lus// rgyus pa 'gyod pa dbyung ba nyid// phran tshegs gzhir ni yang dag bshad//
1b3: bsdus pa'i sngam ni/ so pa ga sen mo bcos pa dang // lhung bzed yan lag me long skyes// lam phran chu rags mo mo sran sde'u// rkang pakru dngogos mdung ngo // sdom na/
1b4: so pag dang ni sa gaur dang / nya phyis dri yi lag ris dang // ka ba dang ni srung pa gnyis// lag rgyan dang ni sor gdub tu// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na
1b5: rdzing gi 'gram kha nga brtsegs pa na bzhugs so/ / drag sde rnams su sham thams dang chos gos bgos dang lhung bzed thogs te/ yangs pa can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /
1b6: yangs pa can gyi bar dang / khang pa brtsegs pa'i bar gya bir skabs den yangs pa can gyi ling tsha byi rnams kyi bskyed mos tshul me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / chu phun sum
1b7: tshogs pa/ bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa dga' ba'i tshal dang 'dra ba de dag na de dag gi brtse ba dang / gar dang glu dang / rol po'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs ngag dang / khrus kyi yo byad
1b8: sna tshogs dag kyang bzhag pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' ba nye dga' bo/ yangs pa can gyi ling tsha byi 'di dag dang / bskyed mos tshal gyi dga' ba ni

2a1: bcom ldan 'das kyis sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi dpeng mdzad na/ re shig de dag gi bskyed mos tshal ci 'dra ba blta'o zhes de rnams glong nas de dag gi bskyed mos tshal du bzhugs so// de dag gis de na brtsal ba'i yo byad mnga' bo che dang drang ba dang
2a2: 'phang rdo sna tshogs dang / gar dang glu dang / rol mo'i sgra'i cha byad sna tshogs dang / bi rang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / khar rnga dang / skad snyan la sogs pa sna tshogs dang / khrus kyi yo byad sau phag dang / bkru ba'i phye ma dang / mgo bkru ba skyu rur sna tshogs mthong ba dang / de rnams
2a3: kyis phan tshun smras pa/ dga' nye dga' ba yo byad phun sum tshogs pa rnam pa du ma 'di dag yod na/ ci re shig brtsal ba bya 'am/ 'on te gar bya 'am/ glu blang ngam/ rol mo'i sgra bya'am/ khrus bya/ kha cig gis smras pa/ bdag cig bkrus nas ring zhig lon gyis
2a4: de khrus bya'o zhes de dag glod nas so pag dag gis drud cing drud nas khrus bya bar brtsams pa dang / bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gan/ de dag la mkhas pas khrus la zhugs pa de rnams kyi sgra yid du 'ong ba 'di lta ste/ sil snyan yan lag lnga pa skyes bu mkhas pas legs par dkrol ba'i lta bu
2a5: byung ngo / / skye bo'i tshigs phal po che lam de nas 'gro bas sgra de thos pa dang / de rnams rna bye ste/ yud tsam bsdad nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag yangs pa can gyi ling tsha byi rnams kyi bskyed mos tshal na gar mkhan rnams gar byed pa ltar 'dod dam/ de ltar bya'o zhes ltad mo la yid
2a6: 'dun pa de dag skur bar chas te bskyed mos tshal du dong nas de dag nang du zhugs pa dang / drug sde rnams kyang phyir byung ngo // de dag gis de rnams la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag phyogs gang na gar mkhan rnams gar bgyid/ rna de rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren khyed kyis bye brag mi phyed de/
2a7: gang mkhan gar byed pa la sgra 'di la bu 'byung ngas/ 'phags pa dag 'o na 'di su'i sgra lags/ shes ldan dag kho bo cag lus drung nas khrus byas pa yin no// 'phags pa dag ci dge sbyong byed 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzizar tes/ bkren pa khyed kyis grin pardog pasar nan
2a8: la dge slong kho bo cag 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis gzir to/ / khyed kho bo cag gi rjes su ston pa yin nas ci/ ma smra bar deng / khyed la gnod pa byas ser zhes de rnams kyis de dag bsdigs pa dang / skra gong nas/ de ste/ yangs pa can du zhugs nas lam be che dang / srang dang / gzhi mdor/

2b1: dang / sum mdo dag tu 'phya bar brtsams so// dge slong rnams kyis bskabs de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams so phag dag gis lus drung de khrus byed
2b2: ba las glur byes/ de lta bsan dge slong gis so bag gis// lus drang de khrus mi bya'o// 'drung na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus drung de khrus mi bya'o zhes bka' phrul pa dang / dge slong dag rkang pas dag
2b3: blang zhing drim dang cas bzhin sang snyams la 'jug pa dag bras zedang/ / khyim padag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bye nabs sar ga zung zhe drim dang cas na/ the drim byung ba mi rdzi/ de rnams kyis smras pa/ bzhin nga ba dag
2b4: ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / / ci 'phags pa khyer dri ma'i 'dam bcangs pas dag par 'gyur ram/ de rnams cad mi smra bar 'dug ste/ bsod snyoms la brgyus nas gtsug lag khang du dong ba dang / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol/
2b5: te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag yang snga bcas pa'o// 'di ni gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na dge slong gis dang poso bag gis drung bar gnang ngo // lus gzhan nim min te/ 'drud na 'gal chabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
2b6: 'das yangs pa can na steng rdzing gi 'gram khang pa btugs pa na zhugs so/ / dge slong rnams snga drogam thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lung bzed thogs te yangs pa can du bsod snyoms kyi phyir thugs pa dang / de rnams kyis bram ze nags dkar byis so
2b7: ris gsum blugs nas slong sa mo la chu zhing de'i bslangs pa yang mang du rnyed par mthong ngo de/ / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang de ltar bya'o zhes de rnams phyi de nyi nas dkar gyis so/ ris
2b8: gsum byugs nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma dad pa rnams kyis mthong nas 'phya zhing gus par smra'o/ / gus par smra'o zhes smras pa dang / drug sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par sbas par bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bye ba gang

3a1: ngag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram zerga na pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra byed kyi
3a2: phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so// de lta lags pas bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol le zhes byas pa dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs re dge slong rnams kyis thos nas
3a3: bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong rnams sor ris gsum 'dri ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis sor ris gsum bri ba mo byo'o// dge slong so sa gsum 'drin 'gal tshabs can du
3a4: 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sor ris gsum mi 'brug go zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag sman pas bsgo yang lus sas mi skud pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ltar
3a5: nasnga ma ni bcas pa'o/ / 'di ni gnang ba yin te/ de lta bas na sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung
3a6: bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa na/ de rnams kyis bram ze 'ge'i wang gi thig le byas pa zhig skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis bskor zhing ston mo'i bsngags pa brjod pa mthong ba dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag
3a7: cag kyang 'di ltar bya'o/ / legs kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de rnams phyi de nyin 'gi'u wang gi thig le dag gis bdog nyid brgyan pa byas nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas 'phya zhing gus par smra'o gus par smra'o// zhes smras pa dang / drug
3a8: sdernams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar gyi/ bral na rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong rnams ni phyag

3b1: bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra byed kyi phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so// de'i slad du bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol lo zhes byas
3b2: ba dang / de dag cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ni byung ba ni dge slong dag 'ge'u wang gi theg le dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las grur gyis/ des/
3b3: bas na dge slong gis 'go'u wang gi thig le dag gis brgyan par mi bya'o// brgyan na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis rigi'u mang gi thig le dag gis bdag nyid rtun par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong zhig dpral bar ma byung bar sman
3b4: pa'i drung du song nas bzhin bzangs bdag la sman ston cig/ 'phags pa rma'i than kor 'ga'u wang gis skus shig dang khyod 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnangango // 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro//
3b5: skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong dag sman pas bsgo ba ni ma gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis so phag gis lus drung bar mi bya'o zhes bka'
3b6: stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams nya phyis kyis 'drud par byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nya byes kyis 'drung bar mi bya'o// 'drung nas 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin
3b7: gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so/ / drug sde rnams dris byugs te/ gzhon nu rnams kyi nang du dong nas smras pa/ gzhon nu dag dang kyi dri ji lta sdoms shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan ci khyed dris byugs sam/ blugs sa'o// gnas brtan byed dris zug du dzung ma/
3b8: rung yang rung mi rung yang rung ste/ de yang da kyis na thugs so// de dag 'a byo smod lazer ba'i skabs dedage slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dris nyug pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na

4a1: dge slong rnams kyis dri thug par ma bya'o/ / nyugan 'gas tshams can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis byug pa ma phyo nas paka/ 'asum pa dang / dag slong da bzhig ldan pa'i drung song ste/ bzhen 'as bdag la ga /
4a2: des smras pa/ 'phags pa dris thugs na khyod 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// bzhin pazangs kyi po dod pa spyod ma/ 'phags pa khyod kyi sman ni 'di yin te/ gzhan gyis ni 'tshe bar mi nus so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom
4a3: na das kyis pakar phrul ba/ de lta bas na gnang gis bla pa'i lung gis ca ba bya'o// dge slong da / rjes byugs nas dge 'dun byed na 'dug cing sa zed dang kyim ba dga'o gang lhags pa rnams cos s+ho pa byed/ bra med kyim gas man
4a4: yang 'gro bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas dge slo dri 'chang pa'i kun tu spyad pa'i chos bca' ba bya ste/ dge slong 'chang bas dris thugs nas dge 'dun gyen du 'dug par man/
4a5: bram ze dang khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams la chos ston par mi bya/ bra ma ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim rnams su 'gro bar mi bya'i/ nam sos par gyur pade'i tshe khrus byas nas dri med par gyur ba dang dge 'dun gyinang du 'dug par bya/ bram ze dang khyim padag 'ongs shing
4a6: lhags pa rnams pa chos bstan par bya/ bram ze dang khyim bdag gis khyim rnams su 'gro bar bya'o// dge slong dri 'chang bas kun du spyad pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa bzhin yang dag par blangs te mi 'dug na 'gal tshams can du 'gyur ro// bram ze dang khyim bdag dang bcan
4a7: dag rjod rnams 'di byum na/ dge slong rnams 'thod na ma len pa nga de dag shes smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang sa da rgyas bcom ldan das 'ji na blang ba mab+ha rtson gyi stegs can las son gdas lags da na sa ldan das
4a8: rten du byung bas da ltar khyed yon gnas lags na/ gal te khyed kyis ma bzhengs na ci bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu dge ba'i lam rgyags ma mchis par 'chi 'am/ bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bzhes shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ bcom ldan

4b1: 'das sa so/ / sa gi sang sa byamabacom ldan das pa gsol ba dang / bcom can das kyis pagasum pa/ blang bar bya// dag grod rnams kyis byas nas dag kya du du nga ba / dadagags rnas pa/ shes padagasas/
4b2: ri napang bzhin du nyo nyon khyed kyis blangs tetor ram/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blangs nas dor ba mi bya'i/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod rten ma dring la gangs byug par bye zhes
4b3: bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas dbu skra dngas na mo'i mchod rten dag 'dri'i lag ris nyug go// de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci bdag cag gis mchod rten ma mthong dam/ bdag cag gis ni khyed kho na la phul ste/ dbu skra rang sen mo'i mchod rten
4b4: dag la ni sdang phul lags so/ / skabs dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ blangs nas gnas khang la thug par bya'o// de rnams kyis gnas khang gi sgo la byugs pa dang / de dag dri gtsang bang yin
4b5: no snyam nas phyag 'tshal bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang byug par bya'o// de slong rnams kyis drang bang tu byugs pa dang / nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das
4b6: kyis bka' stsal pa/ sngas dang nye ba 'am nad pa dang nye bar byug nga byani drishi yo gros can meg la phan pas dus dus su bsnam par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par ma bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu srin byes pa bsod kyang la 'jigs 'jigs lha'i tshal ri dgas kyi
4b7: nags na bzhugs so/ / ji tsam na rgyal bu gnon nu rtogs byed kyi khang bzangs pad ma ris byed du bcug nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun da bcas pa gdugs cod la spyan ngas ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'ang bzangs pa mi'i ris su dge slong gi dag dun gyi gu la
4b8: dam gshams pa la zhugs so/ / nye dga' bo zan za ba'i tshe lag pas kab la bsnun pa dang / khang bzangs pad ma ris g.yos par gyur to// 'dri ma mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags brgyal bu rtogs byed kyis khang bzangs pad ma ris tshon brgya rtsa gcig gis/

5a1: bar byas babyed kyis gsheshegs pa kyi ga sa/ sa/ btsun pa rtags kya dang lhag par dgas pas dra byas nas ga suM ga la med do// khye pa de sa lag par chags pas du byas ma me dgas pa bcananas sa
5a2: dbye bar 'gyur ro/ / de dag 'a zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsel ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gsung nang byung bani dge slong dag ka ba la lag pas bstan pa las gyur gyis/ de sa bas na dge slong gis
5a3: ga pas kapa la bdun par mi bya'o/ / bstan na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis kabal lagabs bsnun par mi byeshes paka/ 'phrul pa dang / drag lnga rnams 'drar dadagu mo dang/ phrag pa dag mgo dang / rtsib logs dang/
5a4: dang / ked pa dang / brla dang / bus mo dang / byin pa dang / rkang pa dang / dbyug pa dang / bong ba dang / gzhan gyis bstan par byed pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang gis kyang bsnan par mi bya'o// drug sden mas cig padang
5a5: sadang dgazhan la bsnun par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzhan la yang gang dag gis kyang bsnan par mi bya'o// bsnun na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi 'tshal
5a6: ga sa thas sbyi da/ can grags so// da rnams can yod song nams kyi phyir thugs pang/ de rnams kyis blam thogs/ slong seMl d+hAni de na dag pa sa sa yongs/ drag ldanas
5a7: kyis smras pa/ dga' nyi dga' bathabs 'de ni cang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang de lta byod zhes de dag pyid nyin tshangs pa skad pa thogs te/ bsod stoms lazhugs pa me dad pa rnams kyis mtho nas/ 'bya zhi dgus par smra'o// gus par smra'o zhes smras padang
5a8: dradrugrag sde rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang mi shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bram ze rgan pa rgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin la/ dge slong

5b1: rnams ni zag bya ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir khyed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi dge slong du ni ma lags so// de lta lags pas/ bdag cag gis ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol ba'o zhem
5b2: byas pa dang / de dag cang me smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni ge slong namam tshangs pa'i srung thogs palas gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong
5b3: gis tshangs pa'i skud pa gdags par me bya'o/ / 'dogs na 'gal tshangs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshalamagon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ban bzhugs so// drug sngarna pas snga drogs thabs dang chos gos
5b4: bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod tu bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pan/ de dag gis bram ze dri dang me tog gis brgyan pa tshon sna sna ba'i skud pas lag pa bcings pa zhig dus ston thos nas dbang po chem ste/ khyim nas byung ba mthong ba dang / de dag gis smras pa/
5b5: dga' bo nye dga' bo thabs 'di ni bzang po zhig ste/ bdag cag kyang 'di bzhin bya'o zhes de dag bye de nyin tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcings nas bsod snyoms la zhugs pa/ bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas bya zhing gus par sla'o// gus par rtswa'i zhes
5b6: smras pa dang / drag sdes rnams kyis smras pa/ bkren pa khyed kyis gus par smra bar bya ba gang dag yin pa dang / phyag bya ba gang dag yin pa 'di yang ye shes sam/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig 'tshal bar bgyi/ bramaze rgan brgan pa rnams ni gus par smra bar bya ba yin pa
5b7: la dge slong rnams ni phyag bye ba yin na/ de ci'i phyir byed dge slong rnams la gus par smra bar byed kyi phyag ma yin/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis khyed bram ze lags par 'tshal gyi/ dge slong du ni ma lags so// de lta lags pas bdag cag gis
5b8: ma 'tshal gyis bzod par gsol lo zhes byas pa dang / de dag cad mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung ba ni dge slong

6a1: rnams tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa 'ching ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis tshen sna lnga pa'i skud pas lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o// 'chi na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshon sna lnga pa'i skad pas
6a2: lag pa bcing bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong nad pa gzhan zhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/ gzhin bzangs kho bo la nad 'di lta/ bu byung na sran ston cig ces byas pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa skud pa la gsang sngags dag gis bezlas brjod byas
6a3: te/ lag pa la bcings na khyod 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
6a4: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis sman pa'i lung gis bskud pa bcad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sman pa'i lung gis skud pa bcad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la 'chings/ nyes dmigs de
6a5: nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lag pa g.yas pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'o// de rnams lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung ba la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung
6a6: bal bcing bar mi bya'o/ / de rnams lag pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la 'ching ste/ nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag pa g.yon pa'i rtse mo la bcing bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung ba la bcing bar bya'o// dge slong rnams nang
6a7: sos par gyur nas skud pa bababab tu 'dongs mi ma yin pa rnams 'phya ste/ 'phags pa dag ded kyis sos par byas nas ngam gus par byed pa lta/ skabs de dge slong rnams la kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bababab tu dor
6a8: bar mi bya ste/ gal te nad ma byung na chos gos kyi mtha' 'am/ rgya cang la bcing bar bya'o// 'on te thams cad kyi thams cad kyi sos par gyur na ka ba'i ser ga'am/ rtsig pa'i gseb du gzhug par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi

6b1: xxx/ xxx
6b2: xxx/ xxx
6b3: 'dod pa'i monadan dag gis gzing bar byur te zhes byas ba dang / de rnams cad mi smra ba 'dug ga/ napas de dag slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgas pa/ nyes dmigs gsung nga byung ba dag song nas/
6b4: lag brgyan dang gang rgyan dag gis bdag nyid brgyan pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lag brgyan dang gang brgyan gyis bdag nyid brgyan par mi bya'o// brgyan na 'ga' tshabs can du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal
6b5: bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so/ / gtsug lag khang du mabyin par len pa rnams kyis dge 'dun gyi mdzod dang / gang zag giganas yang dganas bcus so// dge slong gzhan dag gcig gi yang sor // bdag cag sa
6b6: stong nas ji tsam lon pa mtshor ro/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis rgya bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya bcang bar bya'o zhes bka'
6b7: sral ba dang / drug sde rnams kyis gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shal las byas pa dang / song gdu rgya rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dag bcangs so// de nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis mthong nas lag pa brkyang ste smras pa/ bzhin bzangs
6b8: dad mad cig nad med cig/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di ci lags/ gzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis rgya gnang ngo // de dag 'phya smod 'a zer zhing dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ 'di ni

7a1: da ltar rgyal tha snyad 'dogs zhing brgyan rnams kyis bdag nyid brgyan par byed do/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis gser dang / dngul dang /
7a2: dUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa'i rgya chang bar mi bya/ khor rngub rgya yang bcang bar mi bya'i/ 'on kyang rgya lnga por gan dang / zangs las byas pa dang / khar ba las byas pa dang / ba so las byas pa dang / ra las byas pa bcang bar bya'o// drug sde rnams kyis rgya
7a3: lo skyes pa dang / bud med nyal po byed pa bris pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci dge sbyong khyed 'dod pa'i yon tan dag gis gzir tam/ gnas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'ad
7a4: kyis stsal pa/ rgya ni gnyis te/ dge 'dun gyi dang gang zag gi'o// de la dge 'dun gyi ni dbus su 'khor lo bris la/ glo gnyis su ri dgas 'og tu gtsug lag khang gi bdag po'i ming bri bar bya'o// gang zag gi ni rus pa'i keng rus sam/ mgo'i thod pa'i
7a5: bar bya'o/ / sdom ni/ sen mo 'brig dang byi dor dang / am dang ni skyu ru ra// lhung bzed brgyad po bkag pa dang // rjes su gnang ba gnyis yin no// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgoni med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' bor ba na bzhugs so// gang gi
7a6: tshe khyim bdag gon mad zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas lasogs pa dge slong gi dge/ 'dun la rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal phul bde'i tshe/ des 'breg sa pan gyi mi la smras pa/ kye skyes bu rgyal du rgya' byed kyi tshal du song la 'phags pa rnams kyi sku dang la spu bregs shig/ de
7a7: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni drug sde gang yang rung ba zhig gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stongs pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal na 'chag cing 'dug pa des de rgyang ring po nas mthong nas
7a8: smras pa/ bzhin bzangs 'ongs pa legs so// 'ongs pa legs so// khyod zla ba lta bur gnas na ring mo zhig lon te/ gang nas 'ongs des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyim bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi sgra dang kha spu breg pa'i slad du 'dir btang ngo // des smras pa/

7b1: sen mo legs par 'breg shes sam/ 'phags pa 'di la nyid bdag gi bzo lags so// bltas rlung de nye bar 'ongs pa dang / nye dga' bos lag pa brkyang ngo // 'breg mkhan gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa ci 'dra bar breg/ bzhin bzangs 'bru'i
7b2: rtse mo ltar bregs shig/ des 'bru'i rtse mo ltar bregs pa dang / ngas smras pa/ de ni ra ba'i cog lta bu dang / spu gri'i so dang / ste'u ka dang / zla ba tshes pa ltar gyis shig/ des des ji lnga ji ltar bsgo ba de lta bur byas pa dang / mjug tu smras pa bkren pa khyod ko rlung
7b3: zad kyang mi shes pa zhig/ 'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song shig ces des de nyi ma nub kyi bar du ma gtang ngo // de nyi ma nub nas khyim bdag mgon mad zas sbyin gyi drung du song ba dang / mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis 'phags pa mang po
7b4: ji snyed cig gi mgo dang kha spu bregs/ bdag gis 'phags pa rnams kyi sgra dang kha spug la bregs/ dge sbyong gzu lums can nye dga' bos bdag bskor nas/ sen mo 'bru'i rtse mo dang / ra ba'i tsog dang / spu gri'i so dang / ste'u ka dang / zla ba tshes pa lta bur gyis
7b5: shig/ ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag gis bgyis pa dang / de nas 'di skad ces smras pa/ bkren pa khyed ko cung zad kyang mi shes bzhig/ 'di kho na ltar mnyam par gyis la song shig ces mchis nas da bzod kho na shor na ci zhig bgyi/ khyim bdag
7b6: mgon med zas sbyin legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba rnams la nye bar zhi ba med pa lta zhes 'phyab la zhugs so/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyi thos nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
7b7: kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams sen mo'i breg pa las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis seMn mo theg par mi bya'o// 'breg na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis
7b8: sen mo breg par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams sen 'i long pong su la thas zed dbyi bad / de da gi mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci ste sen mo ring po ring por 'jog/ bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis mganang ngo // 'phags pa

8a1: byed nas sapas 'dag par 'gyur ma/ sgrub ba de gamang rnams kyis dpa/ bcom ldan nas la gsas pa dang/ bcomaldan das kyis ka'astsal ba/ sngaman bcas papa// dan gan payin// de stabs na ga sa
8a2: seM sonam pa gnyis po thuza so dang / he'u kalta bur breg par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgo ni mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyiganasangs rgyas masogs pa dge
8a3: klong gi dge 'dun la zhes bya ba thams cad da yon bzhin no/ / khyod min mo chos shes sam/ 'phags pa ji khur gyi/ ser po da dmang po dang da/ ra ba dang gsar gyi kha dog ste khung gyis shig ces pa'i rnam pa thams cad bdag gis bgyis pa/ de nas di
8a4: slad ces badzin pa khyed ga zhung ba kyang migs pa ni/ / 'di 'on ra mnyam par byis la sod shig cim mtshan pa dang nga 'on nor na cizhig kyi/ khyim bdag ma non med pas sbyin gyi lags par gsum pa'i chos 'dus ba las tu thung rnamasapa nyes
8a5: ne da pa zhes 'bya ba lazugs so/ / nabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsos pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ nyes dmigs gangacung zad kyang ni dge slong rnams sen po dag byed byed pa sa
8a6: b+hur / de nyag pas na dge slong gis sen mo dag kyi dang ma bya'o// byed na 'gal tshabs can 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis sen mo dag kyi dor ma bya'o// zhes bka' stsal ba dang / da snang chen rje'i las dang / ltu bzed kyi
8a7: myod nas ma rgya gas pa 'do dag pa gyu na/ rnamam pa pa drag dang med sa pa to/ med byam dang rnam kyis pasgras pa/ lags pa dag byed ci byi mi ma gas shing //
8a8: nisdug/ de dag gis gad pa dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags patso'i phyir drims byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyed ci 'drima'i 'dam bcangs pas 'dag par 'gyur rab/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan

8b1: 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'aphrul ba/ dri ma dbyed pa'i phyir sen mo pa'ar bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyam pa'i lab 'od sa tshal rgyag lan dag gnas pan bcugs so// rgyal po gzugs can
8b2: po'i kun du spyod pa ni dus kyi gas pog 'brus ba'am 'bras bus rab kang kyi yang rung bde dag dang por dge 'dun pa 'dul la/ / de'i 'og tu bdag nyid kyang // da'i rtson po rnams kyis mtha'i shing thog dag sus pa dang / des rgyas gsongs
8b3: 'phags pa rnams la phul cig/ de dag gis bzhang ba dang / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag cil bkod/ de dag gis smras pa wA ci khyo dang ni 'phags pa rnams la dang por 'phrul snyam dgongs kye/ bdag cag gis chas sngar 'phags pa rnams la bul
8b4: bar ni ma lags sam/ des smras pa/ gal te de lta nangs 'phags pa rnams la stong gi kun dga' bar ba nyid phul lo// lha legs te rjes su yi rang ngo // des phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi phyir stong gi kun dga' rab bul nas der dus ston
8b5: kyang bcugs so/ / de ji ltar yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dus ston la lta bar 'ongs pa a mra'i shing thog smin pa rnams kyis tshim par gyur pa de ltar shing thog rgyas par gyur to// de dge/ 'dun la phul zhing dge slong rnams kyis
8b6: a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du zos so/ / ji tsam na mtshams kyi rgyal po zhig la a mra dag dgos par gyur nas/ des rgyal po gzugs can snying po la po nya btang ste/ grogs po bdag la a mra dag dgos kyis bskur ba'i rigs
8b7: so nas byas pa dang / des po nyid la smras pa/ kye skyes bu ngas stong gi kun dga' rab de 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la phul gyis/ sod la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rnams la slongs shig/ de 'od ma'i tshal du song ba dang / drug sde rnams kyis kun tu
8b8: spyod pa ni rtag tu kun dga' ba'i sgrami stongs par byed pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo 'od ma 'tshal gyi sgom 'chag cing 'dug go// de'i drung du song nas phyag 'tshal te des smras pa/ rgyal ba che ge mo zhig gis ma khri'i ched du khyed kyi thang tu tangs/

9a1: de'i slad du a mri dag stsal ba'i rigs so// des smras pa/ kye skyes bu song la a mri dzi tsam dgos pa de tsam long shig/ de la song nas a mra'i she ba rnams kyi drung du bltas na mi snang de/ de slar log nas smras pa/ 'phags pa ma mchis/
9a2: go/ kun dga' bos de khrid nas kun dga' ba thugs te/ kun dga'i rab thams cad bskor nas smras pa/ kyai skyes bu shi 'di la 'dzegs sheg/ des 'dogs nas ma mthong ba dang / kun dga' bos smras pa/ kyems pa ga kyi lag
9a3: song / lho dang nub kyi yal gar song / de thams cad tu song nas skyo bar gyur te babs nas smras pa/ 'phags pa ci kun dga' ba 'di lo 'di la 'bras bu ma chags sam/ bzhin pa'angs ji ltar lor zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags
9a4: so/ / 'phags pa ci rlung dang char bas blags sam/ bzhin bzangs rlung dang char bas ma blags kyi/ 'on kyang kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'tshes so// de slar lo gnas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la gsol pa/ lha 'phags
9a5: pa rnams kyi zhal nas kho bo cag gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so zhes gsung ngo / / des smras pa/ legs te nga la longs spyod pa nyid dgos so zhes byas pa dang / mi de slar song ngo // ji tsam na dus ston la bab pa'i tshe yul ma gaH
9a6: na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'dus nas/ de dag gi smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci stong gi kun dga' ra ba 'di la 'dis wa yu ma chags sam/ bzhin bzangs dag ji ltar lo re lo re zhing shing thog yod pa de ltar 'di 'bras bu chags mod kyi/ 'on kyang kha btsa/
9a7: gis a mra'i 'bras bu dag ma smin pa nyid du 'chos so// 'phags pa dag gang yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad ma mri smin pa dag gis tshim par 'gyur ba de khyed kyis 'bras lam smin kho nar 'chos te/ gang kho bo cag la gnod pa byas pa nim
9a8: legs pa zhig byas so/ / des smras pa/ 'di rgyal pos yul la na ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la byin pa ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul te/ de lta bas na kho bo cag gis ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin zos so// khyed ci gtogs zhes byas/

9b1: dang / de dga' bya snong 'phe bar byed do// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa nyes dmigs gcung bad ni byung ba ni dge slong rnams ma mra dag zabasas nga
9b2: gyis/ de bas na dge slong gis am dag papa' bar mibye'o// dge slong mamra dag zan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge sang gas mam dgapa' bar me bye nas gsungs pa dang / bram pa dang khyim bdag dang yan dag ge slong
9b3: rnams pa shengs ha kA 'i shing tog dag 'dul ban/ / dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mgan // de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags ba dag ga dgi / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ba mthung bzhes bya ba nas
9b4: 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'gro'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis mtshan nyid grub pa yin no zhes/
9b5: byas nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o da mtshan nyid grub pa ni 'di dag yin// tshig gu chags pa rnams so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can gzhan dag cig/ dge slong rnams la a mra'i shing thog smin pa dag 'bul ba ni zhes bya ba nas/ de bzhin du 'jig rten
9b6: 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du mchi'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar thams cad snga ma bzhin no// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis mtshan nyid bye brag phyed
9b7: do zhes byas te bza' bar bya'o/ / de la mtshan nyid bye brag phyar ba ni 'di dag yin te/ shazhugs pa rnams so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal ba rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong
9b8: nad bzhig sman pa'i drung du song ste/ bzhin bzangs bdag 'di 'dra ba'i nad kyis thebs na sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa de mar 'thung la rnam par gyis shig dab kru sman sbyin no// des mar 'thungs pa dang / skom pas gnod par gyur to// sman

10a1: pa 'os rjes pa/ 'phags pa pa pa jugags/ des rnas pa/ bzhin sa bdag ma pas ga dang // mA po ngag ces byas padang/ dpalags rdza sa// drag/ yang bla sa mas 'phags
10a2: bsgom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzas ma bral lo// sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pad tsho sgra rlu ma bcangasas pa/ bzhin cangs yod pang yin no// phags gapar chong pa gag/ bzhin pangs bcom ldan 'das kyis
10a3: mgan / / phags pa rgyud ba ston pa ni thugs rnacan yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de zhes bya banas/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba// par ca pa byo'o// zhes bya ba'i bar 'o// des par sa gnas 'dus go// rang su
10a4: nam dris pa/ bzags bsgom pa dang bral lam/ des smras pa/ bzhin bzangs nga rung ma bral lo// sman pas smras pa/ 'phags pa de'i tshe skyu ru khar ma bcangs sam/ bzhin bzangs bcangs te/ 'dug pa 'di yin no// des smras pa/ 'phags pa
10a5: mung cig/ gzhan du na sgom pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gan bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis thas nas bcom ldan 'das
10a6: la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka ba sum pa/ mung ra bya'o// mung chu nas bong kyis mamed pa dang / go bas rdeg ba gyur te// yang smanapa 'das na dris pa/ 'phakrus pa sgru pa dang bral la mangs smras ga/ gzhi rgyas shes
10a7: draganod do/ / phags pa de'i cha skyur ram mung ram/ bzhin zangs mur nas bor ro// 'phags pa ci phyir ma mang / bzhin thang babacom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas bkag go// 'phags pa byed ni nang pa yin la/ khyod kyi ston pan
10a8: thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong dag gnang gis 'bras bu lda dus su yang rung/ dus ma yin par yang rung / na sa

10b1: xxx/ xxx
10b2: dge slong rnams kyis 'bras bu lnga gang dag yin pa mi shes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sA rur dang / a rung dang / bdur dang / byi byi ling dang / na le sham mo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khakha na 'od ma'i
10b3: tshal gyi ka lan dka gnas pa na bzhugs so/ / rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na khyim bdag shin tu bzang po zhes bya ba drug cing nor mang ba longs spyod chen po zhig gnas pa de ga cer bu pa rnams la rab tu dang do// des rigs mnyam pa las chung
10b4: mablangs nas/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das/
10b5: kyang snga dro sha mthabs dang chos gos mnabs lhung bzed bsdams te/ rgyal po'i khab tu bsod pasnyoms kyi phyir zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i khab na pa song snyoms brgya zhing khyim bdag shin bzang po'i khyim gal ba de log sug shegra pa dang kyim gzhin/
10b6: bu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rgyad mo nas mthong ngo // mthede nas kyang chung ma khrid nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der sod ste/ byin nas bcom ldan 'das pa digad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mchis brang 'di sems can
10b7: 'gas bzur na ci zhig tu btsa' bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bum pa/ bu bang btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsas bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang ma 'dipa la nyams su byed par 'gyug nga bstan pa la rabatu byung na
10b8: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyu ro// des bcom ldan 'das la gza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nad med cig ces

11a1: gsus na nyams shes tagasheg so/ / da ta sa pa bzhag na gter zub nag drag pades pasams pa gang bdag cags bslang ba'i khyam gcig cazhig yod pade yang dge sbyong gonyams 'das /
11a2: sod pa dge sbyong gau tams ci lung bstan pa blta'o snyam ma// de der song ste smras pa/ khyim bdag dge sbyong gau tams 'ongs par gyu re/ mkhyen tod ma / lung bstan/ 'phags pa padag gis chung mal bstan te/ oM zhig tu tsal bar 'gyur
11a3: shes pa gyis pa dang / de lta phung po btsa' bar 'brur zhing / rigs gas la bar byed par 'gyur/ stod mau dpa' nyams su myod par 'gyur/ de mastan pa la rab tu zu nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dang com pa nyid pa na
11a4: ru byed par 'gyur ro/ / zhes gsung ngo // gcer bu ba de rtsis mkhas bzhig ste/ rdo rgyus kha dog dkar po blangs nas brtsis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du lung bstan pa de thams cad de kho na bzhin du mthong nas/ des bsams pa gas
11a5: te rjes su bsngags na ni khyim bdag 'di dge sbyong gau ta ma la dang bar 'ongs pas na 'dir cung zad cig ni bsngags par bya/ cung zad cig/ ni smad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ lag pa dkyogs bzhin bskur ba dang / khyim bdag shin tha bzang pos
11a6: smras pa/ 'phags pa ci ste lag pa dkyog bzhin bsgru/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di la thung zad cig ni bden/ cung zad cig ni brdzun na/ 'phags pa gang ni bden/ gang ni brdzun/ khyim bdag bri bor btsa' bar 'gyur ponas zer bag
11a7: y-in pa den na no/ / rigs gsas par byed pa ra byu nas bgang yin de ni de nan/ gas pa pani mi mad min pas semam can sa brgyang da pas mthag dang kyis me tshig par 'thung po// da ma 'ad nyams su myong bar
11a8: 'gyur gzhes zer ba gang yin pa de ni brdzun te/ khyim bdag khyod kyis mi dgyur bal lha dang pa'i dpal nyams su myo bang gyur pa 'ga' yod pa lta mthong ngam/ ri bstan pa la rabatu 'thung de zhes zer ba de bden te/ gang ga tshe 'di bza' ba yang med

11b1: xxx/ xxx
11b2: dge sbyong gau tam la yang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid med na/ de'i nyan thos las/ sbrom snar ci dgos/ khyim bdag shin tu bang po mi dga' bar gyur nas smras pa/ 'bags pa 'di la bdag gis de yang bstsu
11b3: par bgyi/ / gcer thubs smras pa/ khyim bdag bdag cag ni rab tu byung ba ste/ bslab pa blangs pa yin pas khyod nyid shes so zhes smras nas sod do// shin tu bzang pos bsams pa 'di yod 'dor ro snyam nas sman ma yin pa sbyin pa btsams
11b4: pa dang / sems can de srid pa zang ba zhig pas sman ma yin pas de yang de la sman du gyur to// des de'i dku g.yon pa mnye bar brtsams pa dang / mngal na 'dug pa de dku g.yas par sod do// shin tu bzang pos dku g.yas pa mnye bar btsams
11b5: pa dang / de kun g.yon par song ste/ srid pa tha ma pa'i sems can zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du bar mdor rgyan char cing dus byed par 'gyur pa gang yin pa de ni gnas ma yin bzhi dgo skabs med do// khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma de dku
11b6: mnyes pas pa ru bar btsams pa dang / khyim tshes dag gis thos nas rings pa rings par song ste dris pashos ldan khyim bdag gi chud ma 'di ci ste ru/ shin tu bzang pos smras pa/ gdon mi za bar 'di phrag cang ba'i dus la bab po zhes byas pa dang /
11b7: de dgadong ngo // shin dbazang pos dasams pa/ bdag gis 'di 'dir bsar mi nus kyis dgon par bkri'o// snyam nas des de dgon par khrid nas ci nas 'chi bar 'gyur de/ de ltar bcal nas des de sras te khyim du khyer nas mdza' bo dang / nye du
11b8: nu dang / khyim ches rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo'i chung ma shi'o// de dag gis ru bar brtsams nas de dag du zhing dgos sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar ba rnams kyis khyogs brgyan nas pa'i 'i'i ba tshal gyi durang khrod du khyer ro//

12a1: xxx/ xxx
12a2: ldan dag nyon cig/ dge sbyong go tams khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma bu por btsa' bar 'gyur zhing / rigs gsal bar byed par 'gyur/ lha dang ma'i dpal nyams su myong bar 'gyur/ de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyan mongs pa thams
12a3: cad grang byed gra bcom pa nyid mdon sum du byed par 'gyur rizhes lung bstan pa don gnas pas mtshal gyi drang khrod du khyer ro/ / deshig sheng gang lachu ba nyid kyang med pa de la yal ga dang mdapa ma dang / lon 'byung bar lag la 'grub
12a4: skabs 'di lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs pa 'am/ mi rig pa'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po 'jig rten la phan par
12a5: zhugs pa/ srung ba gcig pu/ gcig da dpa' ba dang / med pa gnyis su mi gsung ba/ zhig nas dang lhag mthong gis gnas pa/ bslab par gsum la legs par bslabs pa/ 'dul ba'i gzhi gsum la mkhas pa/ chu bo bani las rgal ba/ rdzu
12a6: 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthi' la legs par gnas pa/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas goms par mdzad pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis mi snyengs pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par sbyangs pa/ 'gro ba lnga las yang dag par
12a7: 'das pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa pha rol du phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs pa drug la rtag tu gnas pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gi me tog gis drug pa/ la ma yan lag brgyad pa ston pa/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/ stobs
12a8: bcu'i stobs mnga' ba/ grags pas phyogs bcur khyab pa/ stong la dbang sgyur ba bas khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni chos nyid kyis nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi 'jig rten la gzigs shing su ni nyams/ su ni

12b1: rang suni ma dpang byar/ mun byos sa chud 'gyur/ sa ni gnod par gyur/ sun nyam pa dang / zhabasas chud bapa dang / gnod pa thug/ su ni song la gzhos/ su ni song sa btsun so pa ma pa/ gad so
12b2: drangs nas mang dang / thar pad 'thas thal dang/ ga sheg dge pa rnab rnyed pa myed pa // ga sheg sbying pa mams nas / na gtsun pan thas ba / nas lags gnags pa 'jug/ ya m+b+ha r+b+ha
12b3: br-in ni gan gyi rgya mngon/ / dub sa 'ad bar 'gyur srid kyi/ gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams pa/ sangs rgyas dus pas po 'dir// sa ni drug pa'i thag cagapa gad di 'i srog kyang srung ba gang // de banan gagags pa bdu 'i bya ro/
12b4: de bzhin gzigs shing de yi rgyud kyang srung // thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gnas pa yi/ thugs rje pa drus pa gshin be'u stor bzhin// srid pa bgrod dkar 'khyams par gyur ba yi// gdul ba'i sras rnams skyom mkhyen par tshol/
12b5: 'dul ba phran tshegs kyagazhi// // bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs zhig tu 'dzum pa mdzad do// chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i
12b6: tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmang po dang / dgar po dag byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu gro// kha cig ni steng du 'gro ste/ gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba dag ni dmyal ba yangasas dang / thig nag dang / bsdus gnopa dang / ngu 'bo dang / ru yod chen po dang /
12b7: tsha ba dang / rab tu tsha ba dang / mnar med pa dang / chu bur can dang / chu bur rdol ba dang / so thams thams dang / kyi hud zer ba dang / a rbu Ter ba dang / ud pa la lta rags pa dang / pad ma ltar gas pa dang / pad ma lta rags pa chen por song ste/ tsha ba'i dmyal
12b8: ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur nas 'bab/ grang ba'i dmyal ba gang dag yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur nas 'bab bo// des sems can de rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun bcad pa dang / de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ shes

13a1: ga ga medag cag na 'i yos pa mayon te gzhan du skyes shes zer ro/ / de dag dang pa bskyed pa 'byu bcom ldan 'das sprul pa ke ngas/ de dag gis sprul pa de ma mthong nas da sum dri sams ga ges la nang ga bdag cag 'das
13a2: shi 'phos pa yang ma yin bzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang sems can 'di sngon ma mthong ba zhig ste/ 'di'i mthus bdag cag sdug bsngal gyi khyad par rgyun chad do zhes zer ro// de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dang bas myal bamyod
13a3: par 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du sems can rnams sdong du gyur pa lha dang maM rnams kyi nang dri nyid mtshams sbyor ba 'dzin to/ / gang dag snying du 'gro ba dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha dang / su maM bcu rtsa gsum pa dang / 'thab bral dang /
13a4: ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / changs sa dang / tshangs pa'i bdun na 'don dang / tshangs chen dang / bong drung dang / tsa med 'od dang / 'od gas pa dang / dge rlung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin med dang / bzod
13a5: nams 'phel dang / 'bras bu che ba dang mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'on min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa zhes bya ba yang sgrogs so// tshigs
13a6: sru bcad pa gnyis kyang sgrogs te/ brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/ sangs rgyas bstan la 'bab par bya/ 'dab pa'i khyim la glang chen bzhin/ 'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya// chos 'dul 'di la gang zhig ni/ bag dang bcas par spyod byed pa
13a7: spyi ba'i 'khor ba rabasrungs nas/ sdug bsngal gyi ni mthir byed 'gyur// de nas 'od zer de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi bya bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro// de gal te bcom ldan 'das rgyas
13a8: 'das kyi lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snam logs su nub par 'gyur ro/ / ma 'ongs pa rung ston par bzhed na ni mdun du nub par 'gyur ro// dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi mthil du nubapa 'gyur ro/ dung bror skyes pa

13b1: lung ston par bzhed na ni long bur nub par 'gyur ro/ / yi dgas su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni zhabs kyi ma por rla par 'gyur ro// mer skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/ bras mong nub par 'gyur ro// sab kyib yang bas pa ba'i d+hA/
13b2: srid lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yon gyi mthil du nub par 'gyur ro// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal sring lung ston par bzhed na ni phyag g.yas kyi sa zil du nub par 'gyur ro// lhar skye ba lung ston par bzhed na ni lte bar nub par 'gyur ro// nyan thob /
13b3: byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni zhal du nub par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub lung ston par bzhed na ni mdzod spur nub par 'gyur ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ston par bzhed ni ni gtsug gtor du nub par 'gyur ro// de
13b4: nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bskor nas bcom ldan 'das la la na gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhas du rtsub po// de nas che dang ldan pa kun dag 'a bos thal ma sbyar te bcom ldan 'dapa la zhus gnam
13b5: pa sna tshogs chen ni stong dag gis/ / bkra ba'i tshogs dgazhal gyi nang nas byung // nyi ma shar bar gyur ba jil bar/ de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis// tshigs su bcad de yang gsol pa// sangs rgyas rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs// rgyal
13b6: ba dgra thal 'gro mchog rgyur gyur pa/ num mchim par pad ma'i rtsa lag dang / dreng ltar dkar ba'i 'dzum pa ston mi mdzad// deH/ nyid kyib tan thos dus mkhyen nas// rgyal dbang nyan po nyan par bachal rnams kyi/ the tshom skyes bathub pa skyes mchog ga/ gsung
13b7: mchog bzang zhing brtan pas gsal du gsol/ / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ri rab ltar brtan pa// zung thub rnams ni glo bur 'dzum mi ston// mgon po ci slad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa de/ skye bo'i tshogs 'di nyan par yang dag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
13b8: byas pa/ kun dga' po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni nu med khyen med par num mi mdzad do// kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag bzhin gshegs pa dur khrong

14a1: rgyu zhing gshegs par bzhed kyis/ khyed las gdi zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig drang khrod tu rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro ba de ches gos dgaso so nas lang shig ces sgo shig/ tshe dang ldan bkun dga' bo btsun pa ltar 'tshal lo zhes bcom ldan
14a2: 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ dge slong dag gang na ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong rnams la dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dur khrod tu rgyu zhir gshegs par bzhed kyis/ khyed las gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa dang lhan cig dur khrod du rgyu zhing 'gro bar spro bde chos gos
14a3: dgas so nas long shig ces bsgo ba dang / dge slong thams cad 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba zhi pa 'khor zhi ba grol ba 'khor grol ba dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa/ rnam par dul ba 'khor nam
14a4: par dul ga dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/ glang po che grang be che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ rang ba rgyal pa
14a5: rang 'i tshigs kyis bsod bas na/ rnam mkha' lding bya'i rtags kyis ga sa bya na shang pa'i tshags kyis bskang bka ba// dpa' bos dmag gatshogs kyis bkar bas pa/ sam pan 'an pa tshogs kyis bskor ba sAg nga
14a6: tshogs kyis bskor ba ba/ tshang dpon 'a khar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba la bu/ khams kyi rgyal ba ldan pa'i tshigs kyis bskor bkab/ 'khor los srung ba brag dgas bskor ba lta ba/ thub skad par tshigs kyis bskor bas pa/ kyi 'od cing byung gas pan

14a8: xxx/ xxx

14b1: pa med pa lta ru/ dbang po shin tu dral bas spyod lam mi nyams pa gshegs pa/ sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ dpe byad bar po brgyad zus mdzes par byas pa sku 'a 'domag gis brgyan ga 'od nyam stong bas lhag pa/ rin pa rgya'i di 'gre ba ka zung kun
14b2: nas bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/ nyan thos chen po kun shas kau N+Din+ya dang / rta thul dang / rlangs pa dang / ming chan dang / bzang po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal me ba dang / 'od
14b3: srung dang / grags pa dang / gang po le sogs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po gzhan dang / srog chags brgya stong phal mo ches bskor nas bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod tu gshegs so// sangs rgyas gshegs pa la phan yon bcwa brgyad yod de/ bcwa brgyad gang zhe na/ me'i 'jigs
14b4: ba med/ chu'i 'jigs pa med/ seng ge'i 'jigs pa med/ stag gi 'jigs pa med/ gzig gi 'jigs pa med/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa med/ kun po'i 'jigs pa med/ lag can pa'i 'jigs pa med/ grubatsas kyi 'jigs pa mad/ sho gam gyi 'jigs
14b5: pa med/ bsel rngan gyi 'jigs pa med/ mi'i 'jigs pa mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa med/ dus dus su gzugs bzang po dag mthong bar 'gyur/ sgra snyan pa dag thos par 'gyur/ 'od chen po dag mthong bar 'gyur/ kun shes pa lung ston pa dag thos par 'gyur/ chos kyi longs spyod
14b6: zad cing gi langs spyod dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyus gshegs pa ni gnod pa chung ba yin pas/ lha dang po bcu stong du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs khrid phyi di khrig pasil ba'i tshal logs nas rlung dag kyang langs so// rgyal rig sa
14b7: kyi bye'u nag dang / bram ze'i khye'u gabyes pa gnyis shig rgyal po'i bab nas phyi rol du byung ste rtse zhing bakhod do// gnyis las rgyal rigs kyi khye'u ni dang pa dang ldan pa yin/ bram tho bye'u ni gang ma yin do// bramatho kye 'das rgyal rigs kyi bye'u la smras pa/ grogasapa
14b8: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po'i chung ma'i bu khye'u bar skye bar bgyur te/ / rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur

15a1: ga nan/ sa ma sa byas rnamamam ma tho du zad bye na/ mamaldan da kyis ga'aphrul ba/ brdzun ma krung zang/ rgyal gas kyu chags su ca sgrums/ blabs sa chags brnam sa la gru pa zad
15a2: di nga nags cas ma 'a gro yang srid/ rgyam po'i tshwa sa pa chu me // dang song na pa badz+ra gsung 'gra grad pa pa// blam khye' sa grags pa de sta na sel pa tshal gyi dung khrod sbyin pa da nas smras nas de ga nyis dpa dang ma mdza
15a3: xxx/ xxx
15a4: di/ gas kyis yos pan nga gnags phyogs sa la mtshags / ba da can du sa mapar thu na/ phrul brta pa na kyi byed// tshogs ma pa gan nas ma pa nyid dang/ ma
15a5: sa can nyi bas ma na kyis kyi pa da / gan tu ma rna cargyas rgyab thu / gas pa 'jug rnams sa mi byung bar thugs sastan pa las byu ste rnams ma das pas das chom nyin
15a6: dubyed par 'gyur ro/ zhes lung bstan na ni chi'i'adrus la bab nas bsi mtshal gyi drang khrod dra rdung zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu bsil tshal gyi drang khrod du gshegs so/ zhes thos sa/ thos nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/ 6sa
15a7: ldan 'das no do mad par bsil tshal gyi drar khrod du mi gshegs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu zang po'i chung pa las brten te gdul ba'i don chen po zhig mdzad par 'gyur ga mchag gis ltar 'gro ba snyam napa de btsun ma dang / gzhon nu dag po/
15a8: bo dang / pho zang 'bor ba dang / ljongs kyi sams yongs su bskor nas rgyal ba'i khabanas song ba dang / rgyaladis kyi khye'u des rgyal po gza sbyangs gzugs can snying po thag nga po kho nas mthong nas yang tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ ma g+ha d+hiSh+Ti mang bdag rgyal bar/

15b1: gtso bo 'di// 'di ltar 'khor bcas rgyal po'i khab nas byung ba las skye bo'i tshogs kyi 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par ni/ bdag gi snying la nges pa'i blo dag skyes bur gyur// skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas gshegs shul bye ba dang /
15b2: bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad cing skye bo rnams kyi gud la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad pa gcer bu bdag gis mthong nas bsams pa/ 'di ltar dge sbyong gau ta ma bzhin 'dzum pa byed cing skye bo mang ba'i gung la 'dug pa las na
15b3: sems can 'di ma shi bar des so snyam nas/ des khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la smras pa/ khyim bdag sems can skal ba chung ngu 'di ni mgi'o// des smras pa/ 'phags pa de ltar gur na skabs 'di la de ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag
15b4: bo ni bslab pa'i bzhi yang dag par blangs ba yin gyis/ khyod nyid shes par gyis shig/ des bung shing bcer te chung ma'i ro mi'i phung po'i nang du bcug ste bsregs pa dang / de'i lus thams cad tshig na lte'i nyen kor de bzhin du 'dug go// de nas lte'i nyen kor
15b5: derdordol nas pad ma byung ste/ pad ma'i de'i snying po las gzhon nu gzugs bzang pa blta na sdug pa/ mdzes pa zhig byung ngo // de srog chags brgya stong dag gis mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtshar chen po skyes par gyur pa dang gcer bu ba dag gi rgyags pa dang / nga rgyal dang
15b6: khengs pa dag nyams so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gzhon nu long shig/ des gcer bu ba'i gdong du bltas pa dang / des smras pa/ khyim bdag me phud rab tu 'bar ba'i nang du zhugs can
15b7: thams cad kyi thams cad du rig par me 'gyur ram/ de skad smras pas des mablangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nus gsas la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed gzhon nu long shig/ des bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas
15b8: ma yin napas ma yin par bdag mi bskos kyis thang ngo snyam nas de the tsom med par me phung gi nang du bzhugs te blangs so/ / rgyal ba'i bka' yis me yi phung por bzhugs gyur te/ de yis gzhon nu me yi nang nas blangs pa na/ rgyal ba'i mthu yis me ni zhi ba nyid gur

16a1: cing kha ba'i tshogs ltar bsil ba 'ang skad cig de la byung / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'tsho byed gzhon nu la bka' stsal pa/ 'tsho byed khyod nyams pa 'am/ gnod pa dag tu mgyur tam/ ngas gsol pa/ btsun pa pa dag rgyal po'i ba brang du btsas zhing rgyal
16a2: po'i pho brang du skyes par gyur kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zhugs kyi phung po can danas mchog pa lta bur bsil bar gyur pa 'di lta bu ni sngon chad ma myong lags so/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la bka' stsal pa
16a3: khyim bdag bzhon nu 'di long shig/ de log par lta ba la phyogs pas re shig len par mi byed cing / gcer bu ba de nyid kyi gdong du lta bar byed do// des smras pa/ khyim bdag mang du smra ci dgos/ mes ni thabs cad 'tshig pa yin na/ gzhon nu shin tu skal ba chung ba 'dis
16a4: tshig pa las na/ 'di khyod kyi khyim du khyer na khyod kyi khyim yang tshig cing khyod kyi srog gi bar chad du yang 'gyur ba nges so// des bdag las gces pa med do snyam nas de ma blangs pa dang / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po sa
16a5: bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po gzhon nu long shig/ des gus par bsgris pa dang / bcas pas lag brkyang ste/ de blangs nas kun du brtags te gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das khye'u 'di'i ming cir gdags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khye'u 'di
16a6: byung ba dang nas skyes pas de'i phyir khye'u ri'i ming me skyes shes bya ba dag dgas so/ / de nas bcom ldan das kyi skye bo phal po che'i tshogs de dag gis bsam pa dang / bgal nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas ci nas kyang sems can brgya phrag mang po de dag gis thos
16a7: nas khyad par snyed par gyur pa de lta bur chos bstan pa mdzad pas kha cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/ kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba 'bras bu/ kha cig gis ni rab du byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad gas
16a8: bas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas par gyur to/ / kha cig gis ni dro bar gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / kha cig gis ni rtse mo dang / kha cig gis ni bzod pa chung ngu dang 'bring ba skyed par gyur to// kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang

16b1: chub dang / / kha rig gis ni bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed par gyur to// kha cig gis ni skyibs su 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhidag ya dag par blangs te 'khor de dag las ngal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / dge
16b2: 'dun la 'bab par gyur to/ / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying pos khye'u me skyes mam brgyang po pang na ba tsho ba'i mam gnyis dang / nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang / dri ma'i byi ba'i mam gnyis dang / rtse grogs kyi ma ma gnyis la rjes su gtad do// dmam brgyar
16b3: po dag gis 'o ma dang / zho dang / mar dang / zhun mar dang / mar gyi snying gu dang / gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtsa bo dag gis srid par byed bskyed par byed cing / rdzing na gnas pa'i pad ma bzhin du myur du bskyed par byed do// de'i zhang po zong thogs te yul gzhan du
16b4: song ba des ji ltar bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u ra skye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur nas/ de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas
16b5: dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/ / zhes lung bstan pa thos nas des zong brgyur te rin blangs nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ba dang / des 'di ltar bdag gi sring mo de 'chi ba'i dus la bab bo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis debe bu
16b6: khye'u daskye bar 'gyur te/ rigs 'bar bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi dpal yang myong bar gyur nas nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
16b7: bka' stsal pa/ de brdzun du ma gyur tam snyam nas des khyim tshes dag la dris pa/ bdag gi sring mo la sems can zhugs par gyur ba de bcom ldan 'das kyi khye'ur 'gyur te/ rigs 'bang bar 'gyur zhing / lha dang mi'i dpal yang myang bar gyur nas nga'i bstan
16b8: pa la rab du byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// zhes lung bstan par thos so// thos nas bdag kun tu dga' ba las de yang mchi ying dris labab po zhes thos na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de brdzun

17a1: dra mgyur tam/ de dag gis tshigs su bcad ba smras pa/ zla bskar ma'i tshogs bcas sa la srung yang srid// sa 'di dang nags bcas mkha' la 'gro yang srid// rgya mtsho chen po'i rgan skam par 'gyur srid kyi// drang srong chen po brdzun gsung
17a2: 'gyur ba srid pa min/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ni brdzun mi 'gyur te 'di ltar khyim bdag des de rjes rje sar 'chi ra 'gyur bdes / de ltar byas pas 'chi ba'i dras la babanas da / kyi 'ad bang can yin par bsregs kya mtshigs ma
17a3: tshe zhig da star rgyal po'i pho brang na gso zhing 'dug go zhes smras pa dang / dbyem bdag shin tu bzang po'i gan du song ste smras pa/ khyim pa dgacod ces mi rigs pa zhig byas so// ci zhag byas/ gcer bu bas bslus nas khyod kyis nga'i sring mo la sems can 'ag
17a4: 'dzal ji ltar 'chi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byas pas 'chi ba'i dus la bab par byas so/ / de'i khye'u dbang thang can mau bsregs kyang mchog pa mthu bo che'i gad ltar rgyal po'i pho brang na gso yin 'dug pa de la ni re shig ci byar yang med de/ 'di ltar nga yang /
17a5: gas te gzhon nu de blangs na de stan legs/ 'on te mi len nangs khyod gnyen du yang mi brtsi/ rabs yig kyang dor shing lam po cha dang srang dang lam gyi sum mdo dang / gzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin du bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/ chung ma gso
17a6: ba 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'i zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing rgyal ba'i gnang pa yang byed du gzhug go nas smras pa dang / des da thos nas skrag ste/ de skad smras pa dang sbyang na ba dag la de ltar byed par des so snyam nas de rgyam po'i gan du sod te/ nang
17a7: gnyis sa phyag 'tshas nas smras pa/ bdag gi dug pathaMd nas yang gas te gzhan du dang man stan lags/ 'on ma nanas khyod nyen du yang m-i ts+yai/ phas leg do shing / lam pa cha dang / srang dang mas kyi sum ma do dang / gnas/
17a8: xxx/ xxx

17b1: rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag ga nod du pa skye sa ngapa khyod pa blangs pa ma yin gyi/ bcom ldan 'ad kyis nga la gtang ba yin pas khyod pags te gzhon du dgos na gnon na da du btsam ldan 'das la sngar zas shig/ des bldan 'ad na
17b2: sngar song nas zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag gi nye du ba'i mchid nas da yang gal te gzhon nu bangs na de stan legs/ 'on te mi len na das khyod gnyen du yang mi rtsi/ rabs yig kyang ngo shing sa
17b3: bo che dang / srang dang lam gyi sum mdo dang / gzhi mdo dag tu yang khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos bdag gi sring mo bsad de/ chung ma bsod pa 'di la sus kyang gtam 'dre bar mi bya'o zhes mi snyan pa bsgrag cing / rgyal po'i gnod pa yang byed du gzhug go zhes mchi
17b4: bas/ de'i slad du gzhon nu me skyes bdag la stsal ba'i rigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis gal te khyim bdag shin du bzang po gzhon nu me skyes mthob na khrag tshab spyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par gzigs
17b5: nas tshe dang ldan bkun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo song la rgyal po gzugs can snying po la da'i bkas a rog kyi zhes byos la 'di skad ces po chen po khyim bdag shin tu bzang po la gzhon nu ma skyes byin cig/ gal te khyim bdag
17b6: shin du bzang po gzhon nu me skyes ma thob na khrag chab skyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro zhes kyang sgo shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' ba zhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi
17b7: bka mnyan nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod la rgyal po chen po a rog tu zhes bka' phrul te/ rgyal po chen po khyim pa
17b8: shin tu bzang po la gzhon nu me skyes byin cig/ gal te khyim bdag shin tu bzang po gzhon nu me skyes mthob na khrag chabaspyugs nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs de lta bu yod par 'gyur ro/ zhes kyang bka' stsal te// 6

18a1: pos smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' babacom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis jis dpaka' stsal pa de bzhin 'tshal lo// tsha dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rgyal po chen pa ma ro// khyags smras
18a2: song / / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyis bdag gzhan nu 'di ngas bskyed de yid du 'ong zhing sdug pa yin pas dam tshig bcas la sbyin par bya ste/ nyis ri la yang dus gsum gsum dung ba lta pa'i phyir gtong na smin par 'o//
18a3: smras pa/ lha khyod kyi spyan sngar mi gtad na gzhan su 'thad du btang por bgyi/ gtang bar 'tshal lo// rgyal pos de rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te glang po che la bkyon nas gtang ngo // 'di ltar 'jig rten pa rnams kyi kun tu spyod pa ni ji
18a4: skad du ba gson pa de srid du bu'i ming mi sgrogs so/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag shin tu bzang po 'chi ba'i dus byas nas gzhon nu me skyes pa'i khyim na gnas par gyur te/ de sangs rgyas la mngon par dang / chos dang / dge
18a5: 'dun la mngon par dang / sangs rgyas la skyabs su song / chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ngo // des khyim bdag shin tu bzang pos phyogs gdung bdag gi ma bsad pa'i phyogs der gtsug lag khang rtsig tu bcu gnas yo byad thams
18a6: cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar te phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul nas 'di ltar gnas brtan dag gis kyang mdo sde dag la bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na dku mnyed pa'i tshal na bzhugs so nye bar sbyar to/ / khyim bdag shin tu bzang
18a7: po'i mi zho shas 'tsho ba yul gzhan du dong pa dag gis khyim bdag shin tu bzang po ni 'chi ba'i dus la bab bo/ gzhon nu me skyes ni rang gi khyim na gnas te/ de sangs rgyas la mngon par dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dang /
18a8: sangs rgyas la skyabs su song chos dang dge 'dun la skabs su song ngo zhes thos so// thos nas kyang de dag gis tsan dan sa mchog pa'i lhung bzed cig rin po che dag gis bkang ste khyim bdag me skyes la skyes su bkur ro// des kyang

18b1: de shing ring po'i rtse mo la brtags te gzhag nas/ 'di skad ces 'di sus kyang skas dang / ya gar dang / kyo ba tang dag gis blang bar mi bya'i/ 'di ltar dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang dag rdzu 'phrul chab 'am/ mthu che ba de dag las 'ga' zhig gis len na des ni
18b2: 'di ci bder khyer la dag gzhes dril bsgrags pa yang byas so/ / gzhan mu stegs can rnams nang bar sngar langs nas chu dogs dag tunye ga byed du 'dod pa de dag gis mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang khyim bdag se skyes la smras pa/ khyim bdang / 'di ci yin
18b3: des de dag la rgyas par bsnyad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams la mngon par dad pas de dganyi nar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas dong ngo // ji tsam na dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag rgyal po'i khab tu bsod
18b4: snyoms la zhugs pa de dag gis de mthong nas de dag gis kyang khyim bdag me skyes la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des de dag la de kho na bzhin du rgyas par bsnyad pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis yon tan ni bcab par bya/
18b5: skyon ni bsgrag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal na/ ji lhung bzed tsam gyi chad du bdag nyid bstan par bya'am zhes smras nas dong ngo // ji tsaman tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs stobs bcu pa de phyogs der 'ongs te/ khyim bdag la smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci yin/ des ji lta
18b6: ba yin pa smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu pas bsams pa/ bdag gis thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsags pa'i nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams spangs shing por la bsal cing sbyang ba byas na khyim bdag gis bdag mu stegs can dang rdzu 'phrul 'gran
18b7: par chad kyis de'i byir 'di'i yid mgu bar bya'o snyam nas/ des lag pa glang po che'i sna lta bur brkyang ste lhung bzed de blangs nas res de khyer te gtsug lag khang du song ngo // de la dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod kyi tsan danas mchog pa'i lhung
18b8: bzed 'di ga las mchis/ des ji ltar gyur pa brjod pa dang / dge slong dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan khyod lhung bzed tsam gyi ched du khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan du rung ngam/ de tshe dang ldan pa dag rung yang bla mi rung yang bA ste byas zin pas da ci byar

19a1: yang med do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis khyim pa'i mdun du rdzu 'phrul rnam par bstan par mi bya'o// rnam par ston na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur//
19a2: ro/ gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi po gser las byas pa dang / dngul las byas pa dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa dang / shel las byas pa dang / gzhan yang lhung bzed rnam pa bzhi por gan dang / zangs dang / khar ba dang / shing las byas pa dag las 'di ltar lhung bzed
19a3: snga ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni ma blangs pa yang blang bar mi bya la/ blangs pa yang gtang bar bya'o// lhung bzed phyi ma bzhi po gang dag yin pa de dag ni ma blangs pa ni blang bar mi bya zhing spangs pa na sman por du longs spyod pas spyad par bya ba yin no// 'di ltar lcags dang /
19a4: sa'i lhung bzed gnyis ni byin gyis brlab tu rung ba dag yin no// de nas dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag me skyes lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur na// rgyal po'i khab dang / tsam bdag gi bar na sho gam gyi gnas shig yod pa de'i sho gam pa 'chi ba'i dus la bab nas de
19a5: gnod sbyin 'dug pa zhig tu skyes pa dang / des bu'i rmi lam du 'di skad ces bu khyod kyis gnas 'dir gnod sbyin gyi rten du 'jugs su chug la der dril yar gyis la/ thogs shig dang / gang gi tshe der su dag zong las sho gam mi 'jal bar 'gro bar byed pa de'i tshe dril
19a6: de sgra'i byin par byed cing / de dag phyir ldog pa las sho ga mchod par 'gyur ro// zhes bstan to// des gnyen shes dang / nye du dang / rtsa lag dag la rmi lam de bzlas nas nyi ma dang / tshes grangs dang / yud tsam dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar dang / dus shis ba la bab pa'i tshe gnas
19a7: der gnod sbyin gyi rten 'dzugs su btsug nas der dril yang byas te btags so/ / grong khyer tsam pa na bram ze zhig gis rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs pa dang / bram ze mo des bsams pa/ bdag bram zes thabs de dang de dag gis bsgrubs pa'i nor dag spyod
19a8: cing las ci yang mi byed par 'dug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no snyam nas/ de tshong dus su song ste/ ras bal nyos nas sel gyis zhag par byas shing bkal te tha ga pa mkhas pa la kar sha ba Ni stong ra pa'i ras zung cig 'thag tu bcug go/ de nas nges

19b1: bram zes smras pa/ ras zung 'di kar sha ba Na stong rab lags kyis/ cheng dus su bzhud la gang dag kar sha ba Na stong gis 'jal ba la ni stsol cig/ gal te des mi 'jal na tshod 'dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags nas gzhan du bzhud par/
19b2: mdzod cig/ des de khyer te tshong 'dus su song ba na kar sha ba Na stong gis nyo ba su yang med nas/ des tshong 'dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags te/ ras zung de gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang du bcug ste 'dron padag dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu song ngo // rnga tsam na rim gyis sho
19b3: gam gi gnas su byin pa dang / sho gam pas 'dron pa de dag la sho gam bcad pan de dag gis sho gam phul nas dong ngo // de na dril sgra 'byin par byed nas sho gam bdag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag dril 'di ltar sgra 'byin pa las na 'dron pa dag gis sho gam legs
19b4: bar ma phul gor ma chag gis/ yang sho gam bcad do zhes de dag gis 'dron pa dag yang phyir bkug ste btsal na sho gam ma dul ba 'ga' yang med do// de dag dong ba dang yang dril sgra 'byin par nyid du byed nas/ de dag gis 'dron pa dag yang phyir bkug ste btsal
19b5: na sho gam ma phul ba 'ga' yang med par gyur nas/ 'dron pa dag ded la khyed cag chom po byed par sems sam/ cin yang dang yang du phyir 'gugs par byed ces smod par byed do// de dag gis 'dron pa de dag choms gnyis su byas te bkya ba dang / choms gang gi nang na
19b6: bram ze ni med par dag ni de bzhin dong ngo / / tshams gcig shos 'dod pa na dris de de bzhin du sgra 'byin byed napa de dag gis de kyang shi/ du tshams gnyis su byas shing byas shing bkye ba dang / tha mar bram ze de gcig pu nye na lus par gyur nas deng dag gis ba nga
19b7: ngas bdag la chung zad kyang med kyis tsho la cig ces smras pa dang / de dag gis btsal na ci yang med nas btang ba na yang dril de sgra 'byin pa nyid du byed do// de dag gis bram ze de yang phyir bkug nas smras pa/ kye bram ze lha'i byin gyi rlabs ni de ltar gyur na khyod bden par
19b8: smros shig dang / kho bo cag khyod la sho gam mi len to// des smras pa/ bden par mi len tam/ de dag gis smras pa/ mi len to// des gdugs kyi rtsa ba'i nang nas ras zung de phyung ste bstan to// de dag kye ma lha'i byin gyi rlabs ni 'di 'dra'o nas ngo mtshar chen po

20a1: skyes par gyur nas/ de dag gis de'i ras ya gcig rtse ste lha lagana'o// bram zes smras pa/ kye khyed cagan gogams len to zhes zer na thams cad 'brog gas/ de dag gis spras pa/ bras zed da cag lan par mi byed do//
20a2: lha'i byin gyis rlabs de lta bu mdzad pas ded kyis skal bstan par rab kyis long la so dashig/ des de blangs nas yang gdugs kyi bya ba'i nang du bcugs song nas khang kyis rgyal po'i khab tu byin to// des tshong dus su ngas zung de 'gram pa na der yang
20a3: kar sha pa Na stong gis nyo ba su yang med nas des rgyal po'i khab kyi tshod 'dus kyang tshod 'dus ma yin no zhes bsgrags so/ / de na gzhon nu me skyes gra yo che la zhon te rgyal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ste/ tshed 'dus kyi nang nas rang gi khyim du 'gro bas dngos
20a4: bdang / des shes ldan dag bram ze de ci'i phyir tshod 'dus ma yin no zhes sgrogs par byed badri bar byan pos shig/ de dag gis bos nas ma skyes kyis smras pa/ bram ze khyod ci'i phyir tsheng 'dus 'di tshong 'dus ma yin no zhes sgrogs par byed/
20a5: des smras pa/ khyim bdag ras zung 'di lta bur kar sha ba ta stong gis nyo ba su yang sed pa'i phyir ro// des smras pa/ bltas/ khyer te shog/ des de nye bar bstan to// me skyes kyis smras pa/ bram ze de tsam ni ri mod kyi 'on kyang ras gcig ni spyad zin bzhig
20a6: gcig ni ma spyad pazhig bas ma sbyad pa gang yin pa 'di ni kar sha ba Na lnga brgya ri/ gang spyad pa 'di ni nyis brgya lnga bcu ri'o// bram zes smras pa/ ci 'di de lta bur 'gyur ram/ sa skyes kyis spras pa/ bram ze khyod kyi mngon sum du bstan gyis
20a7: ltos nig ces des ma spyad pa de steng gi nam mkha' la bor ba dang / de rkyang nyid 'dug go// spyang pa bor ba na de mthag phyir lhung ngo // bram ze ngo mtshar skyes de smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod ni rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba zhig go// me skyes kyis yang ltos shig ces
20a8: smras nas des ma spyad pa gang yin pa de tshor ma'i steng du bor na ma thogs par song ngo / / gcig shos de bor na tsher ma la thogs nas bram ze de ngo mtshar chen po des mngon par dang bar gyur nas smras pa/ khyim bdag blo ni rdzu 'brul che ba mthu che bzhig pas rjod

20b1: rin ji tsam gyis bzhed pa de tsam gyis snoms shig/ des smras pa/ bram ze khyod 'gro na yin gyis khyod nyid la mchod par bya ba'i phyir kar sha pa Na sto nga nyid sbyin par bya'o zhes des de la kar sha ba na sto byin pa dang bram ze des blangs nas so ngo / me skyes kyis de
20b2: dag las gang spyad pa ni khye'u zhig la byin/ ma spyad pa ni khrus ras su byas so// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi thog ma na blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing 'dug pa'i tshe me skyes kyi khrus ras khar ba'i steng
20b3: du skam du bcug pa rlung gis nam mala' la khyer nas/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i steng du lhung ba dang rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po la 'os pa'i gos 'di lta bu ga las 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha rgyal po de las nu byung ba'i tshe ni dgu
20b4: bdun du rin po che'i char bab zo zhes thos na/ lha la yang na bza'i char bab pa las na ring po mi thogs par rin po che'i char 'bab par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag me skyes lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar 'gyur ro zhes
20b5: lung bstan la/ 'di yang lha'i gos nam mkha' las 'ongs pa zhig na de 'ongs dang sbyin par byas zhog shig ces bsgo'o// de dag de skad smra ba'i tshe nyid na sa dang me skyes 'ongs pa dang / rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang mi'i dpal
20b6: yang myong bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan la/ ngal yang lha'i gos nam mkha' las lhung ba 'di lta bu yod kyis de khyod khyer cig/ des lag pa brkyang ste smras pa/ wAg yar snga brim gyis tshur sum zhes brtags na ji tsam na bdag gi khrus ras yin par mthong
20b7: nas cung zad pagang de smras pa/ lba 'didag gi khrus ras bser mas 'tshal nas 'ding mchis pa lags so// rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nung byed kyis lha dang mi'i dpal myong bar 'gyur tam/ lba myong bar gyur to// gzhon nu ga te de stan tso byed rgyan len par
20b8: byed lha spyan 'dren to sod la yo byad gi zhal ta dag shoms shig/ lha gang gis lha dang mi'i dpal yang myong bar gyur pa la zhal ta bgyi ce 'tshal mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag zhal ta bkyi du mchi'o// rgyal po me skyes kyi khyim du song nas bud med kyi 'khor gyi ba dag mthong ba

21a1: rang / dbang po dag phyir glon par byed do// me skyes kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du dbang po dag slar glon par mdzad/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu mna' ma yin pas de ltar byas so// lha snam blangs ma lags te/ 'di ltar bud med kyi 'khor
21a2: rtsi bdag lags so/ / de ngo mtshar chen po skyes nas yang bud med kyi 'khor bar ma dag mthong ba dang / dbang po dag phyir ljon par byed do// me skyes kyis de bzhin du dris pa dang rgyal pos kyang de bzhin smras so// me skyes kyis spras pa/ lha 'di dag kyang snam
21a3: zungs ni ma lags te/ 'di ltar bud med kyi 'khor bar ma dag lags so// de ngo mtshar chen po lhag par skyes so// rgyal pos de'i bar sgo'i phyogs rin po che'i rang bzhin las gyur brjid chus gang ba lta bu de nanya dag zlab 'dra ba'i 'khrul 'a'od kyi skyong pa byas pa
21a4: dag mthong ste/ nang du 'gro bar 'dod nas lha ma dag dpung par brtsams pa dang / me skyes kyis smras pa/ lha ci'i slad du chags dag bsil bar mdzad/ des smras pa/ gzhon nu tshul 'bog par bya ba'i phyir ro// me skyes kyis spras pa/ lha 'di chab ma lags
21a5: chab lta bur gda' ba ni rin po che'i sa gzhi lags so/ / des smras pa/ gzhon nu nya rgyu ba dag 'di ltar snang ngo // lha 'khrul 'khor gyi sbyor ba las de dag rtsu bar gda'o// rgyal po yid mches pa dang / des sor gdub rgya 'phangs pa na s+sa kA la la zer te rin po
21a6: tshe'i sa gzhi'i sted du 'jol bar gyur nas/ de ngo mtshar skyes te nang du song nas seng ge'i khri la 'dug go/ mna' ma dag rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du lpags pa de dag mchi ma byung nas rgyal pos smras pa/ gzhon nu ci'i phyir mna' ma 'di dag du/
21a7: smras pa/ lha 'di dag dubam lags te/ 'di ltar lha'i na batha' la shing gi dud pa'i dri gda' bas des 'di dag mchi mthung bar gyur to// rgyal po lha dang mi'i dpal de dag la nye bar spyod cing phyir mi ldog pa na/ rgyal po'i bya ba dang rgyal po'i byed pa dag
21a8: yongs su nyams par gyur nas gzhon nu ma skyes dgra la blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu lha ni me skyes kyi khyim du gshegs nas bag ma mchis par gyur gyis bzhud la sbron cig/ de song nas smras pa/ lha khyod 'dir gshegs te bzhugs par

21b1: mdzad dam ci/ blon po rnams kyi mchid nas rgyal po'i bye ba dang / byed pa dag yongs su nyams par gyur to zhes mchi'o// des smras pa/ gzhon nu ci khyod kyis zhag gcig tsam rgyal srid byed du 'jug kyang mi nus sam// des smras pa/ lha dag gis
21b2: ni lus dgung bdun lags par 'tshal na/ lhas ni dgung gcig legs par mkhyen pa lta/ rgyal pos me skyes kyi gdong du brtags te smras pa/ gzhon nu bden nam/ lha mang de dgung bdun kho na lags so// 'on nyin mtshan ji ltar shes/ lha me to/
21b3: dag kha 'bye zhing 'dzums pa dang / nor bu dag gi 'od 'bar ram/ mi 'bar ba dang / b+ha dag skad 'byin tam mi 'byin pa'i tshul las gad/ me tog gang dgung pa la 'bye zhing gdugs la zhum par 'gyur ba yang mchis/ gang dag gdugasal kha 'phye
21b4: zhing dgung la zhum par 'gyur ba yang mchis/ nor bu gang dag dgung la 'bar zhing gdugs la mi 'bar ba yang mchis/ gang dag gdugs la 'bar zhing dgung la mi 'bar ba yang mchis/ bya gang dag dgung la skad 'byin cing gdugasal mi
21b5: 'byin pa yang mchis/ gang dag gdugs la skad 'byin bcing dgud la skad mi byin pa yang mchis so// rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes nas smras pa/ gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das ni phyin ci ma log par gsung ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod ji ltar
