41b2: pa de mthong nas lta zhing shes ldan dag rgyal po 'dis 'di lta bu'i mchod rten chen po byed du gzhug par brtsams pa nam tsam zin par 'gyur ma shes so zhes 'phya bar brtsams pa dang / de la lag gi blas smras pa/ kI'i nang rje ci 'phyir 'phra bar byed/ gal te mi nus na las
41b3: bya ba thod shing / de cang mi smra bar bdug pa dang / lag gi bla des de phyir dbyung bar brtsams so// des de la bzod pa gsol na yang las bya bar brtsams pa na mchod rten de ma zin nas de par 'phya bar brtsams pa dang / lag gi blo des phyir byung ngo // yang shin tu 'bad de bzod pa
41b4: gsol nas las bya bar brtsams pa dang / de tsam na mchod rten blta bas mi ngoms pa srog chags 'bum phrag mang po dag gi mig dang yid 'phrog par byed pa zhig zin par gyur to// de nas gla mi des de mthong nas 'di ltar las byed pa na bdag gis 'di la 'byas pa ni ma legs pa
41b5: zhig byas so zhes 'gyod pa skyes nas 'di la rnam pa thams cad du mchod pa bya'o zhes des de'i gla rngan ci thob pa de las gser gyi dril bu byed du bcug nas sems mngon par dad pas mchod rten de la btags so/ / dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na gla mi gang yin pa de ni dge slong
41b6: snyan pa bzang ldan 'di nyid yin te/ des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'kho rab 'jig gi mchod rten gyi las byed pa na 'byas pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas ni mdog ngan zhing lus chung bar skyes so// yang dad pa skyes nas gser gyi
41b7: dril bu byed du bcug nas mchod rten la btags pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des ni skad snyan par gyur to/ / de nas yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang
41b8: ldan pabasnyan pa bzang ldan gyi sa las ci zhig bgyis na des tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad sgras khyab por gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rigs kyi bu snyan pa bzang ldan nyid kyi sa las tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas 'bras bu dag

42a1: tu 'gyur ba nyid ces bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no/ / dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshal nyi khri thub pa na ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa
42a2: bde gshegs pa/ 'jig rten ma byin pa/ skyes pa 'dul kha'i sbyi thun medapa/ skang marnams kyi rton pa/ sang sa rgyas bcom ldan 'dapa' spyang nga rten byas/ de badz+ra m+b+hi nga sring smra ba dgas kyi gnas shes nyin
42a3: d+ha/ id drang srong smra'i bar nam chi ging ldan pa zhig yod pa das b+ha kaukail po ni ga gnas pa des gang gi sa sa rgyas bcom ldan das 'di snang ra/ sIng bas stoms la gshegs pa de'i tshad la gon rtog cing sgra snyan pa rgyad par can byung nas
42a4: bzhin du yang dang yang du bsdus pas sems tshim par gyur nas dang ba skyes so/ / des dus gzhan niganan 'byin pa cing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungadal lan gsum bskor babyas nas dga' ba dang bde basbyis te a mra'i gang sngon pa 'i
42a5: la 'dug go/ / 'dug ma thag tu bya khwa zhig gis srog dang bral te 'chi ba'i dus byas nas las drug sa mkhas pa'i bram na zhig tu skyes so// dge slong dag de'i cha de'i dus na byaka ka la gang yin pa de ni dge slong snyan pa bzang ldan 'ad nyid yin te/ des yang
42a6: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la sgra snyan pa phyung ste bskong ba byas pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad sgras khyab par gyur to/ / de nas yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/ the tsom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas med/
42a7: nadas la nus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa snyen pa bzang ldan gyis las kyi zhig byes nas de rnam par smi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gan sa rab tu byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra btsam pa nyid mngon su dus kyis te bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang gastan/
42a8: brnams kyi mchog tu bstan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ni sngon lam gyi dbang gis te/ gang du smon 'am bta cen/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung de nyid kyi gsung rabal dge slong zhig btu byung bar gyur pa de bcom ldan

42b1: 'das 'od srung gi skad kyi gtang gastan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ / den 'dis kyang che ji srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang mtho nas de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i tshe 'di skad ces bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang
42b2: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar tshe rje srid par tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang mthob ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis/ bram ze'i khye'u tham
42b3: la bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa
42b4: t hams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed cing ji ltar mkhan po 'di bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis skad kyi gtang rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das des
42b5: skad kyi gtad rag snyan pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces btab pas smon lam de'i dbang gis da ltar nga'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te ngas dge slong skad kyi gtang dag snyan
42b6: pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan to/ / dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge slong khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// sangs rgyas bcom
42b7: ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / ji tsam na dge slong dag chos 'don pa nyid na rgya shug gi 'bras bu'i tshegs gtor ba bzhin 'don la/ mu stegs can rnams ni skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhu
42b8: 'don to/ / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun tu spyod pa ni nang par sngar langs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'gro'o// des mu rtogs can rnams skad kyi gtang rag gis gzhung 'don pa thos nas des bsams pa/ ma stegs

43a1: zhan kyi na rnas pa yin yang 'di dag skad kyi rkang gags gzhung do pa/ bdag gang dgas pa rnam pa gdung na din tu thug ga 'alus tshogs gtang yan 'das dag ga byangs
43a2: ma sa/ de com ldan 'dasags pa da yongs phyin nas bcom ldan das kyi 'bas gnyis pa pagosas rgyag la ma gcig tu jugag/ cigs dug nas kyim ga ga da sa sbyin gyis tsham ldan nas sa
43a3: xxx/ xxx
43a4: tshogs sa bzhin 'don pas de lagal te bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa rnams kyang shA kyig dngagagis gdung 'don 'gadang na legs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyim bdag ma gon mang mas sbyin la cang me gsung bas gan /
43a5: kyi da mgron sa sa kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi yang migang bas gan yarang riganas/ som ldan 'dang kyi pa sa gnyis sa mags phyag 'tshal das bcom ldan 'das kyi spya sa nas sang na sa na da kyis de/ ma
43a6: dge slong dag de sa bas na khyed kyis skad kyi gtang rag gis chos 'ang napar gnang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyigang kyi gtang ga gis chos gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams skad kyi gtang dag gis lung 'bog par byed/ 'don pa /
43a7: byed// bton byed/ yongs su 'a bar byed do// detsam na gyis bdag sa gon med zas sbyin rgyal bye kyi tsham du song pa thos nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag byed kyaganag ga di la mkhan gyi tha ta bas/ skabs dpas
43a8: rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan das kyis pa 'phrul pa/ dge so gas rkad kyi ta dag gis lung ga ra gyi/ gdon pa bya// nyon gyisangs su 'dir mi bya'o// di ga stan pa'i yan na dgapa na

43b1: ba dang / rgyun chags gsum pa gdan pa dag ni gad kyi gtang rag gis gdon par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang dag gis de dag gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / gnon nu zhig skad kyi gtang rag mi shes nas/ des ba'ang dag ston pa
43b2: nyid na hU~M shug ga 'bras bu'i tshogs gtor ba bzhin ston par gyur nas/ dge slong dag gi smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis skad kyi gtang dag gnang gis skad kyi gtang rag gis than cig/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis skad kyigs
43b3: rag mi shes so/ / skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skad kyi gtang dag bslab par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi skad kyigata ga mar 'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong
43b4: rnams byams dang / gnas khang dang / sgo yang dag nad kyi gang gdang/ rdzo pa byed pan/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gtsug lag yang du 'ongs pa dang / des thos nas sA la/ 'phags pa dag gtsug lag khang 'dis mamanabrang nim
43b5: lags na/ khyed kyisang dung yang rol mamakhan dag ma bta ngam/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dben 'i phyogs su skad kyi gtang dag dag bslab par bya'o// ngas N+Das/
43b6: som than da tha yod rtam gA ca bye tsha don med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig 'greng ste lung bzed kyi snod nas ltung bzed byin pa dang / dge slong dag gi/ de la smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bgreng ste ltung bzed ma byi cig/
43b7: deb smras pa/ ci nyes/ de dag gis smras pa/ lhung bzed de chags par 'gyur modaganan ci nyes par 'gyur/ de cang mi smra bar 'drag pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
43b8: dag slo gas bgreng sa srung zed dbyung bar mi bya'o// de bzhin drugazhug pa dang / bzlab dang / gas pa dag la yang rgya cher skyeng bar bya// sdom pa/ lam tha nad ni stong gsus dang / phying dra bang byi dang / gding bdang ni mi bral ba/ drang sa na pos rjes pa

44a1: gnang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bre dag na chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ril 'jigs rung gi nags ri dgas cag nam na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe rgyal bu gzhon nu rtogs ldan gyis khang bzangs pad ma can tshon brgya rtsa gcing
44a2: gis bris pa byed du bcug cing ras sa rag tshang ring po can dag gis tshal bar bting ste/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das pang bzangs pad ma can du gshegs par bzhed pa na ma gshegs/
44a3: pa dang / rgyal bu gzhan nu togs ldan gyis smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu rtags ldan gyis ras rnams bsdus pa sa stegs can rnams kyis thos nas de rnams kyi
44a4: smras pa/ shes ldan dag dge slong gau ta ma ni bkur sti de lta bu'i gnas ma yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal te bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang pa can
44a5: dag gis lam phran dag tu yang ras sar gabatsang ri can dag gti zhing 'phags pa dag bdag cag la thugs rtse ba'i slad du gshegs su gsol zhes zer na/ mu stegs can rnams zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir mi rtag pa nyid yid la byabs zil gyis gnan
44a6: cing 'dod par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngan spong gi bu dag na chu srin byis pa bsod kyi ril 'jigs rung gi nags ri dgas kyi gnas na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig lhung bzed lag na thogs te song pab dang / de
44a7: phyogs gzhan zhig tu bsgyel nas ltung ba med des la lhung ste gnas de'i bar chad du gyur pa'i ska bas de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis lhung bzed la gnab kur
44a8: par mi bya bar spyang bzed kyi snod du btsug ste bkur bar bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis ljang bzed lag na bkrar bar mi bya bar lhung bzed kyi gnod du bcug ste bkur bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang / dge slong rnams ldang bzed

44b1: kyi snod du bcug ste lag pa nyid na khyer te 'dod pa na nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhung bzed kyi snod lag na bkur bar mi bya bar lung thag
44b2: btags te mchan khung gis bkur bar bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams don 'thun dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo // ji tsam na bram ze zhig
44b3: na nas de sman pa'i gan du song ste smras pa/ kye bdag nyid chen po kho bo'i nad kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sman ston cig/ des smras po/ jo tsa a rur gsol dang snyun gdang sa par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ lam kha 'di na a ru rag la yod/ des smras pa/ bram ze
44b4: shAkya'i sras kyi dge sbyong 'di dag ni mkhas pa lags pas 'di dag la khyod kyis bslangs na 'di dag la mchis par 'gyur gda'o/ / de dge slong rnams kyi drung du song ste/ dris pa/ 'phags pa dag la a ru ra lta mchis sam/ de dag gi smras pa/ bram ze yod
44b5: nade cir dgos/ bdag la sman pa'i mchid nas a rur tshol cig ces mchi na gal te mda' na bdag la stsal du gsol/ dge slong des de'i mdun du lhung bzed kyi sdod phye ba dang / de nyid na spung bu yang 'dug cing / de nyid na dgri'u dang / de nyid na 'breng bu dang / de
44b6: nyid na sman dag 'dug pa bram zes mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed ni kun du spyod pa mi gtsang ba yin te/ 'di 'dra ba zab pas ni bdag shi yang ches bla'i mi gtsang ba za ba ni de lta ma yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
44b7: la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalag / snod gsum btsang bar bya ste// lhung bzed kyi snod dang / sman snod dang / bar bur snod rnams so// dge slong dag gis de dag gi lung thag mnyam par btags pas de dag gis mtshan khung rlobar gyur
44b8: ba dang / ma dad pa dag 'phags pa dag ci khyed rdza rnga thogs te 'gro 'am zhes co 'dri bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyi bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mnyam par gdags par mi bya bar ci rigs par gdags

45a1: bar bya'o/ / dge slong dag gis ras ma phra mo dag btags pas de dag la na bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ngas mazhed chen po dag gdags par bya'o// de dag gis zheng chen po dag btags pa dang de dag nyid zhum
45a2: nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dkyil phying bu dang sbyar te skabs skabs su srubs bya rog rkang dag drub par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan mo dan rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so// dge slong
45a3: zhig gis bying ba zhig rnyed nas des bsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos gsum dras te bcad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal gyis dra'o snyam nas de 'gre'u dang kha ba dag khyer nas shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du song ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyang byong /
45a4: der gshegs te gzigs nas bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'di ci yin/ des gsol pa/ btsun bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos gsum dras te bcad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas bdag gis phyir ba 'di rnyed nas chos gos su 'drab la
45a5: so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa la gus pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na lnga po 'di dag ni dbang ri bya ste/ be'ungs thams cad dang / la ba thams cad dang / phyi ba thams cad dang / 1
45a6: thams cad dang / seng ba thams cad do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs so// dge slong zhig bya ba zhig gi phyir gtsug lag khar gzhan du song ba dang / de rer na ma sros par
45a7: grung nas gnas mal gyi zhal tabyed pas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gnas mal dganos shig/ des smras pa/ bdag gis gang ga khyer te/ ma 'ongs pa/ gnas mal gyi zhal ta byed pas smras pa/ gal te de lta na khri gling banas shig/ des khri gling ba ma
45a8: nam nyal pa dang / de grang ba'i sdug bsngal gyi mnyen bzhin du mtshan mo 'das nas nabar gyur ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gding ba med pa /

45b1: 'gro bar mi bya'o// 'gro na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis gding ba med par 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas de'i nyin kor gyi gtsug lag khang gzhan/
45b2: du 'gro ba dang / 'chag tu 'gro ba dang / grong gzhan du 'gro ba de dag tu yang gding ba khyer ba na gnas brtan rgan po rgas pa nyams chung ba rnams dang / nad pa sbyor mi bzod pa rnams nyam thag par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i
45b3: bsam pas 'gro ba der yang gding ba med par 'gror ma gnang ngo zhes 'khod pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis nyen kor dang nyin mo spyod tu 'gro ba la gding
45b4: ba bkur bar mi bya'o/ / grong gzhan du 'gro ba na deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas 'gro na der kyang bkur bar mi bya'o// dge slong gzhan dag gding ba med par grong gzhan du de nyid ldog pa'i bsam pas/ 'gro ba na de rnams la bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byung nas/
45b5: des nam sros par gyur pa dang / de dag bslab pa la gus pas nu mo phyi dong ba na seng ge dang / stag dang / chom rkun pa dang / g.yon can dag gis bgrod par gyur ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
45b6: 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ gal te de ltar bsams te dor ba dag der nam bros par gyur na nyid du gnas par bya ste/ 'di ltar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag las gding ba brnyas te nyal bar bya'o// gal te rnyed na de la na legs/ gal te ma rnye na
45b7: mgos bzhi sa ba tu byas te bting la yun thung du bal/ yun ring gi nyel bar mtshan po 'da' bar bya'o// dge slong gzhan nig gis dge slong zhig las gding ba brnyas pa dang / del mi la ma gyi gnod pa byung nas ngas mi gtsang bas mdung bar byur ba de bzhin dung sa
45b8: slong de la phyir dbul bar brtsams pa dang / des ma 'dod pa'i skabs de zhes bya ba la sogs pa snga ma bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bkrus te sbyin par bya'o// dge slong des bkus te byin na 'on kyang de len par ma byed pa'i skabs de

46a1: zhes bya ba'i bar du yang snga ma bzhin no/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ri ba'i rin sbyin par bya ba 'am/ de'i sems mgu bar bya'o// dge slong dag gtsug lag khang bzhin dang / grong gzhan dag tu deng nyid phyir ldog pa'i bsam pas
46a2: chos gos gsum po dag med pang dong ba dang / de rnams der dong bdag la ci tsam na bya ba'i rnam pa de lta bu dag byung ste der nam sros par gyur to// de dag bslab pa la gus pas mtshan mo phyir dong ba na seng ge dang / b+ha ga dang chom rkun pa dang / g.yon na
46a3: dag gis bgrod par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te de lta bu'i bsam pas dong ba rnams der nam sros par gyur na de nyid du 'dug par bya zhing tshangs pa mtshungs par
46a4: spyod pa dag las chos gos dag padag te byin gyis brlab par bya'o/ / de rnams chos gos dag brnyas nas ji ltar byin gyis brlab par bya ba ma shes nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ snga ma rang gi sems kyis phyung la byin gyis bslab par bya'o// lnga po 'di dag ni sems
46a5: bskyed pas 'grub ste/ gso sbyong dang / dag gang bye dang / chos gos byin gyis brlab pa dang / chos gos dbyung ba dang / gang zag 'gron du bos pa'o// dge slong de dag gis chos gos dras shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
46a6: bka' stsal pa/ gal te dras shing kha dog ma bskyar bdag rnyed na dras shing kha dog ma bsgyur ba dag byin gyis brlab par bya'o// ji ste kha dog ma bsgyur cing ma dras pa dag rnyed na lhan thabs kyis glan la byin gyis bslab par bya'o// gal te rnyed na de lta na legs/
46a7: gal tam rnyed na de bzhin byin gyis brlabs par bya'o than bya mi ba'i gos la yang byin gyis brlab par bya ste// / 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// dge
46a8: slong dag gcig ga ding pa med par yul gzhan du dang ba dang / der dong ba de rnams 'gyod par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag des chos gos gsum

46b1: dang phral bar ni gsungs kyi/ gding ba dang ni ma yin te/ de lta bas na bsams bzhin du bzhag ste 'gro bar mi bya'o// brjod pa la ni lung ba med do// sdom ni/ chu tshags la ni rnam pazhi dang // sder rnams dang ni gcig tu Ta// go gcig gis ni
46b2: ba dang / sgren mo brus ni byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyas byed kyi chal mgon med nas sbyin gyi kun dga' ban bzhugs sa// sgrol ma nas dag spang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs pa phyag 'tshal ba gnyis shig mnyan
46b3: yod du dong ngo / / de gnyis lam du chu zad nas sgom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa na rdzing bu zhig gi drung du phyin nas de gnyis la gcig gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis myur du chu rtogs shig dang btung ngo // ngas brtag par brtsams pa dang / rdzi
46b4: tsaman chu ma dag par gyur nas des tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ bskal pa 'bum phrag stong dag // gang zhig mthong bar rab dka' bas/ bdag gis chu dag 'thungs nas ni// de nas 'dren pa lta bar bya// gcig shos kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/
46b5: gang zhig sems can rnams la thugs nas thugs rje zhing / srid pa kun lachags pa btan nas spangs gyur pa// de yi bstan mchog 'di la bslab pa blangs pa yis// gro nyid gi sro chags gas par bya min na gang gi chu lung pa don song ngo // gang gis
46b6: ma'athungs pa des ni brtson 'grus brtsams te/ shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du 'dug nas/ de ji srid du lus kyi mthu yod pa de srid du dge ba'i phyogs dag byas shing gang gi tshe lus kyi mthu dang bral ba de'i tshe 'chi ba'i dus labab nas brgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi
46b7: lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ / lha'i bu'am/ lha'i bu mo'i chos nyid ni skyes nas ring po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/ gang nas shi 'bas pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis skyes pa'o// des mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'bos pa dang /
46b8: rtul chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyinang du skyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dang par byas pas skyes par mthong ngo // de nas sngon dge slong lci bu de 'di snyam du se mos te/ gang gi phyir bdag yongs su gnas pa bsten

47a1: te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis bdag yongs su gnas pa ma bsten pa kho nar bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir/ nye bar 'gros
47a2: snyam mo/ / de nas sngon dge slong lha'i bu rna cha gdub kor g.yo zhing dri ma med pa thogs te/ do shal dang se mo dos brgyan pa'i lus kyis lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang / pad ma dang ku mu da dang / pad ma dkar po dang man dA ra ba dag gis thub bka'ang ste kha
47a3: dog shin tu 'das pas mtshan mo la bab pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la me tog dag gis mngon par gtor te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas mtha' cig tu 'dug
47a4: pa dang / 'di ltar sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i kha dog gi mthus rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon dge slong lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su
47a5: chud nas/ gang thos nas sngon dge slong lha'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa da lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang
47a6: dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/ / des bden pa mthong nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gang mdzad pa 'di lta bu ni bdag la phas kyang ma bgyis/ mas kyang ma bgyis/ rgyal pos kyang ma bgyis/ lha rnams
47a7: kyis kyang ma bgyis/ sngon gyi pha mas dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ dge sbyong dang bram ze dag gis kyang ma bgyis/ byams pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / rtsa lag gi tshogs kyis kyang ma bgyis te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/ rus pa'i
47a8: ri dag las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo dag ni bkum/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo dag ni phye/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro dang yi dgas dag nas ni rkang pa phyung/ lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du ni bzhag go zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du

47b1: bad/ yang smras pa/ khyod ma thas pa dras sa pa mang ldad par// da mong gul bgagapa med namasar bldan pa'i// mthong mi 'grang bya zhing pa dag zhes ni/ myang ngan 'das pa'i yul la thob bar byung // shi na ma dag byed ta bdag gis //
47b2: deri byed pa la dag pa'i mig tho cingag// go ya nipa 'phags pa dgyes thob ste// sdug bsngal rgyam tsho'i pha la rgal ba byung // 'gro bang ldam na me nga gas mtshad pa// skye nga na na ci bral pa ga/ srid bsnyeng du mthang ba ga ga// ba pa
47b3: mthong zas bu mchis/ de nas bdu byas dgal rab 'byung bas// zhabs la phyag chal dngas bzlas byur nas// dkri thul g.yas nas yongs su bska byas te// mAM yi 'jig rten mdan phyogs mkha' la sang // danas sngon dge slong lta'i
47b4: bakhe slobs rnyed pa k+ta ba dang / zhing ba la tog 'byor ba lta bu dang / dpa' bo ga yul las rnam par rgyal ba sti bu dang / nad pan thams cad las yongs su thar ba lta ra gyur te/ cha lags gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'odas pa'i cha lugs da
47b5: gyis gi gnas su song ngo / dge slong gcig shos de yang khad kyis mnyan yod du byin to// de nas ltung bzed dang chos gos sa thos byas te/ rkang pa dag bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der seng ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'bas gnyis la cag
47b6: bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nyid kyis dges gro bur du 'ongs pa la dag slong khyod dgazod ga nas 'dir 'angs/ dbyar gang duganas shes yang dag par dga' bas yang dag par dga' bar
47b7: mdzad pa yin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la khyod galas 'dir sa/ dbyung ga du gnas shes yang dag par dga' bar mdza pa dang / des gas la pa/ btsun padag snga byugs nas da zod 'di mchis te/ skyo phyogs su kyang gnas
47b8: gas so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyod la grogs dge slong lta yad dam/ bcom ldan 'das mchis so// de gang sang / des ji ltar byur ba gsol te// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis da'i ma tshigs su bcad dag

48a1: nga yi bstan la ma gus gang / des ni dmathong ci zhig phan/ des ni nga la bltas na yang / mthong ba ma yin mchod pa min// nga yi bslab la gang slob pa'i// dge slong des ni nga mthong ste// shes rab dman pa khyod kyis ni// sangs rgyas mngon sum
48a2: ma mthong ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyid kyi sku las bla gos phye nas yang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ ltos shig dge slong lus 'di la/ gtsang zhing gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// sngon gyi las kyi rnam smin dang / pha dang ma las byung ba'o//
48a3: gang gis chos nyid ma mthong ba// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des mi mthong // gang gis chos nyid mthong gyur pa// de yis thub pa chen po mthong / gzhan yang brtan zhing dge ba'i blo gros can// bslab pa rjes su srung byed pa// de yis dang por nga la ni// gzugs
48a4: kyi sku dang chos skar mthong / bdag nyid chen po 'od srung gi// bslab mtshams 'das pa da rung du// e la'i mngab de klu yi ni// skye gnas dag las mthar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams
48a5: chu tshags mi 'chang ba las gyur gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis chu tshags nye bar gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chu tshags nye bar gzhag par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag chu tshags du yod mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
48a6: bka' stsal la chu tshags ni lnga ste/ chu tshags gu gsum dang bu mtshags kyi'u can dang / ris pa zhabs tshags can dang / sbyangs tshags dang / bsal tshags rnams so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dag
48a7: rab na bzhugs so/ / mnyan yod na dge slong phan tshun zhe 'gras pa gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing dong do// de dag las gcig lan chu tshags yod// gcig shos la ni med do// gang la yod pa des chu btsags te 'thungs pa dang / gad la med pa des smras pa/
48a8: tshe dang ldan pa chu tshags g.yor cig/ des ma ster nas de phongs par 'gyur ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis zhe 'gras pa dang lhan cig ljongs

48b1: rgyu zheng 'gro bar mi bya'o/ / gal te de lta bu'i rkyen cig byung na gcig la cig bzod pa gsol to 'dod par bya'o// 6/ 'dul ba phran tshogs kyi gzhi// // bam po lngag// // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na
48b2: rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so/ / mnyan yod na dge slong gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing dod pa dang / de dag las gcig la ni chu tshags yod/ gcig shos la ni med nas de la des dris pa/ khyod la chu
48b3: chags yod dam med/ des smras pa yod do// sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes ni ma smras so// de dag las gang chu tshags yod pa des ni chu 'thungs pa dang / gang la med pa des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa cu tshags g.yod cig/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan khyod kyis bdag
48b4: lachu chags ni dris kyi sbyin nam mi sbyin ma dris pas ma gus po khyod la kho bos chu tshags ci'i phyir sbyin/ mi sbyin gyis song shig/ des de la ma byin pas daphongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'a/
48b5: kyis bka' stsal ba/ 'gro bar 'dod pa'i dge slong gis gal te chu tshags med na dge slong grogs po la khyod la chu tshags yod dam med dri bar bya'o// gal te yod do zhes zer na bdag la sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya zhing gal te sbyin no zhes zer na 'gro bar bya'i/
48b6: gzhan du na 'gro bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na dge slong gnyis shig ljongs rgyu zhing dong ngo // de dag las gcig la ni chu tshags yod/ gci
48b7: shos la ni med pa dang / gang la med pa des de la dris pa/ khyod la cha tshags yod dam med/ des smras pa/ yod do// dag la g.yang ram mig yang/ g.yor ro// de dag dong ba dang ji tsam na lam kar 'drin ba dag gcig 'ongs nas gang la chu tshags yod pa de'i rtsa
48b8: ba gang yin pade 'dron pa de nyid las grub ste/ de phyir ldog par brtsams pa dang / gcig shos das smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis bdag la chu tshags khas blangs pa g.yor cig/ des smras pa/ de lta na de ni bden na bdag gis chu gtsag pa'i slang

49a1: du byin gyi thams cad kyi thams cad byin pa ni ma yin no zhes des ma byin pas dbongs par gyur ba'i skabs de dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong gangs rtswa
49a2: med pa des dge slong grogs po khyod la chu tshags yod dam med ces dri bar bya'o/ / gal te yod do zhes zer na des ji bdag la sbyin nam mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya'o// gal te sbyin no zhes zer nagal te khyod slar ldog par gyur tam/ gzhan du 'gro bar gyur na sbyin nam
49a3: mi sbyin zhes brjod par bya'o/ / gal te sbyin na zhes zer na 'gro bar bya'i gzhan dun 'gro bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye bar
49a4: 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa chu tshags ma mchis par gtsug lag khang gzhan nam/ grong gzhan du mchir gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor mi gnang ngo // gal te der song nas phongs par mi 'gyur na gnang ngo // sangs rgyas
49a5: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa chu tshags gcig gis gnyis ljongs rgyu zhing mchir
49a6: gnang dam/ nye bar 'khor gal te der song nas phongs par mi 'gyur naganang ngo // btsun chu chags gcig gis mang po rnams sam/ dge 'dun dag/ ljongs rgyu zhing mching gnad dam/ nye bar 'khor gal te der songad nas phongs par mi 'gyur na gan
49a7: btsun pa chu chags ma mchis par chu klung gi 'gram nas mching gnad dam/ nye bar 'khor gnang ste/ mgyogs pa la gal te chu gzhan dang 'dres par ma gyur na n+ya dgrags re re zhing bdag par bya'o// chu gzhan dang 'dres par gyur na
49a8: gang nga gang du len pa de dang der brtag par bya'o/ / mi mgyogs pa la ni 'gram dang 'gram du brtag par bya'o// de la mgyogs pa ni rgyun myur ba'o// mi 'gyogs pa ni rgyun bul ba'o// btsun pa 'gram gyi nye'akhor gang lags/ nye bar 'khor

49b1: mdom gang khor khor yug go/ / btsun pa chab ma btsags shing ma brtags pa 'tshal du gnad dam/ nye bar 'khor mi gnad do// btsun pa chab ma btsags shing brtags pa 'tshal du ga nad dam/ nye bar 'khor mig gis dag go// zhes bya ste/ gnang ngo //
49b2: btsun pa chab brtsags shing brtags pa 'tshal du gnang ngam/ nye bar 'khor gnang ngo // 'on kyang chu rung pa ni lnga ste/ dge 'dun gyis rung ba dang / gang zag gis rung ba dang / chu tshags kyis rung ba dang / chu mig gis rung ba dang / khro na pas rung ba'o// la
49b3: dge 'dun gyis drang ba ni gang dag 'dun 'thun pas bskos pa'i dge slong gis chub tsags par gyur pa ste/ dge 'dun gyis rung ba de la dge slong gis longs spyad bar bya'o//
49b4: gang zag rung ba ni dge slong gang tshul khrims mnyams pa dang / ltab mnyams pa dang / spyod pa mnyams pa dang / 'tsheb ma nyams pas yongs su dag par gyur pa ste/ gang zag gis rung ba de la dge slong gis longs spyad par bya'o// chu tshags kyis
49b5: rang ba ni chu chags gang nam yang ma dag da ma yin pa des btsags pa ste/ btung bar bya'o// chu mig gis drang ba ni 'bab ba'o// khron pas rung ba ni khron pa gang gi chu dag pa de las nyi ma rlung bkar blangs nas ji srid nyi ma shar gyi bar du ste/ khron pas
49b6: rung ba'i chub tung bar bya'o/ / dge slong rnams ha cang yun ring du chu tog pas 'khrul ba mthong bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang drug gi shing rta smig mas bka 'khor ba tsam 'am/ ji tsam gyis yid ches bde tsam du brtag par
49b7: bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodan rgyal ba rgya la khyod kyi rgyal mgon med cas sbyin ciku dga' ba ga'ags so// tham pad kyim pa gdang can rnams dge slo mam pa srer spyad da/ 'bru ya byed pa na / snong namamamaman//
49b8: dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du blang bar mgyur bde'i tshe ba stegs can dag so na gnas lags/ de nisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig tan du byung bas khyed yon gnas lags te/ gal te khyed/

50a1: kyis mi bzhes na ci bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu dge ba'i lam rgyags ma mchis par 'chi'am bzhes shig/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
50a2: dge 'dun gyi phyir sder spyad dgablang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir sder srung dag zang bar bya'o zhes bka' bul pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis dadag zangs nas mdzod du bcug ste bzhag nas de bzhin du lung bzed dag / duza ba dang / bram zed
50a3: khyim bdag dad pa can rnams kyis mthong ste smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis sder spyad phul ba de dag mi bda' na/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhin bzangs dag mdzod na 'dug go// de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci bdag cag gi khyim na
50a4: gnas ma mchis te/ bdag cag gis khyed la bul lam/ yongs su longs spyad na bdag cag la yongs su longs spyad pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i bsod nams su 'gyur ba zhig na khyed kyis kyang mdzod du bcug pa lta/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das
50a5: la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin bdag gis byin pa'i sder spyad dag yongs su longs spyad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin bdag gis byin pa'i sder spyad dag yongs su longs spyad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong
50a6: rnams kyis yongs su longs spyad par brtsams so/ / bram ze dang khyim bdag gzhan rgya chen po la mos pa de dag gis sder spyad tshad chen po dag phul ba dang / dge slong gnas brtan rnams de dag 'khru bas dal bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
50a7: sder spyad kyi zhal tab bsko bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis sder spyad kyi zhal tab bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bye brag med par bskos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// chos ldadang ldan pa'i sder spyad kyi zhal tab ma bskos pa ni bskobar
50a8: ma bya bskos pa ni dbyung bar bya ste/ lnga gang zhe na 'dun pas 'gro ba dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pas 'gro ba dang / sder spyad brims pa dang / ma brims pa dag mi shes pa'o// chos lnga dang ldan pa'i sder spyad kyi zhal tab ma bskos pa ni bsko bar bya/ bskos pa na

50b1: spang ma / lnga ga sheg 'dranams mi bad/ zheng shes yin pa dang / gtinag gem yin pa dang / 'jigs papa mi 'gro ba dang / sder byud bres pa dang khrims pa dgashes pa'o// ka pan ma byaste/ gnasas pa bgasas nas sa 'a/
50b2: rig pa'i tshig gis dge 'dun rnams la bskonas dge 'dun thams cad 'dus ta 'drag pa dang / ragag da pong slob bya ste/ ming 'di zhes pagyi ba 'di dag dge 'dun gyi sdeng spyad 'drim par bsko bar sko ma/ ga te sgo nas sprer nas smra bar bya'o// de'i 'og tung dag sregs/
50b3: gis gsol ba byas nas las bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge 'dun gyi sder spyang 'drim par smre ste/ gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar ga mdzod cig dang / dge 'dun gyis
50b4: ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sder spyad kyi zhal ta bar bskos te/ sder spyad kyi zhal ta ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun gyi sder spyang 'drem par 'gyur ro// 'di ni gsol ba'o// las ni 'di ltar bya ste/ dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/ dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba
50b5: 'di dge 'dun la sder spyad 'drim par spro ste/ de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis meng 'di zhes bgyi ba sder spyad kyi zhal ta bar bsgo zhing sder spyad kyi zhal tab ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la sder spyad 'drim par 'gyur na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang dag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sder spyad kyi
50b6: zhas par bsko par bzod pa de dag ni cang mgasung shig/ gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig/ dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas sdeng spyad kyi zhal ta ba ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge 'dun la sder spyad dag 'drim par gyur te/ 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas ring bzhin
50b7: ru 'dzin to/ / dge slong rnams kyis zas zos nas lhag mas 'phags bzhin du de nyid la byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhag mas 'phags pa dag lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas rnams kyis bkrubar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi lhag mas
50b8: 'phags padag lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas rnams kyis bkru bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong gzhan dgacig la 'khor me nas de dag bdag nyid 'bru bar byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dgag ni sder spyad kyi zhal ta bdag

51a1: kho nas bkru bar bya zhing de dag gis kyang de la sbyin par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byad kyi tshal mgon mad zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams lhung bzed nag po gcig tu tshig
51a2: cha ga'a' ba bathams nas de dag car kyis mnyam du lag pa bcug pa dang / ltung bzed lag pa la thogs te de 'byung ba ldang ba dang / de dgagis dang ldan pa dag ltung bamed nag po tsho 'phrul byed pa la stug/ de gags lag pa dras te klung mas6
51a3: padang / de dag gis rtag kyis btab pa/ dge slong rnams kyis mthong sted dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di lta bu mi mdzes pa byas nas gnod ste 'dug par bya ba yin na/ khyed nod pa la/ de dag gis smras pa/ ci byas chad 'thungs sam su 'dod ros/
51a4: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ ci de yang byed dam/ gzhan ce byas/ srung bzed nas/ po ma gcig gam/ 'dil 'gal bci zhig ya tsa rdza mkhan shi'am/ 'drim pa med dam/ gzhan kya zad mod/ de dag cing mi smra bar 'dug pa dang / skabs deng ga slo nam
51a5: kyis com ldan 'das la gsol to/ / com ldan das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmigs gang cung zang byung ba ni dge slong rnams gci kuza ba las byu gyis/ de lta bas na dge slong gis nig tu batha bar mi tho'o// zan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong na
51a6: gyig cig pa mi zhes ka'aphrul pa dang / dge slong dag cig dzu thabs gcig nas pa da pa phyogs gcig tu na 'a bar thams pan dge slong dag thams pad la snar ba mi mdogs/ da ga ra na pa
51a7: xxx/ xxx
51a8: bar bya ste/ lag pa ni de nas gzhug par bya zhing dbyung bar byi gcig car du ma yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis lam du zhugs pa na gal te sder srung dag ma rnyed na gcig tu bza' bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de na dge tshul gang dag 'khod

51b1: bde dag dang lhan cig gcig tu bar byed pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dung bzed bzung la de dag dang lhan cig bza' bar bya'o// rung pa byed pa gzhan dgacig yod pa de dag zan zab na 'dron pa rnams dang
51b2: bral nas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gong bur skongs la byin cig/ dge slong gzhan dag cig gnyen gyi khyim du song ba dang / gnyen dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag lhan cig zos nas ring zhig lon pas
51b3: zan lhan cig bzas tshung / de dag gis smras pa/ khyed ni khyim pa/ bdag cag ni rab tu byung ba yin pas bzar mi rung ngo // de dag mi dga' nas mchi mas brnangs shing 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa
51b4: dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te yang dang yang du don du gnyer na gdon mi za bar dus kyi 'che bar shes nas gang du gzhan dag gis mthong na mi mdzes par mi 'gyur ba deng sder spyad bzung la bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par/
51b5: mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams gos gcig pu dang bsod snyoms za ba bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/
51b6: shes ldan dag zan za ba 'di dag su zhig/ gzhan dag gis smras pa/ dge sbyong shAkya'i bu yin no// de dag 'phya zhing shes ldan ga ston pa ngo tsha shes pa dang / ldan pa de lta bu la ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang bral ba 'di dag lta bu ga la yod ces
51b7: zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams gos gcig gon pa las gyur gyis de bas na dge slong gis gos gcig dang
51b8: zan bza' bar mi bya'o/ / zan 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi mgos gcig dang zan za par mi bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / rgan po rgan te nyam chung ba dang / nang ba sbyor mi bzod pa dag chos gos rnams gyon te

52a1: zan bza' bar mi nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phul pa/ de dag gis rdul zan 'jam po dang / zan za bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// 'an byang gzhan ga cig gis mnus pa dang brtso na da kyis pa 'phrum
52a2: de dag gis phyogs dben par bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyo bang mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// drug sde rnams chu ba dregs
52a3: ldan la gcer bur khrus byed pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas dris pa/ shes ldan dgag cer bug khrus byed pa 'di dag su zhig gzhan dag gis smras pa/ dge slong ba'i bu yin no// de dga' bya zhing shes ldan dag la ston pa cha shes pa dang
52a4: ldan pa de / khul ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang bral ba 'di lta bu dang / gal ba yod ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyes dmig gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams
52a5: sgren mor khrus byed pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis sgren mor khrus mi bya'o/ / byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// 'on kyang khrus ras bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis khrus ras bcang par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong rnams pani
52a6: sbyar 'chad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshig kyang bcad par bya ste/ gang la nyis sbyar yod pa des ni chu brtags la bkru bar bya'o// chos gos gsum pa rnams mi rung ngo / snyam nas mi 'chad pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
52a7: pa/ de rnams kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs te bcang par bya'o// gzhan dag cig gis khrus ras ma rnyed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dag gis khrus ras ma rnyed pas lo ma dag gis mdun dang rgyab nas g.yogs te/ phyogs
52a8: dben pa gang na gzhan dag gis mthong nas ma dad par mi 'gyur bar khrus bya'o/ / dge slong rnams khrus ras bcus te de dag 'gyod par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras tshig rkyang la ni srog chags dag med mod kyi 'on kyang ras

52b1: bshal nas gcu bar byad/ / 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sdom na/ monas na gre'u dang mi drang ba'i/ sa dang bsgrags shing za ba dang / gdams shing zas ni za ba dang // 'gyod dang khar ba'i ltung bzed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal brgyal
52b2: kyi rgyal mag ni mang rdzas sbyin gyi kun dga' ban bzhugs so/ / tshe nga ldan namathu gang kyil yang bram thig pa pa gcig pas de'i ming na mgru'u khrig can nam kyu bu khrig can zhes bya bar chags so// de dus gzhan ni kun chapa grang sa chags
52b3: pa dang / des den mon sran gre'u'i zhal lu zhig mthong nas de yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sto skyes pa bdag gis sa bon kyi chos ma ngung bar byas so// sgyum mo// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na dge 'dun la mon sran bre'u'i bza' ba dag cig grub pa de mi ba bar srung
52b4: bzed bkab ste 'dug pa dang / snyan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dag gis smras pa/ mkhan po dge 'dun la mon sran gre'u'i bza' ba dag byung ba ci'i slad du mi gsol/ des smras pa/ bu dag kho bos sapon gyi chos ma rung bar byas so// de dag gis smras
52b5: smras pa/ mkhan pa dris bu zhig bgyis/ des ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad pa dang / de dag gis kyang mi bza' bar brnams so// de dgal 'grogs pa shes rnams kyis dris pa/ ci'i phyir min/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa bskad bdas /
52b6: de'akhor mang po can zhig pas de la brten nas dge 'dun thams cad kyis ma zos so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa/ dge slong dgas bon gyi rigs chos dka' ba zhes bya ba yod/
52b7: re/ de yang blangs pa byung na tshes so zhes byas nas bza' bar bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa te/
52b8: babar 'khor gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa mi rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu lhags na yongs su longs spyad par bgyi 'am/ yongs su longs spyad par mi bgyi/ bcom ldan

53a1: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nye bar 'khor yongs su longs spyad par mi bya'o// btsun pa re shig mi rung ba'i sanas shing 'khrungs la mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na yongs su longs spyad par bgyi 'am/ yongs su longs
53a2: spyad par mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor yongs su longs spyad par mi bya'o// btsun pa re shig rung ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la mi rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lpags na yongs su longs spyad par bgyi'am/ yongs su longs spyad par mi bgyi 'a/ nye bar la bo ngag
53a3: toshig tu ma lon na yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/ / btsun pa shig drang ba'i sa nas shing 'khrungs la rung ba'i sar 'bras bu dag lhags na yongs su longs spyad par bgyi 'am/ yongs su longs spyod par mi bgyi/ nye bar 'khor yongs su longs spyad par bya'o// sangs rgyas
53a4: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / mnyan yod na bram ze zhig gnas pa des slongs mo btab pas glang zhig rnyed do// de'i 'og tu ba zhig rnyed do// de'i 'og tu yang glang zhig rnyed do//
53a5: de'i 'og tu yang bzhig ded de de'i ba lang khru longs par gyur to// bram ze des theg mar rnyed pa'i glang la bkra shis kyi blo byung nas/ glang de yan du btang ngo // dus gzhan zhig na de rgas 'khogs nyam chung bar gyur te/ de chu 'dod nas chu be dregs lngar gyi 'gram du song ba
53a6: las 'dam du song ngo / / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang lam der song ba las/ des de mthong nas bsams pa/ glang 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba lta cung zad yod dam snyam pa dang / yod par mthong ngo // sul ngag las snyam pa dang / bdag kho na la ste/ des 'dam nas
53a7: b+hang nas lag pas phyis so/ / de nas bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o// chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o// mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes chos tshig gsum bshad de la dad par yang kyis shig/ de ltan byol song gi
53a8: skye gnas las 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes smras nas song ngo / / de yang wa dag gis zos pa dang / lnga dag gis za ba'i tshe bsams pa/ gal te 'phags pa de 'dir ma byin na bdag 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs su mi 'gyur re snyam nas/ de'i

53b1: tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sems mngon par dad par byas nas dus las 'das te mnyan yod nyid na bram ze las drug la brtson pa'i rigs shig tu skyes so/ / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus glang de'i gnas skabs de ji lta bu zhig yin bsams pa dag ji tsam na dus las 'das par mthong
53b2: ngo / / yang gar skyes bsams pa dang / mnyan yod na nyid du bram ze las drug la brtson pa'i rigs su skyes par mthong nas de khyim der yang dang yong du song zhing des bram ze de chung ma dang bcas te skyabs su 'gro ba dang / bslab pa'i gzhi dag la bgod do// de dus gzhan
53b3: na gyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul med par song ba dang / bram ze des smras pa/ 'phags pa ci phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul mi mnga' 'am/ des smras pa bzhin bzangs ci kho bo'i phyi bzhin grang pa'i dge tshul dag rtsa ka sha las bzung ba 'am/ rtsa ku shal bzung bas 'byur
53b4: dam/ / khyod lta bu las rnyed pa gang yin pa de kho bo'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul du 'gyur mod/ 'phags pa bdag gi mchis brang ba de'i 'di la sems can zhugs te gal te khye rur btsas na de khyod kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul bgyi'o// bzhin bzangs dang
53b5: med cig blangs so zhes smras nas song ngo / / de zla ba brgyad dam dgu 'das nas bu ba lang gi sha tshugs lta bu zhig btsas pa dang / de'i nye du rnams lhags te 'dus nas zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas ming 'dogs pa la byed de/
53b6: khye'u'i ming cing gdags/ nye du rnams kyis smras pa/ gang gi phyir khye'u 'di sha tshugs pa lang dang 'dra ba de'i phyir khye'u'i ming ba lang bdag tu gdags so zhes ming ba lang bdag ces bya bar btags so// de bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur pa dang / de nas tshe dang
53b7: ldan pa shishi'i bus dog ma thabs dang chos gos ltung bzad thegs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// mnyan yod dadu bsod sgoms lanub na des bram ze de'i khyim du byid pa dang / bram zedes byon pa legs so zhes bya ba'i sgrub par babyung nas rgas
53b8: pa la phyag byas so/ / chung mas kyang de la bza' ba dang bca' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas lhung bzed bkang ste phul lo/ khye'u de tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i gdong du lta nas des bram ze la brda byas pa dang / des khye'u de la smras pa/ bu khyod ngas ma btsas pa nas 'phags pa/

54a1: sha ri'i bu'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge tshul du phul gyis 'phags pa dang lhan cig song shig/ sems can de srid pa tham pa zhig ste/ de'i phyi bzhin song ba dang / des de rab tu byung ba snyen par rdzogs par byas te/ gdams ngag byin no// des 'bad ba rtsol
54a2: bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang / mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rtogs nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad chos nyid kyis 'jig pa ltung ba/ 'gyes pa rnam par 'jig pa'i chos can du bsgoms te nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa
54a3: nyid mngon sum du byas te/ khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sems gser dang bod par mtshungs pa/ tsa na dan dang ste'ur 'dra ba/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa/ ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs bcom pa/ rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so
54a4: yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang bkur sti la rgyab kyi phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / gus par smra bar bya ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to// de la las las skyes pa'i ming ba
54a5: gnyis yod de/ gcig nas ni spyugs pa 'byin to// gcig shos nas ni ming ngo do// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dus ma yin pa'i zas kyi bslab pa ma bcas pa de'i tshe ni bsgrags shing ming ngo // gang gi tshe bcas pa de'i tshe ni bsgrags shing 'dor bas de lus te/
54a6: nyam chud/ shig shig po/ rod nyams par gyur to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa yin pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa/ kun dga' bo ba lang bdag ci'i phyir lus ne// nam chung gi/
54a7: shig po/ dong nyams par gyur/ des ji ltar gyur pa gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang la las kyi rnam par smin pa las skyes pa'i med pa gnyis grub pa des bsgrags pa lan gnyis sam/ gsum por te kha bkrus
54a8: nas lhag ma med par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// dge slong rnams zas zos nas bsgugs te de dag 'gyod par gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te/ dge slong gzhan zhig zan thos te skyugs ni des kha bkru bar bya ste/ 'di la

54b1: la 'gyod par mi bya'o/ / gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa pa lang bdag rab tu byung ba de'i tshe bram ze dang khyi ma bdag rnams 'phya sprod/ kha zer zhing dge sbyong shAkya'i bu rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul nyams shing tshangs pa'i tshul nyams te/ de ni palang bdag la sogs pa 'jig
54b2: 'jigs lha rnams kyang rab tu 'byin to/ / zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos chen po ri rab dang 'dra ba la skye ba'i tshogs pal po tshom dad par byed kyis/ de lta bas na ba lang bdag
54b3: yul dbus su gnas su mi gzhug go snyam nas/ tshe dang ldan pa pa lang bdag la bka' stsal pa/ ba lang bdag khyod der phyin chad yul dbus na ma gnas par mtha' 'khob kyi gnas mal dag sten cig/ btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes tshe dang ldan pa pa lang bdag gis
54b4: bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas mnyan yod nas mi snang bar gyur to/ / shing shir sha ka'i gzhal med stong par 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos kyi dge slong bas mtha'i gnas mal la dang ba
54b5: pa rnams kyi nang na mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong pa lang bdag 'di yin no// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa pa lang bdag gis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par
54b6: smin pas sha tshugs pa lang lta bur gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag pa yang bdag nyid kyis las rnams byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bskur ba/ chu bo bzhin nye bar gnas pa nges par myong bar 'gyur ba yin te/
54b7: pa lang bdag nyid kyis byas pa'i las rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la srin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams lam yin/ me'i khams la ma yin/ rlung
54b8: gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang / las rnams chud zar mi 'gyur te/

55a1: tshogs shing dus la bab ban/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal ba bzang po 'di nyid la ske dku'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba/ rig pa dang zhas
55a2: su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste de'i bstan pa la 'di ba tu byung bar gyur to// dge slong gang gis ra
55a3: tubyung ba de rgas 'khogs nyam cung bzhig ste/ de de'i lhung bzed 'khrub na dge slong gzhan zhig dang lhan cig kha ton zer ba las ring zhig thogs nas de'i mkhan po des rang dgar zan zos pa dang / de kha ton la chags pas mkhan po de la 'phyas so// ji tsam dus gzhan
55a4: zhig na zan thos nas bdag nyid kyi lhung bzed bkrus te mkhan po'i dring du song ba dang / da dung zan za ba mthong nas de kun nas dkris pas smras pa/ mkhan po ci khyod glang rgan bzhin du ldalnga cing bzhugs sa ma/ des bsams pa/ 'di kun nas dkris pas gal te cung zad cig
55a5: smras na/ je thubar 'khrug pa skyed par 'gyur gyis gang gi tshe 'di kun nas dkris pa dang / bral ba de'i tshe dri bar bya'o snyam nas/ des dkun nas dkris pa dang bral ba dang smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ci zer/ des smras pa/ khyod glang rgan bzhin ldang dam zhes de skad mami yod
55a6: des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod kyis dgu yin shes sam/ 'tshal te khyod kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba lags la/ bdag kyang de kho na'i gsung rab la rab tu byung ba lags so// des smras pa/ de ni de lta yin te bdenan
55a7: 'on kyang rab tu byung bas bya ba'am byed pa gang yin pa de ngas byas te/ de lta bas nang ni 'ching ba thams cad las grol ba yin/ khyod ni 'ching ba mtha' dag gis bcings pa yin na khyod kyis ngag gi las rtsub mo smras kyis/ khyod kyis las de'i nas kyang bsrabs/
55a8: nyid dang / yongs su zad pa nyid dang / yongs su gtugs par gyur par nyes pa la nyes par shogs shig/ des nyes pa la nyes par gshegs so// gang 'dis dge slong dgra bcom pa la glang rgan zhes bya ba'i sgra ba kun du spyod pa kun tu spyad pa'i las de'i rnam par

55b1: sprin pas de'i tshe rabs la rgyur ba lang gi skye gnas su skyes so/ / las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis daltung natshugs pa lang lta bur skyes so// yang dge slong rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa pa lang bdag gis las ci zhig
55b2: bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis pas mtha'i gnas mal dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu lung bstan lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon lam gyi dbang gis so// gang du smon lam btab lags/ 'di yang dag par rdzogs
55b3: pa sangs rgyas 'od srung de kho na'i gsung bal rab tu byung bar gyur te/ der 'dis tshe gcig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang thob par mgyur to// gang gi thad du rab tu byung ba de ni bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis pas mtha'i gnas mal la dang
55b4: pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu lung bstan to/ / de na 'dis smon lam btab pa/ 'di ltar bdag gis bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas g.yon nas bla na med pa 'od srung gi thad du tshe cig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshogs 'ga' yang
55b5: thob par ma gyur gyis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u tha ma la/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya thub pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
55b6: sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes lung bstan pa gang yin pa de'i gsung rabal bdag ya tu byung ba nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'gyur zhing / ji ltar bdag gis mkhan po bcom ldan 'das yang
55b7: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis pas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bkyu'i rgyal po shAkya thub pa des pas mtha'i gnas mal la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu ston par gyur cig/ smo la ma de'i dab
55b8: gsed ltar de bzhin gshegs pas pas mtha'i gnas lam la la dad pa rnams kyi nang na mchog tu bstan to/ / dge slong dag de ltar na las gicig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag la/ gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar/ dre nam

56a1: rnams kyi ni 'dran ma yin no/ / dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig pu gnag pa dang 'dren na rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba dag la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag gis de lta bul bslab par bya'o// nga na dang ma yodan kyang
56a2: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / drug sde rnams 'di byin cig/ 'di las byin cig ces 'dam zhing 'dam zhing zas zab dang 'drim pa 'khrugs par gyur nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsor
56a3: pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong gis 'das ging zas bza' bar mi bya/ sa can ga la tshangs can du byung ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodadan rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi chal mgon sa dazas sbyin gyi kun dga' ban
56a4: bzhugs so/ / dge slong rnams zas rba ba na lhung bzed bzed pa las de lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung lhung bzed kyi gzhi zed ba las lhung bzed du spyad nas de rnams 'gyo ded min ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom
56a5: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag lhung bzed bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i steng du lhung na byin pon byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi zed pa las lhung bzed kyi nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed bzed pa las lhung bzed kyi
56a6: nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya/ lhung bzed kyi gzhi gzed pa las lhung bzed kyi gzhi'i nang du lhung na byin len byas pa zhes bya ste/ 'on kyang byin len gyi sems ni nye bar gzhag par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byer
56a7: kyi tshal mgon ma da zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo khar ba'i mgar be du song nas des smras pa/ bzhin zangs khar ba'i lhung bzed cig byan nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa 'di nyid bdag gi bzo lags kyis tshang
56a8: ji tsam zhig bgyi/ chen por bya'o// 'phags pa khyod la khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po ci 'tshal/ bkren pa khyod ci rin med par byed du 'jug snyam 'am/ rin thang sbyin gyis 'byos shig/ des bsams pa/ 'di la bdag gi khar ba ci zhig 'gor bya'o snyam nas

56b1: des de'i khar ba'i lhung bzed chen po zhig byas so/ / des smras pa/ gang 'di'i nang du chud pa gzhan zhig kyang gyis shig/ des gzhan yang byas so// de bzhin du gzhan gang yin pa bdun pa'i bar du byas nas de rnams tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bos dge tshul 'gyur
56b2: bcug ste/ tshan sna lnga ba'i skud pa las drab byed du bcug nas de rnams der bcug ste/ go rims bshams nas dge tshul gyi mgol bskur te gang du 'gron du bos pa dang der 'gro'o// son nas de dag bkram ste 'dug pa dang / khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams kyis smas
56b3: pa/ 'phags pa ci khyod kyis khar ba'i mgar ba'i zong bkra ma 'am/ des smras pa/ bkren pa khyed ci shes/ 'dir ni re shig rtse dag blang ngo // 'dir ni snum khur dag go/ 'dir ni 'bras chan dag go// gzhan rnams ni tshed dam dag zang do// de rnams kyis smras pa/
56b4: 'phags pa gal te de lta na go ros 'ga' tshong ma mang po dag 'byung bas gzhan dag dang gzhan dag kyang nye bar gzhag dgos so zhes byas pa dang / de cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
56b5: dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams khar ba'i lhung bzed 'chang ba las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis khar ba'i lhung bzed bcad par mi bya'o// 'chad na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// kha gzar dang / tshwa khug dang / phul
56b6: ba'i btung por ni ma gtogs so/ / sdom ni/ rkang pa bkru ba bkag pa dang / shel zangs dag ni gnad pa dang / de bzhin bsil yab nyid dang ni/ sbrang ma rnams la g.yab pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med
56b7: zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ban bzhugs so/ / dge slong rnams pabarab tu rkang pa 'khru ba der sbrang bu dag gis gang bar 'dug go// ji tsam na bram ze dang khyim bdag gtsug lag khang ltar 'ongs pa de dag gis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa sbrang bu bri zimatsha
56b8: bas gang ba'i phyogs 'di ci zhig/ dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis 'dir rkang pa bkrus so// de dag 'phya ste/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni gtsang sbra med de bababab tu rkang pa 'khru'o zhes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la

57a1: gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa bababab tu bkru bar mi bya'o/ 'on kyang gnas khang gi steng shar lho'i mtshams su rkang pa bkru ba'i gnas bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rkang ba bkru ba'i gnas bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
57a2: dge slong rnams kyis jil bu bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ru sbal lta bur bya'o// rab tu 'jam par byed pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsu ba bor bya'o// dge slong nas pa 'khogs pa nyam chung ba de dag phyog
57a3: dang 'gro ma dris pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis gyo mon par gzhag par bya'o// dge slong rnams sgo mo 'khrub na ma/ nas dem du bar gyur pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shol 'as ra gzhag pa 'o/
57a4: xxx/ xxx
57a5: 'phags pa 'di sa zhig/ de rnams kyis sgrus pa/ bzhin yangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis shos thangs gnang // 'phags pa ci dge srung byed 'dod pa'i yon tanadag gis gnod dam/ dedag gis smras pa/ spyod tu mgrin par rtog/ pas mnan no/ sa
57a6: 'bya ba'i gabs de slong nams kyi bcom ldan das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan das kyis / rgyal ga/ gas dang da sa gal dang / bdU d+halas byas pa'i shos sa dag gzhag pa ci te/ 'od ba 'di sa las rgyas /

57a8: xxx/ xxx

57b1: ldan 'das kau sham bin s+tha len gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so/ / dpyid kyi dus la bab nas dge slong rnams tshabs rgya ste/ de dag lus skye bo ba seng bsed por gyur cing rke/ nyam chung / shig shig po/ rong nyams par gyur pa khyim bdag dang bram ze rnams kyis mthong nas
57b2: rnam pa/ 'phags pa ci'i slad du lus skyebo ba sed pased por gyur cing ni/ nyam chung shig shig go/ rod nyams par gyur/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur ba bskad dang / de rnams kyis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag byed bsil yab mi 'chang dam/ bzhin pa rang
57b3: dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / / 'phags pa dag khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na ga nang /
57b4: gis bsil yab bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsil yab bcad par bya'o// zhes bka' stsal ba dang / drug sde rnams kyis yub gser dang / dngul dang shel dang / bai dUr+ya las byas pa bsrubs pa/ bkra ba dang / nye bar bkra ba'i yu
57b5: ba can gyi bsil yab dag bcangs pa dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis shes bya ba nas/ khyed kyi mgrin pa rdog pas mnan to zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de dag 'phya ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
57b6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yub gser dang dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel las byas pa bsrubs pa bkra ba dang / nye bar bkra ba'i yu ba can gyis bsil yab dag nye bar bzhag par mi bya'i 'on kyang bsil yab gnyis po rtsa ba ru ta las
57b7: byas pa dang / shing ta la'i mdab ma bcang bar bya'o// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag dge slong rnams la bsil yab rnam pa sna tshogs 'bul ba na zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na
57b8: gnang gis dge/ 'dun gyi phyir bcang bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na spre'u rdzing gi 'gram khang ba brtsegs pa na bzhugs so// dge slong rnams la sbrang ma dag za ste/ de dag gi lus sbrang mas zos pas 'brum bus gang ste/
