79a7: bral ba ma tshig kyi thub pas so sor bsten pa nang du yang dag 'jog dang mthun pa 'di lta bu na bzhugs te/ der ngas bcom ldan 'das de la res 'ga' bsnyen bkur byas na ring po bcom ldan 'das da ltar gang na bzhugs/ jig byed kyis thos sam/ lha bdag gi thos te/
79a8: bcom ldan 'das ni shAkya rnams kyi nang na shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal me tsu ru di zhes bgyi ba na bzhugs so// ring po shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal me tsu ru di zhes bya bar thag ji srid yod/ lha rgyad grags gsum lhag tsam mchis so// des ring po shAkya rnams kyi grong rdal me tsu ru

79b1: de de shi cos shi/ ste shi ma ma zhes spyang pa'i nga bsags pa'i rtsal po gas sa rgyas kyimang ma ldananas/ nams kyi tha lam nu dga' ba shAng thaM bzhin pas 'an pa sa ma nga nan/ yongs pakon pa la
79b2: sa ta dang pas ku dga' bar thugs sa/ / de'aM tshi ma ldan 'das gtsug lag pang chen po ga bcad pab zhigan nyin mo gnas pas bzugs so// dege slong mang pa rnams ni ga tsug lagal ga phyi po blag pa med pa'i mas cags kyi ga kyi
79b3: po gsal rgyal gyis mthong ngo / / dge slong mang po dag thag ring po nyid nas mthong nas kyang dge slong mang po dag gal ba der song ste byin nas dge slong mang po dag la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa dag bcom ldan 'das ga la bzhugs/ rgyal po chen po bcom
79b4: ldan 'das ni gtsug lag khang chen po che bsgo bkum pa 'di ni nyin mo gnas pas bzhugs te/ rgyal po chen po khyod bzhed na gtsug lag khang chen po sgo bkum pa gal ba der bzhud de/ der byon pa dang zad kyis dal bu dal bus sgo glegs la rdungs shig dang / bcom
79b5: ldan 'das ba/ byed par gyur ro// de na sagos pa'i rgyal pogs pa rgyal gyis rgyal po'i tigs lnga po gtsug tor dang / gdugs dang / ram zi dang / rnga ma pa nor bu'i chub can dang / lus pa bo dag bud de/ spyod pa'i phung po la byin napa/ byar lta'o// napa stsa
79b6: ba'i bu po 'di snyam dris mas te/ lus rgyal po'i rtags lnga po gtsug tor dang / gdugs dang / ral gri dang / rnga ya ba nor bu'i ub can dang / sbrum tha bo dag bdag la gnag ste/ zhal phyir gzigs pa las na/ lA ni phrin las gsang ba zhig mdza ba
79b7: bzhed pas bdag 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o snyam mo/ / de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gadrug lag khang chen po sgo bcad pa gal ba der song ste/ phyin nas/ bad kyis ral bu ngal bus sgo'i glegs la brdabs pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis
79b8: saphye'o/ / de nas ko sa la'i rgyal tha gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ gdong dang 'a byis napa 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rim

80a1: zhig lags nas mthong ngo / / bde bar gshegs pa bdag gis ring mo zhig lags nas mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kos la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
80a2: bal shin tu dman pa bas kyang ches dman pa byed/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdakal chos las byung ba'i dad pa mchis te/ des na bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
80a3: sangs rgyas so/ / khyod kyi chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa'o// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa'o snyam mo// rgyal po chen pa khyod dal chos las byung ba dang pa rdilta bu zhig yod/ btsun pa bdag gis 'di ni dag sbyong dang bum byam pas
80a4: pa mkhas pa'i dargyal can smra ba dang / phas kyi rgol ba la goms par bgyis pa/ skye bo phal po tshal byis pa'i dang yas 'bigs pa'i dbor bkur ba kha cig mthong ste/ de dkar nga gi shes rab dang spobs pas gzhan gyi lta ba'i rnam pa 'drin ma'i dbo dag 'dig
80a5: cing de dag zhu brtsom par bgyid de/ bdag cag shes ldan gau ta ma de'i drung du dod la dri ba 'di dang 'di lta bu dag dri ste/ gal te lung ston par mi byed na ni brtsad par bya'o// gal te 'di lta bu dang 'di lta bu yin no zhes lung ston par byed na/ de lta na de la 'di skad ces brjod
80a6: par bya ra khye ga tam pyod kyi 'di ni mi rigs so/ / 'di ni mi 'idra'o// din mo 'thad do zhes brjod par bya'o zhes de rnams kyis zhu ba de dag bsdogs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snar bab par mchis pa'i ji yang mthog na smra bar ltag la dathogag ste/ btsun pa bdan
80a7: bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa de lta bu mchis te/ deman bdag 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lags/ khyod kyis chos 'dul ba ni lags par gsungs pa lags/
80a8: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa lags so snyam bgyid do// btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ btsun pa 'di na bdag gis dge sbyong dang / bram ze mkhas pa mkhas pa'i da rgyal can zhes bya ba nas/

80b1: kha cig mthong ste/ zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de rnams kyis zhu ba de dag bsdogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mchis te phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba zhu ba'i rngo ma thog gi/ gzhan du na bcom ldan 'das kho na'i zhal du lta ba dang / zhal
80b2: rtog par bgyid cing / bcom ldan 'das gau ta ma 'di kho nas shes bya mkhyen to// gzigs par bya ba gzigs so snyam ste/ btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no// btsun pa bdag la chos
80b3: las byung ba'i dang pa gzhan yang mchis te/ btsun pa 'di na bdag gis dge sbyong dang / bram ze mkhas pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can zhes bya ba nas kha cig mthong ste zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// des zhu ba de dag bsdogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der mchis
80b4: te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba yongs su ma rdzogs par zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la zhu ba yongs su ma rdzogs par zhus bzhin yongs su rdzogs par lung bstan pa dang / de dag zhu ba lung bstan pa des yid rangs shing mgu nas sangs rgyas
80b5: dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi zhing bslab pa'i gnas dag kyang len par bgyid de/ btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das
80b6: la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ 'di na bdag gis bram ze dang khyim bdag mkhas pa mkhas pa'i nga rgyal can zhes bya ba nas/ kha cig mthong zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de dag gis zhu ba de dag bsdogs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
80b7: der song ste phyin nas/ zhu ba rdzogs par zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la ches yongs su rdzogs par lung bstan nas/ de dag lung bstan pa de yid rangs shing mgu nas bcom ldan 'das la rab tu byung ba dang / bstan par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po
80b8: gsol zhing bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu 'byung bar mdzad/ bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad de/ rab tu 'byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs pa dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba nyams su myong ba de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag cag de'u

81a1: ma rung ngo / / bdag cag rab tu de'u ma rung ngo // bdag cag sngon dge sbyong ma yin bzhin du bdag cag dge sbyong de snyam du khas 'che/ bdag cag bram ze dang // gra bcom pa ma yin bzhin du bdag cag dgra bcom pa'i snyam du khas 'che 'di ni bdag ca
81a2: dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang dgra bcom pa yin na snyam ste/ btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no// btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/
81a3: btsun pa 'di ni bdag gis dge sbyong dang bram ze sbyangs bse nga bseng po sha bri srab pa/ nyam chung ba mdog ngan pa/ dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis ltar mi chags pa dag cig mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ shes ldan 'di
81a4: dag ma'i dong bzhin du tshangs par spyod pa spyod pa 'am/ nad yun ring po 'ga' zhig gis thobs sam/ sdig pa mi dge ba'i las 'ga' zhig lkog du byas nas bcabs par mgyur grang / 'di ltar shes ldan 'di dag skya bo bsed bser po sha bring ngan gnyam chung ba/
81a5: dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis bltar mi chags so snyam mo// de dag gi drung du mchis shing mchis nas 'di skad ces bgyis te/ shes ldan dag ci'i phyir skya bo bsed bseng po sha bri ngan pa/ nyam chung ba/ dbang po nyams pa/ skye bo mang po'i mig gis bltar
81a6: mchigs par gyur/ de dag gi mchid nas/ rgyal po chen po 'dod chags kyis gnod do// btsun pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te 'dod pa rnams rnyed pa dang bsnyen pa dang bsags pas gzus pa lam brnyan thug pa 'amamadzes zhen tu ku nani de sa kos pa'i
81a7: rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag gzugs ches bzang ba dang / ches lta na sdug pa/ ches mdzes par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po rnams 'dod dgur rnyed pa dang / tshogs med par rnyed pa lags so// gang gi
81a8: phyir 'dod pa rnams rnyed pa dang bsten pa dang bsags pas gzugs ches bzang ba dang / ches blta na sdug pa ches mdzes par mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gzugs shin tu bzang ba/ dbang po rgyas pa bzhin gyi

81b1: mdangs gsal ba/ lpags pa'i mdog yongs su dag pa/ sems khral chung ba/ 'tsho ba gzhan la rag ma lus pa mthong ste/ des na ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa ma 'dras pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongs su byas spyod par nus so snyam ste/
81b2: btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te zhes bya ba snga ma bzhin no// btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das la tshas las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ btsun pa 'di ni bdag gis nor gyi slad du mchis pa rnams 'dod
81b3: pa'i rtswa dang / 'dod pa'i gzhing / 'dod pa'i ched kyi slad dum ni bu dang lhan cig rtsod / bu na mi dang / pha ni bu dang / bu ni pa dang / ming po ni sring mo dang / sring mo ni mang po dang grogs po ni grogs dang rtsod pa dag mthong na skye bo dang spyi bor lta smos kyang ci 'tshal de dag cod cing 'gred
81b4: ra gyur pa na/ ma ni bu'i mi snyan pa smra/ bu ni mi'i/ pha ni bu'i khu na pha'i/ mdo po ni sring mo'i/ sring mo ni me pa'i/ grogs ni grogs gya me snyan pa sman/ skye bo skye bo'i lte smos kyang tsa'i tshal/ yang 'di ni bdag gis mthong ba/ dge slong gnyis shig/ dge slong dag dang lhan
81b5: cig gzhi 'ga' zhig dge slong du rtsod nas bslab pa phul te babs par gyur na/ de dag rnam grangs gong gis kyang sangs rgyas la mi snyan parjod pa 'am/ chos dang dge 'dun la mi snyan pa rjod par mi bgyid kyi/ gzhan du na bdag nyid kho na la yongs su smod pas/
81b6: yongs su smod par bgyid de/ bdag cag gnyis ni 'di ni dman pa dang / ma rabs dang / dpal med pa ste/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi sprin sngar ji srid 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su
81b7: byang gsad par ma nus su zhes mchite/ btsun pa 'di yang dag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags ga bya bsdam panan no// tsun pa padags bcom ldan 'das la tshas las byung ba'i dang pa gzhan yang mchis te/ bdun pa 'dinags /
81b8: thal po gas pa rgyal bdag dbum par gyi'i legs pa rnams kyang 'grams/ 'bum par bgyi ba rnams ni gtong bar dbang na/ bdag don gyi ched du mchis pa la rgyal rigs rgya chen po shings la chen pol bu dag dang / bram ze h+ya can po shings sa chen pos

82a1: dag dang / khyim bdag rgya chen po shing sa la chen po lta bu dag gtam 'jug tu phyin pa la mi sdod par bar skabs par skabs su bka' mchid mchi zhing / ma gus pa dang zhes ma mchis par smra bar bgyi bar sems lags so// btsun pa dus
82a2: gcig cig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya brag du ma'i gung la bzhugs shing / chos ston par mdzad pa de na lung ba'i sgra yang me gda'/ sbrid pa'i sgra yang mi gda'o// de nas ma zhig gis lung ba'i sgra phung ba dang / yang ma zhig gis mi de la 'dis
82a3: ces kye skyes bu khyod 'jog par 'dug/ bcom ldan 'das spad ma'i sbrad rtsis tshims par mdzad pa lta bu'i chos snyan pa bdun paston pa mdzad pa ma mthong mazhes smras lags so// de skad ces bgyis pa dang / mi de cang mi mchi bar mchis so// de la bdag 'di snyam
82a4: bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das ni de tsam du mthu che zhing / rdzu 'phrul che ba lags na/ 'di ni da ltar chad pa med pa dang / mtshon cha med pa'i chos snyan pas 'bar btul ba ngo mtshar to snyam ste/ btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags
82a5: te zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ / btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa bzhin 'di yang mchis te/ btsun pa 'di ni bdag gis dge sbyong dang bram ze kha cig mthong na nor med par bgyis te/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa las de zla ba dgu
82a6: 'am zla ba brgyad 'das pa dang / rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag bor te/ phyir 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag 'byor cing ldan par gyur cing rtse bar bgyid/ dga' bar bgyid/ dga' mabur spyod par yang bgyid do// btsun pa 'di na bdag gis mthong
82a7: pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyin thos dag ji srid 'tshe'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa/ ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byed pa/ spyod cing zhes bya ba nas/ srog gi mtha'i bar zhes bya ba dang / btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags
82a8: sozhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ / // 'dul ba phran tshegs kyig ni/ bam po brgyad pa/ btsun pa bdag la bcom ldan 'das 'chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan 'di yang mchis te/ btsun pa 'di ni bdag drang srong yid bstan pa sbyin pa dang /

82b1: rnying pa dang / de dag la yid dorton 'i de dag la 'ong sa spyod rnams kyang stsol grags pa yang sbyo ba nas de dag gi sro ni par yang stsol na/ de dag bcom ldan 'das la ji lta ba de ltang bdag la bgyi ba bgyid par mi sems te/ btsun pa dus gcig cig na bdag drang srong yid brtan pa
82b2: sbyin pa dang / rnying ba dag brtag par 'tshal nas 'khor gyi nang nas byung ste phyogs dog bzhag tu mchis nas 'di ltar 'di dag bcom ldan 'das dang / bdag gang logs su rkang pa ston pa lta'o snyam ni/ de dag gis rnam grangs du mar sangs rgyas kyi bsngags brjod
82b3: chos dang / dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga na ba de logs su ni mgo bstan/ bdag ga la ba de logs su ni rkang pa bstan to// de la bdag 'di snyam bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das ni de tsam du rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ste/ 'di na da ltar bdag
82b4: 'di dag la longs spyod rnams kyang sbyin/ grags pa yang sbyin pa nas/ srog gi bar yang stsol na/ 'di dag bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de ltar bdag la bya ba byed par mi sems pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam ste zhes bya ba nas/ btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la
82b5: chos las byung ba'i dang ba gzhan yang lags so zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ / btsun pa bdag la chos las byung ba'i dad pa gzhan yang mchis te/ btsun pa bdag kyang yul ko sa la ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyang yul ko sal ba lags/ bdag gi rigs
82b6: kyang rgyal rigs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs kyang rgyal rigs lags/ bdag kyang rgas pa 'khogs pa/ gtugs pa na chod po// brgyad cu lon pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bkres pa/ 'bogs pa gtugs pa/ snyun chod la brgyad bcu la pa lags
82b7: btsun pa bdag kyang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal po lags bas btsun pa 'di yang bdag bcom ldan 'das la chos las byung ba'i dad pa lags te/ des na bdag 'di snyam du bcom
82b8: ldan 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so/ / khyod kyi chos 'dul ba ni legs par gsungs pa'o// nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa'o snyam du sems lags so// de nas ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal

83a1: thas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngang chos sna tshogs brgya cher bshad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbas la phyag 'chas tam // da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ga la rgyal po gsal rgyal pod nas rab ma lon par mkhyen nas/ dge slong rnams la
83a2: kyal pa/ dge slong dag byed kyis chos tsho 'i mo nam thas shi co shig/ phyogs shig de co'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag chos sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs na don dang ldan bcom da ldan 'tshas par spyod dang ldan pa ste/ mngon par shes par byed pa dang / rdzogs par
83a3: chub par byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par byed pa yin no// de lta bas na rigs kyi bu dad pas rab tu byung bas chos sna tshogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs blangs ste kun chub par byas nas de lta da ltar bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya'o// kos la'i rgyal po
83a4: gsal rgyal bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan chos nyan pa la ring zhig thogs pa dang / spyod pa'i bu ring po yang cung zhig bsdad nas shing rtar zhugs te mnyan yod du song nas des 'phags skyes po rgyal srid la gzhag go/ phreng ldan ma dang / dbyar tshul mas spyod pa'i
83a5: bul dris pa/ spyod pa'i bu lha ga la bzhugs/ grong rdal me tsu ru di na gzhugs so// de dag rkang gi grong rdal me tsu ru dir chas so// ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal yang bcom ldan 'das las chos mnyan nas gtsug lag khang nas byung na spyod pa'i bu ring po mi snang
83a6: nas/ / des dge slong rnams la dras pa/ 'phags pa dge sbyong byed kyi bu ring po gar mchis/ de dag gis smras pa/ de lta nang du gshegs ma thag tu shing tar zhugs nas mchis so zhes byas pa dang / rgyal po rkang gis song ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyang chos snga bzhig tu rgyal
83a7: po byab tu gshegs so/ / tsam na rgyal pos lam kar phreng ldan ma dang / dbyang tshul ma mthong nas/ des de dag la dris pa/ khyed ci'i phyi rkang gis 'dir 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha spyod pa'i bu ring pos 'phags skyes po rgyal srid la gzhag ste// danas bdag cag ste
83a8: gdum mi yod/ bdag cag bzhan gang mchi/ rgyal pos smras pa/ phreng ldan ma khyod kyis byo rgyal srid nyams su myong zin gyis song la dbu'i rgyal srid nyams su myod par gyis shig/ da yang dbyar tshul ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i khyab tu 'gro'o zhes byas pa dang / prang ldanam

83b1: ska thugs pa na nang banan byar bgag/ kas la 'argyal ba gsal rgyal yang byang rgyal ma dang na na gargyal par bya tu ma ra byas rgyal ba ba gyun nas pan can 'byas 'byam pa lasas skyes dpa' bste na
83b2: nal dri 'dug / des byang rnal ma la smras pa/ dbyar tshulas song la rgyal po ma skyes dgral gas pa'i rgyal po gsas rgyal skyed mos tshal na dug ga zhes pagyis shi// des rgyal ba maskyes dpral smras ga/ lagos pa'i rgyal logs pa rgal khyod
83b3: bskyed mas tshal na gzhugs te/ lhagazigs par bzhed do// des thos nas sngangs te smras pa/ shes ldan dag rgyal po de dmag mang po can yin te/ glo zur kho nar 'ongs na byed mus kyang mtshar ram/ dbyang tshul mas smras pa/ ltang la dmagagal
83b4: mchos/ bus rgyal srid las phyung nas de g.yog dang gnyis 'dir mchis so// des smras pa/ de rgyal po byed pa legs te/ bdag ni gzhon nu'i gnas na gnas so zhes smras nas/ blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang ngas rgyal po rgyal rigs
83b5: spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba bkur sti med par spyan dang ba ni ngal rigs pa ma yin par 'gyur bas dang la grong khyer mdzes pa dang / lam mdzes par bye shig/ de dag gis grong bye nos dang gsegs dang / gyo mo med par byas shes bya ba nas/ lha rnams kyi bskyed mos
83b6: tshal dga' ba'i tshal bzhin du zhes pa'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ / de nas lam mdzes pa dang / grong byer mdzes pa so sor byad par du 'phags par byas nas/ dril bsgrags pa shes ldan rgyal po'i lab na gnas pa dang / pho brang 'khor pa dang / phul sna tshogs nas
83b7: lhags pa'i skya ba tshags dag nyan cig/ gas la'i rgyal po gas la rgyal bskyed mo tshal na 'dug gis/ de byed lta dang lhan cig du gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dag gis bslu bar bya'o// nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra shing ta stong phrag dum bya bzhin du
83b8: byed/ dpung ga tshogs yan lag bzhi ba dang / kos pa'i rgyal po gas 'a rgyal lung dang // de yang ma skyes dag ring du thogs pas thubs bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal bar gyur te/ bskyed mos chab dang ha cang yang ma rang bzhigan la brag gi gzhigasang ya sa sa/

84a1: de la ldum pas la bug spar gang byin no// de nas des la bug gi rdog ma dang / lo ma dag zos pa dang / kom rab tu gyur nas rdzing drung du song ste chu doms par 'thungs nas langs pa dang / las pa rengs shing ma zhu bas thebs nas shing rta'i lam du 'grel pa
84a2: rang / de 'khor lo 'dril ba'i rdul gyi kha gang nas dus las 'das so// rgyal po ma gyes dgra bskyed mos chal du song ste phan tshun btsal bar bsams na ma rnyed de/ des phyogs bzhir pho nyata pa bkye ste tshol cig ces byas pa dang / de nas po gcig la dug gi dra bar byin nas
84a3: des ldum pa de la dris pa/ kye skyes bu bskyed mos tshal 'dir 'ongs pa 'ga' lta yod dam/ 'ongs so// de gang song / la bug spang gang khyer nas lam 'di nis rdzir bur song ngo // de de'i rjes bzhin du song na shi'i rta'i lam na dus las 'das par mthong ngo // des rgyal
84a4: po ma skyes dgral smras pa/ lha shing rta'i lam ga ge mo zhig gi phyogs su dus las 'das so// rgyal pos kye ma kyi hud ces smras nas skye bo brgya stong du mas bskor te phyogs der song ba dang / ji tsam na sha be'i ro sha ni du mi sdug pa mthong nas yang blon po rnams la smras
84a5: pa shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'di da'i yul du dus las 'das pa ngal snyan pa ma yin par gyur gyis khyod kyis 'di bkur sti chen pos bsil tshal gyi dur khrod du skyol cig/ nga yang 'di'i khog pa la mchod pa lhag par bya ba'i phyir bcom
84a6: ldan 'das la zhu'o/ / de dag gis kyang de bkur sti chen pos bsil tshal gyi dur khrod chen por stsal to// rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhibs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces gsol to//
84a7: btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bdag gi yul du dus las 'das na de'i log pa la bdag gis mchod pa ji lta bu zhig bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po ci nus ci bod kyis lus la mchod pa cher gyis shig// de nas rgyal pos
84a8: de 'og pa la mchod pa chen po byas nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas la bug gi rdog

84b1: ma dang / lom dag 'tshal nas sug pa rengs shing mazhu bas thebs te/ ngas las 'das lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' dul pa/ kos pa'i rgyal po das la rgyal nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/ tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su bsgyur gdaba'
84b2: rgal bzhi du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon ma za bar 'byung ba dag gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur te/ rgyal po chen po las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ me'i khams lam yin/ rlung
84b3: gi khams la ma yin gyi 'on kyang las dge ba dang / mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur ro// bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang / las rnams chung zar mi 'gyur te/ tshegs
84b4: shing dus dang ldan pa na lus can la 'bras bur smin/ rgyal po chen po sngon byung ba ri brags shig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed dog/
84b5: par byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa las bu pho zhig btsas te/ ji tsam na bskyed bsrings nas chen por gyur to// de dus gzhan zhig na blongs mo la song pa dang / la bug spar gang zhig rnyed do// des ma la 'di re shig zhog shig/ khrus byas te 'ong ngo zhes
84b6: btams so/ / des de la btams nas khrus byed du song ngo // sangs rgyas rnams ma byung ba'i tshe 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas ngan pa dang dman pa la thugs brtse ba can/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dang ba/ 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'byung bar 'gyur
84b7: ro/ ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba na ri bregs der byin te/ de phyogs shig tu zhag lon nas/ snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos bgos/ lhung bzed blangs te ri brags su gsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / rim gyis byim der phyin to// bram ze mo
84b8: des de lus mdzes pa dang / sems mdzes pa la sogs pa mthong ste/ de sems dad pa skyes pa de la bug spar gang rang sangs rgyas de la phul lo// bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyi tshig gis ma yin pas/ des dad pa'i rgyal po 'dabam

85a1: brkyang pa bzhin du nam mkha'i ngos la 'phags te/ cho 'phrul sna tshogs dag bstan par brtsams so// so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du dad par byed pa yin pas de shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa la gtugs pa dang / des de la snying
85a2: brtse ba byas nas song ngo / / ji tsa man bram ze'i khye'u de 'ongs nas smras pa/ yum la bug spar gang po de stsol cig/ des smras pa/ bu rjes su yi rang ba gyis shig/ ngas de rab tu byung bzhi pa'i bdag nyid can/ bsod snyoms du gnyer ba phyin nas de la phul lo zhes
85a3: byab dang / de bkres pas sdug bsngal dang yid ma bde ba skyes te smras pa/ rab tu byu bdas de zos nas ci ste lag pa rengs shing gsung de rus byas par mgyur/ rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/ bram ze'i bu gang yin pa de ni ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal
85a4: 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dis rang sangs rgyas la tshig chub mo smras pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas/ lo mang po/ lo brgya phrag mang po/ lo stong phrag mang po/ lo brgya stong phrag mang por dmyal ba rnams su skyes so// las kyi lhag ma de nyid kyis lan
85a5: drug tu lag pa rengs shing gsung bas dus las 'das te/ da lta'i dus kyi bar 'di dirang lan bdun du lag pa rengs shing gsung ba kho nas dus las 'das so// de lta bas na rgyal po chen po las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams
85a6: 'on la 'bad par bya ste/ rgyal po chen po khyod kyis de lta bur bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dad nas rjes su yi rang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mgo bos phyag
85a7: 'tshal napa bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin ldanas sod do/ / ji tsam nam la gnod kyis phags skyes po la 'di srid ces smras so// g+ha la brtul po med cing lta bang ma bkar ba dag na tshong rgyal bor gyur pa de'i tshangs patu rnams la gtagaste/ de na das dang
85a8: bor bya ba yin no/ / zhes de lta bul// mchog gi tshig rlabs po che gsungs nas gcig tu chad par mdzad de 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra yang dag par bsgrags pa gang lags pa de dgongs sam/ da ni de'i dus la bab lags so// des smras pa/ ma la gnod/

85b1: ji snyed smras pa de thams cad bya'am/ don de 'das pa yin pas thed/ rgyal po'i bye ba dag dang rgyal po'i byed pa dag yongs su nyams par 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ lha dge ba rnams ni dem bcas pa la brtan pa lags pas ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin bsgru
85b2: du gsol/ ma la gnod re shig zhog shig dang de yang mi bka' bar 'gyur ro// des smras pa/ lha 'di ni thog mar dam bcas pa lags pas gdon mi 'tshal bar brtsi 'tshal te/ deng kho na gdugs kyang bzang / yud tsam yang bzang / skar ma yang bzang /
85b3: bsod nams kyi gdugs kyang bzang bas snyed dag gis do yon ma bshams par deng nyid gshegs pa'i rigs so// de nas 'phags skyes po ma la gnod kyis bslus pas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta pa'i tshigs dang /
85b4: shing ta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams gsad pa'i phyi ri mnyan yod nas ser skya'i gzhir chas so// skabs de lta bu la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa 'am/ mi gzigs
85b5: pa 'am/ rnam par ma mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mngar ste/ de ser skyan gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyi yis chud mi ze bar mkhyen nas ches sngar mnyan yod nas ser skya'i gzhir gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das lam kar shing shA ko Ta ka shun par ri'i chus
85b6: shi mi sdug pa/ lo ma srab pa/ grib ma chung ba zhig ga drung du dkyil mo dkrung bcas te nyin mo'i gnas pas bzhugs so// rgyal po 'phags skyes pos bcom ldan 'das thag ring po nas mthong ngo // mthong nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste/ phyin nas/
85b7: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa shing lo ma sdug cing grib ma chung du ma lags pa gzhan dag mchis na ci'i sbed du bcom ldan 'das de dag spangs te/ shing shA ko Ta ka shun pa 'chus shing mi sdug pa/ lo ma srab pa/ grib ma chung ngu 'di'i
85b8: drung na bzhugs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po gnyen bshes rnams la ni gnyen bshes kyi grib ma bsil lo// 'phags skyes pos bsams pa/ bcom ldan 'das la gnyen rnams la gzigs shing thugs brtse ba mda' ste/ kye

86a1: ma bcom ldan 'das ni gnyen rnams la thugs brtse ba mdzad do snyam du rig nas de nyid nas slar log go/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ gal te ser spyan gnas pa'i shAkra rnams kyis bden pa ma mthong bar 'phags skyes po'i dmag gis
86a2: bas na bden pa dag mthong ba'i snod du mi 'gyur ro snyam du mkhyen nas shAs rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las ser skya'i gzhir byon te/ ser skya'i gzhi n+ya gro d+ha kun dga' ban bzhugs so// ser spyan gnas pa'i shAN+Da rnams kyis bcom
86a3: ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi nang na ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa las 'dir byon te/ n+ya gro/ d+hA'i kun dga' ra ba 'di khon na bzhugs so zhes thos so// thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gal ba dang song ste byin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
86a4: 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ci'i chos de lta d+han mad dang / de thos nas sog chags brgya stong zag
86a5: du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/ kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas// kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras pa zhes bya ba nas/ dge 'dun la 'bab pa la bkod do zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// ma la gnod kyis 'phags skyes
86a6: bobopomathong nas des smras pa/ lha ci ste slang lo// des smras pa/ ma la gnod bcom ldan 'das la nye du rnams la gzigs shing thugs brtse ba mnga' ste/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das nye du rnams la thugs brtse ba mnga' bas rgyal po chen po nyi du rnams la ni nyi du 'jim
86a7: mamasasi le zhes de lta bu'i gzung 'di bka' stsal to/ / de ni de'i snying la lhangs shes byed kyis/ seng bya'i na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams gsad pa mthong shig// des smras pa/ sa dge sbyong go/ ta ma ni 'dod chags dang bral ba lags te/ 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi
86a8: he dul mi lta bas deng kho na lha'i nyi ma yang bzad / yud tsam yang bzang / skar ma yang bzang / bsod nams kyi gdugs kyang bzang pas de nyid ser skya'i gzhing gshegs shishi// de mi dge ba'i grogs bos log par bzung bas dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che

86b1: tshogs dang / rta ba'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshags dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas ser skya'i bzhir song ste ha cang mi ring bzhig tu bum btab nas 'du 'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das ga pa pa der sang sa byin nas bcom ldan
86b2: 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bdag gis skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang /
86b3: ta ba'i tshegs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas ser skya na gnas de'i shAkya rnams dgum pa'i slad du ser skya'i gzhir mchis shes thos te/ de'i slad du bdag de dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas te/ 'jig rten gyi khams bzhin du bskur
86b4: ba 'am/ / 'or yug gi slad rol tu 'phang pa 'am/ ser sti'i gzhi'i grong khyer lcags kyi rabs bskor ba 'am/ lcags kyi dra bas bskor bar spro lags so// maud gal gyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyod kyis snga ma bzhin du bskor ba zhes bya ba'i bar nus mod kyi/ 'on
86b5: kyang ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ dba' rgal bzhin nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pa rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur te/ dge slong dag las
86b6: byas shing gsags pa rnams ni byi'i sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la ma yin/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge ba dang mi dgi' byas shing gsags pa rnams ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye
86b7: mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang / las rnams chung zar mi 'gyur te/ tshogs shing dus dang ldan pa na/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin/ ma gal gyi bu 'jig rten ni las bdag gir bya ba/ las kyi skye gnas pa/ las
86b8: kyi bge skal spyod pa/ las la rton pa yin pas gang gis las dge ba 'am/ sdig pa byas pa de ni las de'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// maud gal gyi bu de lta bas na las la gzhol bar bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'cha

87a1: nas sod do/ / ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis skyes du gti mug 'phags skyes po dpung gagi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang rta ba'i tshogs dang / shir rta'i tshogs dang / dpur bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas bdag cag
87a2: ru 'ongs so zhes thos so/ / thos nas de dag gis kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa glang po che'i tshogs dang / rta ba'i tshogs dang / shing rta'i tshogs dang / dpur bu chung gi tshegs go bskon nas g.yul sprad pa'i phyir 'phags skyes po logs su spags so//
87a3: dag bden pa mthong ba yin pas gsod par ni cung zad kyang mi byed kyi/ gzhan du na de'i tshe dbyug pa dang / lhag dag gis bsnun cing / gzhu rgyud dang / rgyun dang / 'phre ba rnams gcod pa dang / rna rgyan dag la mnga' 'phen par byed do// 'phags skyes po'i dpung go cha zhig
87a4: bar byas nas ser skya'i gnas su zhugs te sgo dag ba can nas rab la sbrengs te 'khod do/ / de dag gis pha rol gnod pa'i mthu nye bar bcom pa dang / mal gnod la smras pa/ mal gnod mthong ngam/ shAkya rnams kyis bdag cag brlag par byas su 'ong gis
87a5: thod la 'dod/ des smras pa/ lha thugs ma 'chad cig/ ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya rnams ni bden pa mthong ba lags pas 'di rnams srog chags grog sbur yar srog dang 'brel ba'i thugs mi thub ste/ de ni 'di dag gis bdag cag gi sems can cig
87a6: kyang ma bsad pa las mngon no/ / de des bslus nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go// shAkya rnams kyis kyang khrims su bcas pa shes ldan dag bdag cag las sus kyang 'phags skyes po'i ma nyan 'phags skyes po'i dpur la bsnun par mi bya stegang zhig snun pa de ni bdag cag ginyi du yang ma
87a7: yin/ shAkya yang ma yin no// ngab ci de'i dras na shAkya sham pa ka zhes bya ba zhig ri bregs shig na rang zhal ta byed ci las kyi mtha' byed pa des shAkya rnams kyis khrims su bcas pa ma thos so// de yang so so'i spyi bo zhig yin te/ des 'phags skyes po bdag cag gsapa
87a8: ba'i phyir sar skya'i gnas su 'ongs nas phyogs che ge mo zhig na 'dug go zhes ji lta bu yin pa thos so/ / thos nas kyang khro bas kun nas bkris pas bskyed pa'i yid mi bde bas mod la 'phags skyes po'i dpur gi thog tu drangs nas des der skye bo'i tshogs mang po zhig

87b1: ni Sha btag/ kha cig ni thim ma shi tsam du byas so// de nas 'phags skyes po yid mi bde nas smras gam gnod khyod kyis mthong ngam/ khyod cag na re 'di rig bden pa mthong ba yin pas sog chags thog sbur yang srog dang 'bral bar ma byed do zhes na/
87b2: re shig 'di gcig gis kyang bdag cag gi skye bo mang po 'di lta bu gsad na/ gal te thams cad lhags par gyur na bdag cag gi sems can 'ga' yang mi 'tshor bar 'gyu pa ga slob kyad ci dgos/ dus kyis gnas pas chog gis slar 'dod/ des
87b3: smras pa/ lA shAkya rnams kyis 'di lta bu'i khrims su bca' ba bgyis te bdag cag las gar gyis kyang 'phags skyes po 'am/ 'phags skyes po'i dpu la bsnun par// mi bya ste/ gang zhig snun pa de ni bdag cag gnyi ru yang ma yin/ shA
87b4: yang ma yin no/ / zhes dam bcas na de 'dis ma thos pas da ni 'di nang du mi chud pa'i gnas gang lags pa de mchis so// de ser skya'i gnas kyi sgor song ste/ 'dug nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag nang du 'ong gi sgo bya zhig/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyod kyis
87b5: oM gi khrim mas parnamamag sbyin na pyod pa sogagi sten pa ma yin kya ya ma yin no/ na rtags ta yo / zhes smras pa/ bdag gis byed kyi khrims sa bca' ba ma thos te 'on kyang mang du sgra tsi dgas/ gal te bdag gis byed kyi khrims su
87b6: bca' ba la na bdag gi 'khor phyir pU shigi dang gzhan du bgro'o/ / de dag gis de'i 'khor phyir byung ba dang / des de dag thaMd nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'as kyi zhabs la mgo bos myug 'tshal nas rdzogs gcig
87b7: tu 'dug go/ / phyogs cig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la shAkya sham pa kas 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gang la bgyi ba bgyi ba'i mtshan ma cung zad cig bdag la sbrul du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la rdzu 'phrul gyis
87b8: dbu skra dang / sen mo dang / tshems dag cig gnad pa dang / des de dag khyer nas yul bku dang chas so// de rnams kyis shAkya sham pa ka zhes bya ba brtson pa dang / stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhig bdag cag gi yu hu rgyal srid 'dod de do/

88a1: zhes thos so// thos nas kyang gros bya bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag shAkya sham pa ka zhes bya ba brtson pa dang / stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa zhig bdag cag gi yul du 'ong ngo zhes grag gis de'i phyir
88a2: re shig tshur shog 'dus shig/ ci de dang zad cing 'dod dam mi 'dod/ de dag thams cad re shig gi drung du 'dus te re shig 'dug pa de'i bar du sham pa kas 'khor rnams phyogs cig tu bzhag nas pade chen gyi cha lugs su byas te de dag gi drung du song
88a3: ba dang / de dag gis 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i smra ba kun du spyad nas dris pa/ khyod galas 'ongs/ des smras pa/ shAkya sham pa ka zhes bya ba brtson pa dang / stobs dang / pha rol gnon pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa de rgyal srid 'dod cing 'dir
88a4: 'ong bar 'dod de des spring yig 'di bskur gyis 'khod la ltogs shig/ de dag gis smras pa/ stan yang med na gang du 'khod/ des ral gri shubs nas phyung nas pa po dum bu dum bur gshegs te 'di la 'khod cig ces byas pa dang / de dag gis mthor nas ngo
88a5: mtshar gyi mig gdangs te smras pa/ kye skyes bu de la khyod 'dra ba de lta bu'i mi ji tsam yod/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bo ni de'i bde chen te/ kho bos lta zhig nus/ de la skyes bu dpa' bo gzhan mang du yod do// de dag gis thos nas sngangs te phan tshun smras
88a6: pashes ldan dgag gi bde chen 'di 'dra ba de'i mi gzhan ci 'dra ba zhig yod/ tshur de yod bdag cag gi rgyal por bzhug go zhes de dag gis spring yi blags nas de la sprid yig gi lan byin pa/ byon pa legs so// sman btags te bdag cag ni bka'
88a7: bzhin bgyid pa lags so/ / des spring yig gi lan khyer nas 'khor dang btsas te 'byor ba mchog dang / yul ba ku dang 'ongs pa dang / de dag gis de bkur sti chen pos bsu nas rgyal srid la gzhag go// yul bkud rnams kyis shakya sham pa ka zhes
88a8: bya ba rgyal srid la dbang bkur ro zhes kun tu sgra grags te/ rgyal po sham pa ka rgyal po sham pa ka zhes bya bar mid chags so// des der bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu skra san mo'i mchon tan byed du bcug stegs pa ga'i mchod rtenags pa ka'i mtshod rten zhes bya bar ming dgros de chung

88b1: ma dad pa med pa zhig na/ de yang de'i btsun mo dam pa yin pas des de'i do cung zad kyang dam chod pas des blon po rnams la bsgo ga/ dgon pa bsrung ba gyis shig/ de dag gis dgon pa bsrung ba byas pas da dung yang de na ri dgas dag gsod do// 'phags skyes pos
88b2: ma la gnod la smras pa/ ma la gnod de ni shAkya rnams kyis sgo rnams bcad der ba rnams su sbrengs nas/ bag brkyang ste 'khod na nges pa'i dus kyis 'chu bas ci zhig bya 'dod/ des smras pa/ lha ci grong khyer thams cad pha rol gnod pa gcig pus tshonas sam/
88b3: bdag rgyal po'i pho brang na spyod pas thos pa ni/ mkhas pa rnams ni bzham pa dang / rab tu sbyin dang bslu ba dang / kun du spyad dang lnga pa ni/ dpung gis don rnams sgrub par byed/ ces bgyi ste de lta bas na de dag la dbyen bgyi ba dgongs shig/ 'phags skyes pos de
88b4: dag la spring ba/ shes ldan dag da ni khyod la rjes su chags pa yang med/ khong khro ba yang med kyi/ 'on kyang de'o ni re bya ba cung zhig yod de/ de ngas byas shing thob nas myur ba myur bar 'gros sgo phye shig/ shAkya rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'dus la ci sgo dbye 'am/
88b5: 'on te mi dbye ba dpyad par bya'o zhes de dag thams cad 'dus pa dang / de na kha cig gis smras pa/ dbye bar bya'o// gzhan dag gis smras pa/ gal te phye na ma legs so// kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag kha cig ni dbye'o zhes zer/ gzhan dag ni phye na ma legs so//
88b6: zhes zer bas/ de'i phyir gal te khyed 'dod na tshul shing rims shig dang / skye bo mang po'i 'dod pa gang yin pa de bya'o zhes de rnams kyis tshul shing brim par brtsams so// skabs der bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis lan du ma zhig dge sbyong gau ta ma la
88b7: glags btsal zhing glan ka btsal te phyi bzhin phyi bzhin du 'brangs kyang glags ma rnyed kyis/ ma la da bdag gis 'di'i nye du rnams gab gtag go snyam du rig nas bdag nyid shAkya rgan po zhig tu mngon par sprul te rgan pa'i mthar 'dug nas des thog mar tshul shing blangs pa dang /
88b8: shAkya rgan pos tshul shing blangs so zhes thams cad kyis blangs so// de nas blo gcig pas 'phags skyes po la sprid pa nang du zhugs shig/ de dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang nang du zhugs te zhugs nas smras pa das shAkya rnams kha gtag go ngas shAkya rnams

89a1: yongs su spangs sa zhes smras pa'i tshig rjes chad ma thag tu skyes bu mtshan gzang ba rnams kyis shAkya rnams kun nas gsad par brtsams pa dang / ku tsho chen po mthon to// shAkya ming chen gyis smad de thos nas nye dum byams pas bskyed
89a2: pa'i yid mi bde bas rings pa ridris par 'phags skyes po'i drung du song ste/ des smras pa/ lha dam pa 'os pa bdag le dam pa stsol cig/ des smras pa/ khyod dam pa ci spong smros shig/ des smras pa/ lha bdag ginyi du rnams la mi 'jigs pa stsos cig/
89a3: 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ ngas khyod nyid kyi nye du rnams pa ni mi'i jigs pa mi sbyin no// 'on kyang khyod 'khor dang bcas te phyir zung shig/ des smras pa/ lha rdzi srid bdag chu'i nang du nub ste 'dug pa de srid du/ gang dag phyir 'byung ba de dag sa mi 'jigs pa
89a4: stsol cig/ des blon po rnams kyi gdong du lta bar brtsams pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ lha ming chen 'di ni khyod kyis yum mes kyang lags/ yab kyi grogs po yang lags pas 'di la ni dam pa de sum pa'i rigs so// des smras pa/ ga'ated stan de skad cig byin
89a5: no/ shAkya ming chen nye du la chags pas bskyed pa'i yid mi bde ba snying rjes brlan pa'o sems kyis chu'i rdzing du song ste/ de'i 'gram na shing sa la zhig yod pa de'i yal gardzing gi chu'i nang du nub pa de la des gtsug bud btags nas nam srog dang bal ba de'i
89a6: par du nub ste 'dug go/ / de na ser skya'i gnas na gnas pa'i shAkya gang dag gis tshogs pa can gyi las ma byas pa de dag las kha cig na ser skya'i gnas nas byung ste gyang rgyu bar song ngo // kha cig ni bal yul du dong ngo // kha cig ni grong dang grong rdal dang / rgyal po'i
89a7: yul 'khor dang / pho brang de dang de dag tu song ngo // gang dag gis tshogs can gyi las byas pa de dag ni ser skya'i gzhi'i shir skor byung nas lho nas 'jug/ lho nas byung nas nub nas 'jug/ nub nas byung nas byang nas 'jug/ byang nas byung nas shar nas 'jug pa dang / blon
89a8: po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha kye ma shAkya rnams ni tshig go// kye ma shAkya rnams ni tshig ste/ 'di na da ltar shar sgo nas nang du zhugs nas lhor 'byung / lho nas zhugs nas nub tu 'byung / nub nas zhugs nas byang tu 'brung / byang nas zhugs nas lhor 'byung ngo // bal

89b1: skyes pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag mes po de chur nub nas ring zhig lon gyis ltos shig/ blon po rnams kyis rings par chu'i rdzing du song nas brtag par brtsam pa las de tsam na rus las 'das so// de dag 'ongs te lu dus las so zhes byas pa dang /
89b2: de ci yang du kun nas bkris pas smras pa/ shes ldan dag stan shoms shig/ dza srid du lam po cher thag gi 'ang ba bab par ma gyung bar srid daphyogs 'di nas ma 'bya'o// smras pa dpa' ba rnams pa sad na khrag tung du 'byung ba don cho nyid yin pas blon
89b3: rnams phan tshun bgro bar brtsams pa/ shes ldan dag sems can 'di ni sdig pa'i las byed pa dang / dam bcas pa la brtan pa yin na/ 'dir 'di snyed kyi khrag cig ga las 'byung / rgya skags dag cig len dugazhug go zhes de rnams kyis rgya skegs blangs
89b4: nas rgya skegs kyi chu bum pa brgya stong du ma lam po char phab pa dang / 'phags skyes pos bsams pa/ bdag gi dam bcas pa rdzogs pas gro'o snyam mo// de nas skyes bu gti mug 'bags skyes pos shAkya bdun khri bdun stong bsad de phal cher ni
89b5: bden pa mthong ba sha stag go/ / des sems can de snyed bsang nas bzhon nu lnga brgya dang / bu mo lnga brgya khrid de gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba zab mo'i gnas shes bya ba ga la ba der song ba dang / mal gnos kyi smras pa/
89b6: lha khyod kyis dgra yongs su bsnyungs so// dgra 'di dag ci ste yal bar gzhag sod cig/ 'phags skyes pos gshed ma'i mi rnams la gtad de/ 'di rnams glang po che dag gis rdzing chug shig ces sgo'o// de rnams kyis glang po che dag gis rdzir gzhug
89b7: par brtsams pa dang / de dag gis glang po che de dag gan rgyal du mnan te lag pa nas lag par sbed par brtsams so// mal gnod kyis smras pa/ lha khyod kyis 'di dag gis pha rol gnon pa gzigs sam/ mthong ngo // lha 'di dag yal bar gzhag na/
89b8: la banod pa pagyi ma srung ma pa la gnad de bzhin te/ 'di dag rdo ltar gsad par bya ba dris spros shig/ des smras pa/ lha dadong du stsol la/ steng nas lcags kyi shal bas 'chal du stsol cig/ de bzhin byed du chug sheg/ des de dag da

90a1: bcug nas steng nas lcags kyi shel bas mnan to/ / de nas gnyis shig bros te bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar song ngo // son nas de gnyis bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed kyis bkab pa dang / de nyid du shi'o// shAkya rnams bsad pa na bcom
90a2: ldan 'das kyi dbu shan tu bsrung bar gyur to/ / de nas skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos mi zhig la smras pa/ kye skyes bu khyod tshung de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar sod ste 'dug la/ bcom ldan 'das cigasung de khyod kyis nyon la ngal zlos shig ces smras
90a3: nas song ngo / / ma de bcom ldan 'das kyi sgra sngar song ste 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo la chu lhung bzed dgang byen cig/ des bcom ldan 'das la chu lhung bzed gang phul lo// bcom ldan
90a4: 'das kyis deng chu'i thigs pa gnyis gsum tsam byugs pa dang / de dag chu'i ning de nas ngu bar 'phrul zhing tse ri ri zing la b+hU yang 'byin to// dge slong rnams tshe 'phrul de mthod nas yid dad cing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la nus pa/ btsun pa bcom
90a5: ldan 'das kyis phrin las chen ge mdzadan/ phrin las de'i rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das dbu bskud par gyur/ saur spyan gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis su galas kyi zhigi bgyis na/ des nongs pa yang ma mchis/ gnod pa bgyis pa yang ma
90a6: mchis par skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos bkum lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag tshur gzhan mu stegs kun tu d+hu rnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas gang du skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos shA
90a7: rnams gsad pa gal ba de kho nar de rnams dang / bdag nyid kyi las kyi rgya ba lung bstan par bya'o// btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong rab tu mang po dang thabs
90a8: gcig tu gzhan mu stegs can kun tu sku rnams kyis dga' rab pab mo'i gnas gal ba der gshegs so/ / bre bo dang rus 'thun pa'i bras ze zhig gas bcom ldan 'das thag ring po kho na nas mthong ste/ mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

90b1: gsol to/ / kye gau ta ma gang gi slad du skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos ser skya na gnas pa'i shAkya nongs pa yang ma mchis/ gnod pa bgyis pa yang ma mchis pa rnams srog dang bral ba ni bsod nams ma lags pa mang po zhig bskyed do// bcom
90b2: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bram ze de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ gang gi phyir skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos ser skyan gnas pa'i shAkya nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med pa rnams srog dang bral ba ni bsod nams ma yin pa mang mo
90b3: nig bskyedado/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gzhan mu stegs can kun rgyurnams kyi kun dga' ra ba phag mo'i gnas ga la ba der gshegs pa dang / de na ser spyan gnas pa'i shAkyalcags kyi shal bas bshal ba las srog gi lhag ma cung zad
90b4: lus pa gang dag yin pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas skad dan bton to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyogs cig tu gshegs nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal
90b5: pa/ dge slong dag ser skyan gnas pa'i shAkya 'di rnams kyis 'di dang lan gsum gyi bar du sgra chen po phyung ste/ sngon nya ba byed pa'i tshe nya 'dod pa'i phyir gang yin pa dang / chom rkun pa byed pa'i tshe grong 'joms pa'i phyir gang yin pa dang / da ltar ser skya
90b6: na gnas pa'i shAkya byed pa'i tshe skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos srog gi lhag ma cung zad tsam lus par byas te 'chi ba la mngon du phyogs pa'i tshe gang yin pa'o/ / 'di dag thams cad kyi brdol ba la ni khyad par ram/ bsam pa 'am/ tha dad du
90b7: bcung zad kyang med de mtshungs so/ / dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ shan pa 'di las de dang / bzo de dang / 'tsho ba des glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba 'am/ rta la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ shing tang zhon te bgro ba'am/ dpung bu chung dang bcas te 'gro ba'am/ nor gyi
90b8: phung po rgya chen po mang po grub nas gnas pa lha cig la mthong dam/ thos sam/ btsun pa ma lags so// dge slong dag legs so legs so// ngas kyang shan pa 'dilas de dang zhes bya ba nas/ nor gyi phung po rkyechen mo mang po brtsub nas gnas shes byaba'i bar sa

91a1: ba/ / ma bzhin te/ ma mthong ma thos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shan pa rnams ni sdig pa'i bsam pas rtog par byed de/ des na 'di glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ rta la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ shing rtar zhugs te 'gro ba'am/ dpung bu chung dang chas te/
91a2: 'gro bar yang ma 'gyur la/ nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ khyed kyis bya gag gsod pa'am/ phag gsod pa'am/ nya ba'am/ ri dgas shor ba'am/ bya ba'am/ bong bu rgyas
91a3: 'tsher ba'am/ b.lang gsod pa dag las de dang zhes bya ba nas/ nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas pa de mthong ngam/ thos sam zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ba lang gsod bsdig ci 'jam pas tog par byed de/ de nas
91a4: de glang po che la zhon te 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/ nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// dge slong dag re shig byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyis kyang sdig pa'i bsam/
91a5: pas brtags na glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba 'am/ rta la zhon te 'gro ba 'am/ shing rta la zhugs te 'gro ba 'am/ dpung bu chung dang chas te 'gro bar yang mi 'gyur la/ nor gyi phung po rgya chen po mang po bsgrubs te gnas par yang mi 'gyur na skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes
91a6: poslob pas longs shes smras pas tshul khrims kyi gzi brjid kyis nye bar bcom blta ci zhig glang po che la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ rta la zhon te 'gro ba'am/ shing rtar zhugs te 'gro ba 'am/ dpung bu chung dang chas te 'gro ba'am/ nor gyi phung po mang po bsgrubs te gnas
91a7: blta zhig smos kyang ci dgos te/ de ni gnas med do// dge slong dag kos la'i rigs 'di nis zhag bdunan sbrul gyis bltas pa bzhin du rabs chad par 'gyur ro// skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes po yang ma la gnod dang bcas te zhag bdun nams tshig nas cho
91a8: de 'don bzhin dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ gang mgal du ma la yang ngan sems mi byin rnam par shes pa dang bcas pa'i lus la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bur

91b1: bslab par bya'o/ / dge slong nams the tsom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa shAHlnga brgya po 'di rnams kyis las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas nongs pa/
91b2: da ma mchis gnod pa bgyis pa yang ma mchis par skyes bu gti mug 'phags skyes pos srog dang bral/ bcom ldan 'das kyang shAkya rnams babum pa'i tshed dbusun tshabs chen pos thebs par gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ da/
91b3: slong dag 'di dag nyid dang / ngas las byas shing bsags pa tshogs rnyed pa/ rgyan yongs su bsgyur ba/ dpa' nal bzhin nye bar gnas pa/ gdan ma ze bar 'byung bdag yin te/ 'di dig dang ngas las byas shing bsags pa gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'brur/
91b4: dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa rnams ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ chu'i khams la ma yin/ me'i khams la ma yin/ rlung gi khams la ma yin gyi/ 'on kyang las dge bdang mi dge ba byas shing / bsags pa rnams ni zin/
91b5: ba'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ bskal pa brgya phrag rnams su yang / las rnams chung zar mi 'gyur te/ tshogs shing dus la bab pa na// lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin// dge slong dag sngon byung ba chu bo zhig/
91b6: gi 'gram na nya ba lnga brgya gnas so// de rnams kyis nya gnyis shig rgya mtsho chen po na phan tshun rgyu rgyu ba las chu bo der zhugs pa mthong ba dang / de rnams rab tu dga' ba skyes nas de dag nya rgya chen pos brkus so// de rnams kyi sad gnyis kyi lus mthong nas bres bya ba/
91b7: brtsam pa/ shes ldan dag 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ 'di dag lus che ches bas gal te gsad na sha sdom par ma 'gyur te/ de 'dul bar 'gyur ro// de na kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di la ci zhig bsgrub tu yod/ gcig ni bsad la cig ni gtags te gzhag mod
91b8: gzhan dag gis smras pa/ 'di yang che ste/ 'di yid ldom par mi 'gyur bas sdong po la btags la gson por sha bcad cing bcad cing btsod do// de rnams kyis smras pa/ legs te de ltar bya'o// de dag gis de ltar bya bar brtsams pa dang / de dag de ltar gcod//

92a1: ban rang gi skad du 'o dod 'bod par brtsams so// de dag mi bde ba de nye ba'i khye'u zhig gis thos nas rab tu dga' ba skyed par byed do// de nas nya de gnyis de ltar bcad pa'i tshe de rnams la 'di lta bu'i sems skyed de gang bdag cag gis
92a2: nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par 'di dag gis 'di ltar bsad de/ de'i phyir bdag cag kyang gang du 'di dag nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par gsod par 'gyur ba der skye bar gyur cig/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ nya gnyis po/
92a3: gang dag yin pa de dag ni 'phags skyes po dang / ma la gnod 'di dag kho na yin no nya ba lnga brgya gang dag yin pa de dag ni shAHlnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin te/ gang 'di gnyis kyis nya de dag de ltar gsad pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar 'phags skyes po dang mal
92a4: gnod dag gis shAkyar gyur pa nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med pa rnams lcags kyi shal bas gnon cing 'o dod 'bod bzhin gsad do// nye ba'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na de yin te/ gang des nya gsang ba na rab tu dga' ba
92a5: bskyed pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas da ltar da mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang dbu snyun tshabs chen pos thebs par gyur to/ / gal te ngas yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob par ma gyur na da yang las 'di lta bu dag thob par 'gyur ro// dge slong dag
92a6: gzhan yang ser skyan gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis las gang byas pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba chom rkun lnga brgya zhig gis lam du 'gro ba dag bcom nas phrogs pa'i rdzas dag khyer te/ ri brags zhig tu 'joms su sor ro// de dag gis
92a7: thugs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs de thams cad bcom nas phrogs so/ / khyim bdag gnyis shig yang thog tu 'jog te 'dug pa dang / rkun po rnams kyis smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang dag 'dir 'ardzogs pa de dag bobs shig / thams cad kyi thams cad du
92a8: med par mur ta re/ de gnyis kyis smras pa/ ji srid 'tshe ba de srid du mi 'babs so// de rnams kyi rtsa ba dang / shing phal mo che bcer nas yang rtog de me btang ba dang / de gnyis tsha bas sdug bsngal bskyed pas gdungs te 'di lta bu sems skyed do// dag caganyis

92b1: pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par 'di rnams kyis bsad pas bdag cag kyang 'di rnams nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par gsod par gyur cig/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/ khyim bdag gnyis po gang dag yin de dag ni 'phags// /
92b2: skyes po dang ma la gnod 'di dag kho na yin no// g.yon can lnga brgya po gang dag yin pa de dag ni shAkya lnga brgya po 'di dag kho na yin te/ gang 'di rnams chom rkun par gyur pas de dag nyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par srog dang bral ba'i las de'i rnam par smin
92b3: bas da ltar 'phags kyis pos ma la gnod dang bsdongs nas shAkya lnga brgya po 'di gnyes pa yang med/ gnod pa byas pa yang med par srog dang bral lo// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang ga cig tu gnagal/ gceg tun pa/
92b4: ba rnams kyi yang gcig tu dkar 'dren ma rnams kyi yang 'dren ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams spangs nas las gcig tu dkar ba da dag brtsam par bya ste/ dge slong rnams kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o// 'phags
92b5: skyes pos shAkya rnams de ltar gsad nas mnyan yod du song ngo / / de nang du zhugs pa dang / rgyal po'i gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed steng gi khang bzangs su song nas skyes pa med par rol mos rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa/ 'phags skyes
92b6: thos nas des smras pa/ shes ldan dag rtse ba'o ni su zhig blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ gzhon nu rgyal bu rgyal byed lags so// des smras pa/ shes ldan dag de bos shig/ de rnams kyis bos pa dang / 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ rgyal bu rgyal byed nga ni dgragasad//
92b7: nas 'ongs na khyod rtse zhing 'dug gam/ des smras pa/ lha'i dgra su dag zhig lags/ shAkya rnams so// gal te shAkya rnams khyod kyi dgra lags na/ mdza' bo ji lta bu dag cig lags/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag 'di yang de dag gi phyogs kho na yin pas 'di
92b8: gsad par bya'o zhes de dag gis de bsad de dus las 'das nas lha gya nom pa sum bcu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nang du skyes nas/ de'i mi'i rol mo'i sgra ma zhi bar lha'i sgra byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/

93a1: bsod nam byas pa 'dir dga' byi mer dgag/ gnyi gar dga' ste de ni bdag nyid kyi/ las rnam smin mthong de dga' rab tu dga' 'gro ba bzang por song ba phyir zhing dga'/ gsod nams byas pa 'di rimagra byi mi mgu// gnyis gar ma
93a2: 'i shA / las rnam phrin mthaMd de mthar pa mahA/ 'thob yang bang song khyed na maT/ de nas bcom ldan dag pa dang rdzun pa kran ga pos 'drin ces gal to// tsun pa tshogs dmam la lagasas/ ma
93a3: 'das kyis paka/ 'phrul pa/ na dag ba bzhin rgyal brartsal byed de nyes pa med cing gnod pa ya pa de sa gra ti mug pags skyes po'i srog da ma nyid ci do ma'i bri ma'i ba gA'i thung / de sa da sa nas 'dag du / gsod pam
93a4: byas pa 'dir dga' phyi mar dga' zhes bya ba nas/ 'gro ba bzang por song pa phyir zhing mgu// zhes bya ba'i bar dugasungs so zhes gsungs pa dang / dacang mi smra bar 'dug go// ji tsam dus gzhan zhigi na 'phags skyes po btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du ngos zhing rnam par
93a5: dos te/ rgyal can mthu dang ldan pa dpa' bo brtson 'grus dang pha rol gnon pa can gang dag yin pa de dag ngas rmeg med par byas ste/ dadang 'dab su zhig yod ces zer ro// de nas 'phags skyes pos bAkya'i bumo lnga brgya khrid pa de dag gis kyang tshigs su bcad de
93a6: smras pa/ khyod kyis gang dag rmeg med byas// de dag rgyal sras bkyu'i sras/ bslab pa'i sdom pas parnams pa yin/ khyod kyis 'dir zlas ci nig drung / de nas ces smras pa dang / khros nas blon po rnams la tshigs su bcad pas pacwo ga klu rnams bas dan k+Sham
93a7: bu mo dag/ dug gis gdab sprin gyis khebs pa ltar/ 'di dag la gor gang lag rnams chod la nye du de dag nyid rjes myur du thong / blon po rnams kyis shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dmar bu can gyi rdzid 'gram du lag pa dang rkang ba dag bcad de/ de lag pa'i dod lag pa'i
93a8: deng zhes bya bar ming chags nas gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du med sde'i mgol bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na lag pa'i dong gi rdzing 'gram na thugs so nas bris so/ / // 'dul ba phra tshogs cig na/ bam po dgu pa/ de rnams sdug bsngal na

93b1: bzang banub pa tshab yi du mi 'od ba'i tshor ba nyams su myong ba na bsams pa/ bdag cag mi bzang ba dog pa nyam nga bar gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi ma dgongs pa lta snyam mo// skabs de bu las das rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi mkhyen pa sa mi gzigs pa'am/
93b2: thugs su ma chung ba'am/ rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mda' ste/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bskul nas phyogs der gshegs pa dang / ji tsam na bud med de dag thams cad sgren mor 'dug pa gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan
93b3: 'das kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed do/ / chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe srog chags grog sbur rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis shes so// gang gi tshe 'jig
93b4: rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i tshe ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs sems kyis mi shes na/ dud 'gro'i skyes gnas su song ba'i srog chags rnams kyis lha smos kyang ci dgos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
93b5: dgongs pa kye ma lha'i bu mo bde sogs kyis gos dag dang chu khyer te 'ongs kyang bla na snyam du bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs bskyed ma thag du lha'i bu mo bde sogs kyi ras zung lnga brgya dang / mtsho chen po ma dros pa las chu blangs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song
93b6: se byid das com ldan 'das kyi nabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di sa dpas gsol to/ / btsun pa ras yug lnga bcwa 'di dag dang ma 'tshal te mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ song la gA kya bri mo'o ni rnams dbugs byung
93b7: gas byung nas rkang ba dang lag pa dag zlas la gos rnams ston cig/ btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes byas nas/ des de rnams kyi rkang pa dang lag pa dag krus nas gos rnams brtson no/ nas bcom ldan 'das byi napas pamag pas phyag kyi
93b8: te bcom ldan 'das kyi spya sngar 'khod do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi na rdzu 'phrul gyis shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya po de rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgyun bcad do// rgyun bcad nas bka' stsal pa/ sring mo dag khyed nyid kyis las 'di dag byas shing gsags pa/

94a1: tshogs pa rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bskur ba dpa' rgal bzhin nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung ba yin te/ khyed kyis las byas shing gsags pa rnams gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur// sring mo dag las la bzhol bar gyis
94a2: shig ces gsungs nas bcom ldan 'das gshegs so/ / de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la sems rab tu dad par byas nas dus las 'das te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du sres so// chos nyid kyis lha'i bu'am lha'i bu mo sbas nas rang
94a3: po ma lon pa la sems gsum skye ste/ gang nas shi 'phos pa dang / gang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis yin pa'o// de rnams kyis mi rnams kyi nang nas shi 'phos pa dang / rgyal chen bzhi ba'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang / las gang gis zhe na/ bcom
94a4: ldan 'das la sems rab tu dad par byas pas yin par mthong ngo / / de nas sngon shAkya'i bu mo byed byed pa'i lha lnga brgya po de rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ca gzhag tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dod pa ni cha ma yin gyis/ mal bdag cag
94a5: zhag ma lon pa nyid du bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'dong ngo / / snyam mo// de nas sngon shAkya'i bu mo byed byed pa'i lha rnams rna cha gdub 'khor dri ma med pa g.yo ba thogs shing / lus do shal dang sen mo dos brgyan nas de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha rdzas kyi me tog sud
94a6: bal dang / pad ma dang / ku mu dngang / pad ma dkar po dang / man dA ra ba rnams kyis bru ba bkang nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog rnams kyis gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos
94a7: mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang / bag la nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin mkhyen nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan pa mdzad pa dang / de rnams kyis de thos nas 'jigs tshegasal/
94a8: lta ba'i ra'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyis rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas so// de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas cad du brjod pa lan gsum brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gang bdag cag la sman gtags pa 'di lta bu ni bdag

94b1: cag la mas ma bgyis/ pas ma lags/ rgyal pos ma lags/ lha rnams kyis ma lags/ rang gi skye bo dang mnyen sdug pa'i tshogs kyis ma lags/ sngon gyi mes po rnams kyis ma lags/ dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis ma lags te/ khrag dang mchi ma'i
94b2: rgya mtsho ni bskams/ / rus pa'i ri las ni bsgral/ ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bcad/ mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni bye/ lha dang mi rnams la ni bkod do// yang smras pa/ khyod kyi mthu yis ngan song lam dag ni/ shin tu mi bzad nyes med ldan pa bcad/ mtho
94b3: ris sgo gyi bdag gi bsod nams ni/ shin du bzang dang mya ngan 'das la mthob/ khyod bsnyen de ring bdag gis skyon bral zhing / shin tu rnam par dag mig da thog 'phags pa dgyes pa'i go 'phang zhi ba'ang thog sdug bsngal rgya mtsho pha rol mchog tu rgal/ 'gro ba
94b4: lha min lha dang mis mchod cing / skye rga 'chi ba'i skyon dang bral ba po// srid pa stong du mthong rab rnyed dka' ba// thub pa khyod deng mthong ba 'bras bu mchis// de nas se mo do 'byung dga' skyes rnams// zhabs gnyis la ni gdung ba byas nas kyang / dgra thul ba la yongs
94b5: su bskor byas nas/ slar yang lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs dong // dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa shAkya'i bu mo lnga brgya po dag gis las ci zhig bgyis na des lag
94b6: pa dang rkang pa dag bkram/ las ci zhig bgyis na des lha rnams kyi nang du skyes/ las ci zhig bgyis na des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di dag nyid kyis las byas
94b7: shi gsags pa/ chog rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can nams la 'bras zung sbyin/ ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bsas pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgra'i tshal te tshwa thub pa na bzhin gshegs pa dgra tsam pa yang dag par
94b8: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbur ba bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ston pa 'od bsrung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i gsung

95a1: rab la 'di rnams rab du byung bar gyur to/ / de na 'di rnams kyis slob pa'i dang mi slob pa'i dge slong rnams la lag rdum rkang rdum zhes bya ba'i tshig kun du spyod pa kun du spyad de las de'i rnam par smin pas lo mang por dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skyes so// las de
95a2: nyid kyi lhag mas 'di nams su tshe bas lnga brgyar lag pa dang / rkang pa dag bcad da// lta bar du yang lag pa dang rkang ba dag bcang ba yin no// gang nga la sems rab tu da per byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas na lba rnams kyi nang du skyes so// gang 'di rnams
95a3: kyis de na lung mnos pa dang / blogs pa dang / kha ton byas pa des na de'i spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar byas pa yin no// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/ brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bur bslab par bya'o//
95a4: zhes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de nas mi de 'phags skyes po'i drung du 'ongs pa dang / 'phags skyes pos smras pa/ kye skyes bu bcom ldan 'das ci gsung / des smras pa/ lha bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas 'di nas zhag bdun gos pa'i rgyal gis sbrul gyis
95a5: bltas pa bzhin du rabs 'chad par 'gyur ro/ / 'phags skyes po yang ma la gnod dang bcas te mes tshig bzhin sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ngo // 'phags skyes pos thos nas lag pa 'akram la la gtang
95a6: nas sems khongs su chud de 'dug go/ mal gnod kyis smras pa/ lha khyod ci'i phyir phyag 'gram pa la gartad nas sems khongs su chud cing bzhugs/ des smras pa/ ma la gnod 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces zhag bdun na 'phags skyes po mal
95a7: gnod dang bas te mes tshig bzhin sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par ltung bar 'gyur ngo zhes gsung na/ nga ji ltar sems khongs su chud cing mi 'dug// des smras pa ltagang shig bram ze 'ongs pal 'tshal ma mi stsol ba de yang phung ba brgya stong du sems na/
95a8: lhas dge sbyong gau ta ma'i gnyen gshes de rnyed cig bkum pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// de de skad gsung yang rung gzhan gsung yang rung ste/ 'on kyang lhas bskyed mos tshal du chab kyi nang du khang bzangs ka ba gcig pa zhig bgyid du stsal te/ lha der gshegs nas/

95b1: dgung bdun du gzhugs la dgung bdun 'das pa dang / slar mnyan yod du gshegs par mdzod cig/ des smras pa/ de ltar byas 'gro'o zhes de btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te der song nas 'dug go// nyin zhag gcig thal ba dang / ma la gnod kyis smras pa/ lha
95b2: dgung zhag bdun las gcig ni thal lags/ lhag ma dgrang zhag drug mchis te/ dgung zhag drug 'das nas mnyan yod du gshegs par mdzad do// zhes bya ba nas/ nyan zhag gnyis dang gsum nas bdun pa la lha der kho na la mnyan yod du gshegs par mdzad do
95b3: zhes bya ba'i bar de bzhin du byas so/ / de na yul ngan zhig kyang byung bar gyur ro// bud med na rkyen la dga' ba yin pas batshan mo'i 'khor rnams kyis smras pa/ pu nu mo dag bdag cag dang mnyan yod du 'dod dgos pas rgyan thogs par bya'o zhes de rnams
95b4: kyis rgyan thogs par brtsams so/ / de na btsun mo'i 'khor zhig gis sngas nang tshangs can gyi steng du nor bu me shel bzhag nas rgyan thogs par brtsams so// ji tsam na yul ngan sangs pa dang / nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis me shel gyi thog tu bab nas me byung ba de sbas
95b5: nang tshangs can la mched do/ / de las kyang khang bzangs la mched nas btsun mo'i 'khor rnams ni bros so// 'phags skyes po dang ma la gnod tshig bzhin bros par brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na mi ma yin pa dag gis sgo rnams bcad nas 'phags skyes pos tshig
95b6: bzhin du smras pa/ ma la gnod tshig go// des smras pa/ lha chos so zhes de dag de skad du 'o dod 'bod cing dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba de la tshigs su bcad pa dag bka' stsal pa/ sdig pa byas pas 'dir tshig
95b7: phyi mar tshig/ gnyi gar tshig ste de ni bdag nyid kyid las rnam smin mthong ngo tshig rab tu tshig/ 'gro ba ngan par song ba phyir zhing tshig/ sdig pa byas pa 'dir sme phye mar smre/ gnyi gar sme ste de ni bdag nyid kyi/ las rnam smin mthong de sgra rab tu ste/ 'gro ba ngan
95b8: par song ba phyir zhing smre/ / zhes gsungs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gi/ don bdag gis ma 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dka' bo skyes bu

96a1: gti mug 'phags skyes po de ma la gnod dang bcas te mas tshig bzhin dmyal ba mnang med par song stengs de las dgongs nas/ sdig pa byas pa 'dir tshig phyi mar tshig/ ces bya ba nas 'grob ngan par song ba phyir zhing ste/ zhes bya ba'i bar
96a2: gsungs pa yin no/ / gang ga tshe 'phags skyes pos shAkya rnams bsad pa de'i tshe shAkya'i bu mo rnams kyis de rnams kyi rgyan dag mthong nas dra bar brtsams ste// de rnams kyis bsams pa/ shAkya rnams ni 'phags pa rnams la mngon par dad ba yin pas
96a3: rgyan 'di dag 'bags pa rnams pa dngul li zhes de rnams kyis rgyani de dag dge slong rnams la phul lo/ / drug sde rnams kyis rgyan de dag thogs nas ser skya'i gnas su zhugs pa dang / shAkya'i bu mo rnams kyis de dag mthong nas de bzhin du byang gyung
96a4: cing smras pa/ 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis de'i slad du 'di dag bul na nyes dmigs de nyid byung bar gyur to zhes byas bu dang / de dag cang mi smra par 'dug go// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
96a5: dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong rnams rgyan thegs pa las gyur gyis de lta bas na dge slong gis rgya na sdeb ma dang / chad phrul can dang / zlagam can dang / ser sku dang / rgyun sna tshogs ci yang rung ba yang thogs par mi bya ste// thog na 'gal tshabs
96a6: can du 'gyur ro/ / sdom ni/ blangs pa dang ni bslab pa dang / dra ba'i ri lu sman cebu bcas// lhung bzed snod dang byang ba dang / mang dkar 'bru mar drug pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod ni rdul bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mngon med pas sbyin gyi kun dga'
96a7: ban bzhugs so/ / bregs zhig na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas dad dang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// dus gzhan zhig na nye du rnams kyang zad par gyur/ nor yang zadang longs spyod kyang
96a8: bad nas/ des bsams pa/ de ni bdag rgas pas nor bsgrub par bya yang mi nus/ bdag la longs spyod dag kyang med/ bdag gi nyi du rnams kyang dus las 'das pas/ seng la rab tu 'byung ngo snyam du rig nas des chung ma la spras pa/ bzang mo de ni rags bsonar

96b1: bsgrub par bya yang mi nus/ ngal longs spyod dag kyang med/ nga'i nye du rnams kyang dus las 'das pas khyod la dris te song la rab tu 'byung ngo // khyim bdag de drang po zhig na de ni g.yos kun du spyod cing rtag tu skyes pa gzhan dag la lta ba zhig pas des smras pa
96b2: rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig/ 'on kyang dus dus su ltar spyon cig/ des de bzhin bya'o zhes dam bcas nas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ dge slong zhig gi drung du phyin nas smras pa/ 'phags pa rab tu 'byung bar 'tshal lo// des smras pa/ bzhin
96b3: bzangs khyed 'jigs pa med par spobs pa dge ste legs so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas ni rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya ba nyid du 'ongs te/ lnga gang zhe na/ bdag gis rang gi don ma 'dres pa thob par 'gyur bar
96b4: yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang / bdag gang dag gi zin dang / mngag gzhug pa dang / bkol ba dang / rang dbang med pa dang / dga' mgur 'gror med pa yin pa de dag gis mchod par bya bar 'gyur ba dang / bstod par
96b5: bya bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang / mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa 'thob par 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid
96b6: dang / bdag mya ngan las 'das pa grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa ma thob pa las yongs su nyams kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur bar yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas
96b7: kyinyan thos skyes bu dam pa yang dag par song ba mchog rnams kyi rnam grangs du mar rab tu 'byung ba bsngags par yang dag par mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung bar mos par bya bar 'os nyid do/ / zhes bka' stsal te/ khyod kyis sems bskyed pa dges legs
96b8: bar gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'di la rab tu byung shig ces des de rab tu byung ba bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so/ / de nas zhag gnyis gsum zhig kun du spyad pa'i chos bslabs nas smras pa/ bzhin bzangs ri rigs kyis ri rigs mi ses kyis mnyan yod kyi

97a1: chen por rang gi spyod yul mi'i yul du bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing 'tshe bar gyis shig/ de phyi de nyin sde dro sham thabs dang tshes gos bgos lhung bzed thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs so// de bsod snyoms la chub na rang gi chung
97a2: ma 'dra ba'i bud med cig mthong nas/ des bsams pa/ bdag gi sngon gyi chung ma de la rab tu byung nas/ ltar 'ong ngo zhes dam bcas kyis de'i phyir bdag gzod rab tu byung ba yin pas dus cung zad cig bsdad pa de mi dga' bar mi 'gyur bar de ltar 'gro
97a3: snyam du bsams nas/ bsod snyoms la brgyus te rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song do// de dus chung zhig bsdad nas/ mkhan po la spras pa/ mkhan po bdag la sngon mchis 'brang zhig mchis te/ de la bdag gis rab tu byung nas ltar mchil nas
97a4: dam bcas pas de'i slad du gnang bar mdzod cig dang mchi'o/ / des smras pa/ bu seng la khyod kyis sems srungs shig/ des smras pa/ bsrung bar bgyi'o zhes smras nas chas pa dang / rim gyis ri bregs der phyin no// des de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ba dang /
97a5: dga' ba dang bcas shing myur ba myur bas bsu nas smras pa/ rje'i sras byon pa legs so byon pa legs te/ ring mo zhig lon nas mthong ngo zhes smras nas/ reg par brtsams pa dang / des smras pa/ ci byed chos gos dag blangs nas gnyel ba sor gzhug mod/
97a6: des smras pa/ mareg shig/ ci'i slad du mkhan pos ngal khyod kyi sems srungs shig ce ske'o// des smras pa/ rje'i sras khyod sems srungs dag mod/ bdag gi bkag ga ma ci zhes des de'i choso go// blangs stan pa ting stend pa bkrus nas bslus so// de nas khrus byas nas zan byin te/ de yang de nyid du zan bza' bar
97a7: 'dug pa dang / des smras pa/ ci byed des smras pa/ rje'i sras khyed dang lhan cig zan zos nas ring mo zhig lon no// des smras pa/ mkhan pos nga la khyod kyis sems srungs shig ces sgo'o// des smras pa/ rje'i sras khyod sems srung sa rag mod/
97a8: bdag gis bkag gam ci bdag khyod dang lhan cig zan zos nas ring mo zhig len pas gdon mi za bar bza'o// zhes des de dang lhan cig zan zos so// de nas mal bshams nas smras pa/ rje'i sras gzims mal 'dir shul gyis gnyel ba'i gnyel sos shig/

97b1: des rkang pa bkrus nas nyal ba dang / de yang de nyid du nyal bar brtsams so// des smras pa ci byed/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras khyod dang lhan cig nyal nas ring mo zhig lags pas ma bkyon cig/ des smras pa/ mkhan pos ngal byed kyi sems spangs shig ces bsgo'o//
97b2: nges zlas pa/ rje'i sras khyod sems srung la rag mod/ bdag gis bkag gam ni khyod dang bdag lhan cig nyal nas ri ma zhig lags pas gdon mi za bar nyal bar bgyi'o// des ma bathub pa dang / des bsams pa/ mgul nas 'jus na bdag gi dbang du 'gyur ro snyam
97b3: nas des de'i mgul nas 'jus pa dang / bud med ni rig pa'i drug yin pas reg patsam gyis log par spyad do// dus ring zhig 'dug nas smras pa/ bzang mo 'tha'o// des bsams pa'adi dang bdag lhan cig gas ba byas pa gang yin pa de dge slong rnams kyis mashes
97b4: bas skye bo mang pos shes par bya'o/ / des na de dag gis bskrad pas slar 'ong bar 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas/ des smras pa/ rje'i sras de bzhin du ji ltar bzhud lam rgyags kyi zong kar sha pa Na dag sdoms shig// des smras pa/ bzang mo dge slong rnams dbyig
97b5: la mi reg na ji ltar blang / des smras pa/ rje'i sras bdag gis ji nas kyang mi reg pa de ltar bgyis snoms shig ces des dbyig thum bor bcug nas bcings te khar sil gyi rtse ba la gtags so// dregs pas ldongs pa dang / sred pas ldongs pa rnams ni mi byed pa
97b6: cung zad kyang med pas des de khyer te song ba dang / rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin no// drug sde rnams kyi kun du spyod pa ni drug sde gang yang drung ba zhig gis rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi sgo mi stongs pa yin pas tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi ston
97b7: 'chag cing 'dug pa des de thag ring po nas mthong na sgra smra ba'i me tog lta bu/ smin ma rab tu 'phyang ba zhig nas des bsams pa/ dge slong gnas brtan zhig 'ong gis bsung 'gro'o zhes de gsu song ste/ gnas brtan byon pa legs so// byon pa legs so zhes byas
97b8: ba dang / de slob dpon phyag 'tshal lo phyag 'tshal lo zhes zer nas tshe dang ldan pa nye dgas bsams pa/ kye mo 'di ni rgan zhugs zhig ste/ slob dpon yang mi shes mkhan po yang mi shes so// re shig 'dig las 'ongs pa dri'o snyam du bsams nas smras ga/ na zhugs

98a1: khyod ga las 'ongs/ des smras pa/ slob dpon padag sngon gyi mchis brang zhig mchis pa ltar mchis te/ bdag de nas mchis so// rgan zhugs legs te khyod ni byas pa bzo ba zhig go// byas pa bzo ba ni mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags te/ bcom
98a2: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na/ 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ 'di ltar byas pa bzo ba dang byas pa tshor bar bya zhing byas pas chung ngu yang chung gzan par mi bya na/ chen po lta mos kyang ci dgos shes bka' stsal to// sngon gyi chud
98a3: ma mthong ngam mthong lags so/ / de khams bde 'am/ khams bde lags so// rgyan zhugs de ni go na khar sil gyi tsa ba la 'phyar ba 'o ni ci yi ni/ slob dpon de shul rgyags kyi zod du ka ra sha pa Na ra gcig stsal ba lags so rgan zhugs khyod lta bsod nams
98a4: byas pa zhig ste/ mngon gyi chung ma yang mthong la/ rnyed pa yang grub bo// slob dpon khyod kyi bka 'drin lags so// des bsams pa/ 'di las bzhan yang 'byung gis/ re shig 'di la dri bar bya'o snyam nas des de la tshig 'jam po brjod pa'i tshul gyis thams
98a5: cad dris pa dang / rgan zhugs de drang po'i rang bzhin can zhig pas des ji ltar gyur pa brnyad do// des smras pa/ rgan zhugs de thams cad mkhan po la spros shig dang // khyod kyi mkhan po yi dga' bar 'gyur ro// de de ltar bslus pas ji ltar
98a6: d+hAd+ha ma ngol da pa dang / sa kya da blo rnamamapa kyad / dge slong rnams kyis kyang com ldan das la gsor so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag skyes bu gti mug 'di sbyor ba nyams kyi bsam pa ni mnyams so// 'dibs pas babyung ste/
98a7: de lta bas na gnang gis rab tu byung ma thag tu phas pham par gyur pa'i chos bzhi rgyas par shod cig dang / nyes pa 'dir mi'i 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan modon rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
98a8: bzhugs so/ / mnyan yod na dge slong dga' ba can zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de rtag tu dgon pa nags mtha'i gnas mal dag na bsam gtan byed pa zhig pas de'i ming bsam gtan pa dga' ba can zhes bya bar chags so// de gang gi tshed dkyil mo dkrung

98b1: bcas nas bsam gtan byed pa de'i tshe bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis gtses so/ / des dus gzhan zhig na dkyil mo dkrung bcas te/ 'dug pa dang / bdud kyi ris kyi lha mo zhig gis de'i dkyil mo dkrung gi steng du 'dug pa dang / bud mod ni reg pa'i drug yin pas
98b2: des de dang lhan cig log par spyad do/ / log par spyad ma thag tu zug dus zug pa bzhin du gnod nas sems skyed pa bdag gis mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten pas pang / yod la'ayas sosam mo yang bsams pa bdag gis bcab pa'i sems cig
