181b1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni dang po'o// 'di ni gnyis pa'o// 'di na gsum pa'o zhes yi ge bri bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis tshen nyid du tshes gos dag bcug pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshon nyid du chos gos dag
181b2: gzhug par mi bya'i 'on kyang gzhong lung du tshon thugs la bsug par bya'o/ / dge slong gis ha cang gsher bal bsugs pas de 'khus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang gsher ba la bsug par mi bya'o// dge slong dag gis hacangags
181b3: pa la bsug pas chos gos dag khra bor gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang gam po la bsug par mi bya'i 'on kyang ngan tsam la bsug par bya'o// dge slong rnams chos gos dgas la skems par byed de/ de dag rdul gyis dri ma can du
181b4: gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa la bskam par mi bya'o// dge slong dag gis chu ba ting nas bskams te tshon phyogs gcig tu song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzar byags btags la der bskam par bya'o// de
181b5: slong dag gis de bzhin du gzar thag la bkal bas bar du tshen ma chags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grwa nas tha gus btags la rgyang shing bras nas gzungs btab ste bskam par bya'o// dge slong dag gis bsubs nas ma bzlog ste tshon
181b6: phyogs gcig tu 'dris nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang dang yang du bzlog par bya'o// snam sbyar gzhan dag cig tshad che ste gzang thag lam shong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtswa bting nas bskam par bya zhing yang dang /
181b7: yang du bzlog par bya'o// dge slong dag chos gos rnying pa dag la ni tshe na sar pa ldugs/ chos gos sar pa dag la na tshen rnying pa lkugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tshe na sa rapa yang sar pa kho na dag la grugs par bya zhing rnying pa yang rnying /
181b8: pa dgal blugs par bya'o// dge slong rnams chos gos sar pa dag ni grib ma la skams/ rnying pa dag ni nyi ma la sems nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sar pa dag ni nyi ma la bskam par bya zhing / snying pa dag ni grib ma la bskam par bya'o//

182a1: gsung ga dang ba na pon gsum pa/ do gtu gas pa/ ga tud mo lpags pas dang ba lhag par byar nas/ brtsam ldan 'das u0f7fsa bka' stsal pa/ ra du pa dang gnyis bkrugs par bya zhing gyis gas
182a2: bzugs par / / gsung gags nang drab granas pas rnas gas dga'ab shA nas/ ma ldan das kyis paka'adul pa/ shAn sugapa byag/ gsang gagis da na pa rgya ma du bkrugs pa nga
182a3: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi bsugs par bya'o// dge slong gzhan gcig can kyi las byed pan drung dang char bzung nas dge grang rnams kyags gang du bska pa nas chos gas dag pan tshun srad par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
182a4: pa/ rlung dang char ba zung na khang bzangs su tshan gyi las bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rlung dang char ba zung nabang bzangs su tshan gyis las bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis khang bzangs su tshon gyi las byas pas khang bzangs tshon gyis
182a5: sngags nye bar sngags shing 'dug pa bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ 'phags pa khrag 'dig las bo/ dge slong dag gis sbas pa/ 'di khrag ma yin gyi kho bo cag gis phyogs 'dir tshon gyi las byas so// de dag gis smras pa/
182a6: bdag cag gis khrag yin no snyam du bsams so// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs der ba lang gi lci ba 'am 'jim pas thug par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan
182a7: 'das mnyan yod na rgyal brgyal byed kyi tshal mgan med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon pad zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la rgyal byed kyi chal phul ban de'i zla skyes pa/ bdag gis
182a8: rgyal byed kyi tshal sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul na de rtsig pa de na ri mo ma bris pas song la bcom ldan 'das la gnang bar gsol te bri'o snyam nas/ de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la/

182b1: mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'duganas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'dir rtsig pa dag ri mo ma bris te de'i grang dragal
182b2: te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na dacig pa ri mo bri bar 'tshal lo/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag gnang gis bris shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsig pa ri mo bri bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis
182b3: tshon sna dus ri mo bri ba ma shes nas/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la gnang ste/ rtsig pa ri mo bri bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa de tshon sna ru zhig gis bri bar bkyi lags
182b4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis ma shes pa de khyed kyis dris pa legs so legs so// tshon sna bzhi po sngon po thams cad dang / ser po thams cad dang / dmar po thams cad dang / dkar po thabs
182b5: cad kyis bri bar bya'o/ / 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi// / bam po bcu bdun pa// sdom ni/ mkhar len pa yi spyad dag dang // bug can gyi khri'u dang ni// phyag dang skra rnams bzed pa dang // phreng ba khab dang tsher ma'o//
182b6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med pas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig gnas pa de'i khyim du bsod snyoms pa zhig dus dus du 'das dang byabs su 'thob pa/ srab pa'i
182b7: gzhi dag la bzhag go/ / dus gzhan zhig na de la rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yang rung ba zhig bgyi'o//
182b8: bsod snyoms pas smras pa/ khyim bdag legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig 'phags pa ci zhig bgyi/ khyim pa dag dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gyis shig/ 'phags pa bdag la kar sha la Na dag ni mchis na/ 'on kyang chos kyi grogs bgyid pa ma

183a3: jugs pa bad gag tsu/ lag pa lta sa shegs pa dag cad pasti rnamag/ das padang b.lan yang ba sna pa sa smras pa/ 'amanas pa bdug zhig drug paga' byung ma gyisas pa/ bsad gams pas sa/
183a4: shig gzug pag 'dag 'a man pa'i lag tud pa da pas kyi/ gas pa kyi la ga ga ga macas/ rgyas bad sa / jugs// 'phags pa mas pa' man pa'i ma ga dang rgya pa/ sa dag sa
183a5: bzhi ba'i nod kyis mkhar phan pa'i lags byed drug zhug/ 'phags pa gtsug lag 'ad 'di yang phyogs bzhi dge slong dag 'a na brang du brjid na 'das kyi zhig gas/ khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das larbag// 'phags par bzhin mdzad cig// des ga
183a6: mkhas de dag slong rnams la snad pa dang / dag slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das lags to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ nad ny-id mas ma par man pa'i lag spyang bya ste/ 'di 'tshad mi bya'o// bsad skams pa de gtsug laga'ang/
183a7: da cing bsod snyoms la yang b+ha ba dang / khyim bdag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis gtsug lag khang mdzad cing bso snyoms la yang b+hu 'am/ 'di dmas ma'angs na pa'i bsad snyoms su mdzad cig dang bdag gis ka nab rta gzhan
183a8: dbul lo/ / khyim bdag mkhar lan pa'i nor las ji ltar bsod snyoms sum/ 'phags pa 'di dag nyid kyi sems kyi bag yangs su bgyid pas mdzod cig/ 'di la 'gal ba ci zhig mchis/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o// 'phags pa de bzhin

183b1: mdzod cig/ des gnas skabs de dge slong rnams la bsnyad pa dang / dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mkhar lan byed pas mkhar lan gyi nor kho na las bsod snyoms yongs su spyad par bya'o//
183b2: bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhar lan pa'i nor lon las bsod snyoms yongs su spyad par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de ha cang ngan bza nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sul pa/ ha cang ngan pa bza' bar mi bya'o// de ha cang bsod pa bza' bar brtsams
183b3: ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/ 'phrul pa/ hacang med pa bza' bar me bya'i 'an kyang gtsug lag lang gzhan gyi thang cam du yongs su snad bar bya'o// sangasams bcom ldan 'das mnyan yodan la tha thal byed / cha mgon med pas sbyis
183b4: gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / dge slong zhig 'khru bgan pa de yang dang yang du cha bkrungs 'gro bas rgya'o// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ khri'i thag can bya'o/
183b5: bcom ldan 'das kyis khri'u bu ga can bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dag gis khyad par med par khri'u dag la mtshon gyis phug ste bug btod par dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbas btags pa dang / 'breng bus btags
183b6: ba gang yin pa de la ni pu gnas bug gdod par bya'o/ / the gus btags pa gang yin pa de la ni bug btod la bcing bar bya'o// de bshang pa byed pa na chub rus na nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyogs der lo ma'i khres gzhag par bya'o//
183b7: bsha ya sa la ltung nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'og tu gyo mo gnag par bya'o// ha cang mthon por 'jog par byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ha cang mthon por gzhag par mi bya'o// de dri mi zhim pa 'gyur te
183b8: slong dag gis de phyung nas bor te gzhan bzhag pa dang / de yang dri mi zhim par gyur to// de yang bo ra ba dang gzhan ma rnyed nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ thams cad dor bar mi bya'i gnyis bcangs la gcig bkrus te skam par bya zhing gcig shas

184a1: pang de bzhin bya'o/ / 'on te gnyis su ma rnyed par gyur na po gang du lo ma spel pa gzhag cing nga ga/ yang bya ste/ des zugazhan yang gzhag par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gyo ma da bkra bar bya'o zhes bka' bul pa dang 'gras/
184a2: kyang dri mi zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ti la mar gyis bslu bar bya'o// 'on kyang dri mi zhim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yungs mar gyis bslu bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
184a3: rang ba la blta bar bya zha bdung nas/ de'i drung du nang pa la lta ba'i dge slong rgan po yang 'od / gzhon nu dag kyang 'ong ngo // de nas gzhon nu gang dag yin pa de dag ni de la phyag 'tshal bar byed/ rgan po gang dag yin pa de dag la ni nad pa de phyag 'tshal bar/
184a4: byed pas de skyo bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa la phyag mi bya/ 'phags pas phyag/ mi bya/ 'phags pas phyag bdag gir mi bya// 'phags pas las phyag bdag gir mi bya'o// 'phags pa la phyag
184a5: zed dam/ 'bags pas phyag byed dpa/ 'phags pas phyag bdag gi byed dam/ 'phags pa las phyag bdag gir byed na dag la tshams can gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ma nga ldan pa banye bar 'khor gyis nus pa/ bcom
184a6: ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa la phyag mi bya/ 'phags pas phyag mi bya/ 'bags pas phyag bdag gir mi bya/ 'phags pa las phyag bdag gir mi bya'o zhes gang gsungs pa/ btsun pa 'phags pa ru zhig mchis lags/ nye bar 'khor 'phags pa ni
184a7: gnyis te/ zas kyi bags pa dang / m-i gtung bas 'bags pa'o// de la zas kyis palags pa na sa shing dang / bas pa dang / ga / zas zung / rtsab las sogs pa 'thus ze ra// migs pas pags pani sha pa dag gci nga/
184a8: dedag / bkra bar ma gcar pa'i gnas kyi byin dor bya ba byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yad na rgyal bu rgyal byed / tshal mgon mad zas byin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tshad ldan panye bar 'khor gyis

184b1: zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bram ze pad ma'i snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis nam bdag shing rta la 'tshal ba 'am/ kha lo sgyur ba 'am/ lcag sbeng ba 'am/ skad tsher smra ba gzigs pa de'i tshe bdag phyag 'tshal bar gau ta ma khyod
184b2: kyis gzung du gsol/ nam srang na mchis sam/ lham 'bud dam/ shul las byol lam/ sug pa brkyang ba gzigs pa de'i tshe bdag phyag 'tshal ba gau ta ma khyod kyis bzung du gsol/ nam 'khor gyi nang nas mchis sam/ stan las 'phags sam/
184b3: gtsugator dang / gdugs phog pa de'i tshe bdag phyag 'tshal bar gau ta ma khyod kyis gzung du gsol zhes gsol pa gang lags pa/ btsun pa ci lags 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la de lta bu dag phyag/ 'tshal bar chung ngam/ nye bar 'khor phyag byas
184b4: pa ma yin gyi/ nye bar 'khar de ni gus par sma pa'i tshig tsam du zad kyi lus 'dud pa dang / tshig tu 'byin pa gang yin pa de ni mchod pa min no// nye bar 'khor 'on kyang 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la ni phyag gnyis te/ yan lag lnga pa dang / byin pa la
184b5: 'gyung pa'o/ / gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// dge slong dag chos gos gang dag gyon nas skra dang kha spu 'breg pa byed pa de dag nyid gyon nas zan za bar byed/ de dag nyid dang ston pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang / ma dad pa rnams 'phya bar byed cing shAkya'i
184b6: bu'i dge slong rnams ni gtsang sbra med pa ste/ chos gos gang dag gyon nas skra dang kha spu 'breg pa de dag nyid gyon nas zan za bar byed cing de dag nyid dang ston pa la phyag 'tshal bar byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la
184b7: gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos dag gyon nas skra dang kha spu breg par mi bya'i/ 'on kyang skra bzed kyi gos bcad par bya zhing de bgos nas skra breg par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis skra bzed kyi gos bcang par
184b8: bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / gzhan dgacig la 'byor pa med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang dgal 'byor pa med pa de dag gis rdul zan gyis lus dkris la skra breg par bya'o// dge slong dag gis sra dang kha spu bregs nas

185a1: de bzhin du song ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dag shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams ni spu gri'i las byas nas khrus mi byed pas gtsang sbra med pa'o zhes 'phya bar byed do// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang / bcom
185a2: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ su gri'i las byas nas khrus bya'o// dge slong gzhan dag cig ni rgas 'khog ma shing nyam chung bar gyur/ gzhan dag cig na ni nas khrus kyi sbyor ba mi bzod par gyur/ gzhan dag cig la ni chu'i rnyed pa med nas/ bcom
185a3: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis ni yan lags tsam bkru bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ban bzhugs so// bram zed dang byim bdag dang bcan
185a4: dag gis dge slong dag la me tog gis phred pa 'bul ba dang / de dag gis ma blangs nas bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gis che sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shes bya ba nas/ ci bdag cag 'dig rten 'di na 'a rten yo dud
185a5: rgyags dang bral te mchi'am/ bzhes shig ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na me tog gi phreng ba len par rjes su gnang ngo // de dag
185a6: gis blangs te de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang / de dag 'phya zhede 'phags pa bdag cag gis ri ba'i rin gyis nyos pa yin na ci khyed kyis blangs te dor ram zhes zer nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor bar mi bya'o// dge slong dag gis
185a7: dbu sgra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dgal btags pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ ci 'phags pa bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang / sen mo'i mchod rten ma mthong snyam 'am/ bdag cag gis khyed la byin pa lags kyi bdag cag gis
185a8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la ni dang po nyid du phul lo/ / dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas gnas khang gi sgor bzhag pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can gyis mthong nas dri gtsang khang yin no snyam ste phyag

185b1: 'tshal dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gnas khang gi sgor gzhag par mi byi'i/ nang du gzhag par bya'o// dge slong dag gis sgo'i drang thang du bzhag pas nyes dmigs de nyid du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri zhis po thabs
185b2: cad mig la ban pas phyogs dben par gzhag cing bsnam par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas dben par gzhag cing bsnam par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis ji ltar gzhag pa mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
185b3: sngas logs su khab bamatsher ma btab la 'phyang du gzhug par bya'o// sdom ni// stan bzangs dang ni rgya brten dang / dris bsu lhung bzed bu ga dang // 'bru mar snod ni gsum dag dang // gtur thag dang ni khron pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
185b4: mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ran bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge 'dun la ni 'byor na stan bzang po gnang gi gang zag la ni mi gnang ngo // dge 'dun la
185b5: ni 'byor na rgyab rten gnang gi gang zag la ni mi gnang ngo / / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis dge slong rnams la dri phal ba
185b6: dang / dge slong rnams kyis blangs nas de dag gis smras/ 'phags pa gang gi tshe sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du mabyung ba zhes bya ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis dri blang bar bya'o// zhes bya ba'i bar sngas
185b7: bzhin no/ / de rnams kyis blangs nas de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang / de dag gis 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis ri ba'i rin gyis nyes pa yin na khyed kyis blangs te dor ram zhes 'phya bar byed do// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis
185b8: gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor bar mi bye'o// de dag gis dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten pa phul ba dang / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ci bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten pa mthong

186a1: dam/ bdag cag gis khyed la phul gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten la ni bdag cag gis dang po nyid du phul lags so// dge slong dag gis blangs nas gnas khang gi sgor gzhag pa dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dang
186a2: ba can dag gis mthong nas dri gtsang khang yin no snyam ste zhabs la gtugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas khang gi sgor mi gzhag gi/ 'on kyang nang du gzhag par bya'o// dge slong dag gis sgo'i drang thad tu bzhag nas nyes dmigs
186a3: de nyid du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sgo'i drang thang du gzhag par mi bya'i 'on kyang dri zhim po thams cad ni mig la phan pas sngas kyi thang kar dri'i lag ris bya zhing de nas dus dus su bsdam par bya'o// gzhan dad pa can dag gis/
186a4: dge slong dag khyim du spyan drangs te mchod ston gsol nas de rnams de dag gi rkang ba la dri'i lag ris skud pa dang / dge slong dag gis ma blangs nas de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa gang dag bram ze la mngon par dad pa de dag gis de dag la dang por
186a5: dri dang phreng ba dag phul na de dag gis blangs te/ mgo dang lus la nye bar sbyor bar bgyid na bdag cag gi ni khyed la mngon par dad de zhabs dag la 'bul ba 'gal ba ci zhig mchis bzhes su gsol/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol ba
186a6: dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rkang pa dag la 'bul ba bdag gir bya'o// dge slong dag gis blangs te de dag nyid kyi mdun du bor ba dang / de dag gis smras pa/ e ma 'phags pa khyed cag gtsug lag khang du gshegs te ji bder mdzod
186a7: cig/ ji ltar bdag cag dang pa skyes pa de ltar ma dad pa'ang skyes so// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag nyid kyi mdun du dong bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
186a8: mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / dge slong dag lhung bzed bab tshol du 'jog par byed pas de dag ma rung bar gyur nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang / bcom

186b1: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhung bzed bab tshol du gzhag par mi bya'o// 'on kyang lhung bzed gzhag pa'i bu ga byas la der gzhag par bya'o// dge slong dag rtsig pa brko bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsig pa brko bar mi bya'i len
186b2: kyang gang gi tshe gtsug lag khang rtsig pa de kho na'i tshe lhung bzed kyi bu ga bya ste/ de bzhin du 'khor gyis khang pa la'ang bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis lhung bzed gzhag pa'i bu gar lhung bzed gzhag par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dgon pa bdag
186b3: lhung bzed gzhag pa'i bu ga med nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de dag gis lcug ma 'am/ srad bu'i skon bu byas te de la ba lang gi lci ba 'am/ 'jim pas bskus la der gzhag par bya'o// rdul gyis khyer nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
186b4: stsal pa/ de la de dang 'dra ba'i kha gab bya'o// dge slong dag gis des la bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa la mi gzhag gi 'on kyang gang dathag gam/ shing gi yal gal spyang du gzhug par bya'o// de dag gang gi tshe ljongs rgyu zhing 'gro ba de'i tshed
186b5: khyer zhing dong nas ma dad pa dag 'phags pa ci 'dir khyim bya 'am spre'u khyer zhes 'phya bar byed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gar 'gro dgur skon du khyer te/ 'gro bar ma bya'i 'on kyang gang du 'gro ba der gzhan zhig gzhag par bya'o// sangs
186b6: rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yon na rgyas bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon ma da zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ran bzhugs so/ / dge slong zhig ljongs rgyu zhing ri brags shig tu byin te/ des khyim zhig tu gnas brnyas nas rkang pa bkrus te 'bru mar bslang bar 'artsams pa dang /
186b7: tritraman bud med cig gis til mar khyer te 'ongs nas dge slong des lag parkyang ba dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa spong bar mdzad la snod ma mnga' ba deg la gdang / a ma'o khyod kyis 'bru mar gyi snod bcad 'dod cig/ des smras pa/ sring mo bcom ldan
186b8: 'das kyis ma gnang ngo / / de cang mi zer bar 'dug nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis 'brumar gyi snod bcad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bru

187a1: mar gyi snod bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa nye dga'i dge tshul gnyis bru mar gyi 'brag khyer te 'bru mar gyi bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang / bud med cig gis 'bru mar khyer te 'ongs pa dang / ji tsam na dge
187a2: tshul gnyis shig 'bru mar gyi 'brag thogs pa mthong nas des brang brdungs te smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed 'di su zhig gis 'gengs par byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ bkren pa mo khyod kyis re shig ci byin pa de lugs shig/ lhag ma lta bram ze dang khyim bdag
187a3: dad pa can dga' gengs so/ / de cang mi zer bar gyur nas skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gis 'bru mar gyi snod ha cang chen po bcang bar mi bya'o// bcom ldan 'das/
187a4: kyis dge slong dag gis 'bru mar gyi snod ha cang chen po bcang ba mi bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / de dag gis ha cang chud pa bcangs pas des dgos pa mi chog nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ ha cang chung ngu yang mi bcang gi 'on kyang 'bru mar gyi
187a5: snod ni gsum ste/ chen po dang / 'bring dang / chang ngu'o// de la chen po ni phul gang ba'o// chung ngu ni bul phye ba'o// de dag gi bar ni 'bring ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
187a6: bzhugs so/ / dge slong rgan po dang gsar bu zhig dang gnyis lam du zhugs te dong ba dang / de dag gtam bzang po ma yin bzer zhing 'gro ba ji tsam na gnod sbyin ma dad pa zhig gis thos nas des bsams pa/ shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di gnyis gtam bzang po ma
187a7: yin pa zer zhing 'dod pas 'di dag gis mdangs dbrog par bya'o snyam du bsams te/ de de gnyis kyi phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // yang bsams pa/ gang 'das pa de ni 'das su zad/ gal te da gtam bzang po ma yin pa dag zer na nges par mdangs dbrog par
187a8: bya'o snyam mo/ / de de ltar sems shing de dag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ba las gnod sbyin dad pa can gzhan zhig phyogs dor 'ongs te/ des de la grogs po gar 'gro zhes dris pa dang / des ji ltar gyur pa de la smras so// des smras pa/ grogs po dge slong

187b1: 'di ga ni / 'thub ba ldan pas gong ma chag par chos kyi gtam zer zhing 'dod // khyod la dge slong dag gis ci zhig byas/ 'dug sheg dang / bdag cag phan tshun yang dag par dga' ba'i gtam dag tu zhib dong // des smras pa/ grogs po bdag gis
187b2: 'di gnyis nges par mi gtang gis tshur shog 'dod do/ / des dbus kyis chu bar shes nas de dang lhan cig tu gnyis kyi phyi bzhin du 'brangs pa dang / dge slong de gnyis gtam bzang po ma yin pa kho na zer zhing 'dod pa las ji tsam na lam gnyis su gyur nas/
187b3: dge slong de gnyis las kyang gcig ni rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'gro'o// gcig ni ri dgas 'dzin gyi mi 'kha bzangs su 'gro'o// de gnyis las gsar bu gang yin pa des rgan po la phyag byas te/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bdag ni ri dgas 'dzin gyi
187b4: ma'i khang bzangs su mchi yis/ khyod bag yod par mdzod la nad med par gshegs shig ces smras nas da song ba dang / gnod sbyin ma dad pa de skra gyen du bslang ste mdangs dbrog ces byas pa dang / gnod sbyin dad pa can des smras pa/ grogs po gzu
187b5: yums ma byed cig/ 'di gnyis kyis chos bshad de/ gang nang med par gyur cig ces smras pa nad med pa de ni rnyed pa'i mchog yin la/ gang pag yod par byos shig ces zer ba bag yod pa ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang /
187b6: bag yod 'chi med gnas yin te// bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gnas// bag yod 'chi bar mi 'gyur te// bag med rtag tu 'chi bar 'gyur/ zhes gsungs so zhes des de slar bzlog go// gnod sbyin dang pa can de 'di snyam du 'di kho na bdag gis bya ba
187b7: yin no snyam bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste byin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgon pos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin des 'di skad
187b8: ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa// mi ma lags pa/ gnod sbyin gtum po rtag tu gnas shing mchis lags so// btsun pa mngon par dad pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni nyung zad cig mchis lags te/

188a1: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa/ mi ma lags pa/ gnod sbyin gtum po rtag tu gnas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa'i gnod sbyin gtum po rtag tu gnas pa ni ches mar lags la/ btsun
188a2: pa 'phags pa 'di dag ni gtam bzang po ma lags pa mchi zhing shul du zhugs te mchi na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis brtse bar dgongs te/ gang gis na 'phags pa dag gtam bzang po ma lags pa mchi zhing shul tu zhugs te mchi bar mi 'gyur bar 'phags
188a3: pa rnams dran par bgyid pa cur zad cig bcar gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin de la cang mi gsung bas gnang nas/ de nas gnod sbyin de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
188a4: 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin de song ste ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge
188a5: slong dag la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag ngas gnor sbyin zhig las dge slong dag gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer zhing lam du zhugs te 'dod pa la gnod sbyin ma dad pa ngag skabs tshol zhing blags lta zhes thos so// dge slong dag legs par gsangs
188a6: ba'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba rnams 'di lta ste/ gtam bzang po ma yin pa zer ba de ni mdzes pa ma yin zhing 'tsham pa ma yin no// de lta bas na des dge slong lam du 'jug pa'i kun tu spyod pa'i chos dag bca' bar bya ste/ lam du 'jug pa'i dge
188a7: slong gis chos kyi gtam dang / 'phags pa'i mi smra ba dang rnam pa gnyis kyis lam du zhugs nas 'gro'o// ngal bso ba'i gnas kyis phyogs su gtsug lag gi tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya'o// chu chu ban chu de gang gi yin pa dang / de'i lha la
188a8: tshigs su bcad pa gdon par bya'o/ / gang drag nas 'tshal ba der blun chags gsum pa gdon par bya'o// lam du zhugs pa'i dge slong gis kun tu spyod pa'i chos ji ltar bcas pa dag yang dag par blangs te/ 'jug par ma byed na 'gal tshabs

188b1: can du 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal rba rgyal byed kyi mal mgon med zas sbyin rtsi kun dga'ar ban bzugs so// dge slo dag gis chas gas ca pa/ gsags papar byin patsun sa pa nan lags
188b2: bkal tel ba zhugs pa dang / de dgardul dang tshul gyis ma rung bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gtur bu byas la de bcug ste bkur bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gos dag ga tu tu bcug ste/ bkur bar bya'o// zhes gsu
188b3: pa dang / dge slong dag gis chos gos kyi gtur bu ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ras gang chur ni khru gsum zhe dang ni khru phyed dang / do ba de gnyis su bltar la drub par bya'o// dge slong dag gis mtha' mar kha btod par
188b4: glang po che'i sna ltar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mthar 'a mi gdod kyi 'on kyang dbus su gdod par bya'o// de dag gis kha thag ma btags pas de bzhin du rdul zhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ srad bus drab
188b5: lta bu byas la de nas srad bu gzhan gyis rgyu bar bya'o/ / de dag gis chos gos gang dag bgo ba de dag ni 'og tu bzhag/ gzhan ni steng du phyung ba dang / de dag gtur bu yang dang yang du 'byed pan 'tshal bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
188b6: pa/ gang dag bgo ba de dag ni steng du bzhag la/ lhag ma dag ni 'og tu gzhag par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mi rgod dag gis 'don pa/
188b7: bcom nas pan tun bus 'debs shing bros pa dang / so so'i grong na gnas pa dag khyim nas lhags te mi rgod dag btags rab tu btags nas/ mgon med cing skom pas gdungs te/ gcig nas gcig tu chu btsal ba'i phyir med cing khron pa
188b8: bzhin tu phyin pa dang / rkun po'i sde dpon gyis smras pa/ shes ldan de dag 'dir chu snod dang / thag pa dag ltos shig/ bltas na thag pa yang mad/ chu snod kyang med do// sde dpon gyis smras pa/ shes ldan dgagal te 'dron pa 'ga' zhig 'od na dang/

189a1: thag pa dang / chu snod brnyas/ shing la 'dzegs te ltos shig/ de dag gis shing la 'jogs te blta bar brtsams na/ ji tsaman thag ring bzhig nas dge slong dag cig 'ong ba mthong ste/ de dag gis smras pa/ sde dpon shA kya'i bu mar zhig
189a2: 'od / / des smras pa/ shes ldan de dag ni mkhas pa yin pas gdon mi za bar de dag lag dang thag dang / chu rtsod yod do// de dag gis smras pa/ sde dpon gal ted dag la yod na de sa na legs/ ji ste med na de dgag lto dral te khrag btung bar bya'o//
189a3: de dag gis de ltar gros byas te bsdad pa dang / dge slong dag kyang lhags so// mi rgod dag gis dris pa/ 'phags pa bdag skom na khyed la ga dang zag dang / chu snod yod dam/ de dag gis smras pa/ bzhin bzang sa med do// mi rgod dag 'khrugs par gyur
189a4: te mtshan cha la nom pa dang / de na dge 'dun gyis gnas brtan dgra bcom pa zhig gis ci'i phyir 'di dag 'khrugs shing mtshon chal nom zhes bsam pa la zhugs pa dang / dge slong dag gsad par 'dod par mthong nas/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed
189a5: ci'i phyir 'khrugs par gyur/ de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa smras so// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag thabs yod kyis tha mal bar 'dug la chu 'thung shig/ de dag tha mal bar 'dug pa dang / dge slong dag gis lhas ma dang / phug bod dang / rgya cang dag
189a6: mthung de lhung bzed khron par dpyad la btang nas de nas chu bcus te btags so/ / btags nas mi rgod thams cad doms par byas pa dang / de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gal te khyed kyis bdag cag la chus sum bar gyur na bdag cag gis
189a7: khyed thams cad bsad par gyur to/ / e ma khye ga dang thag 'chang bar mdzod cig de dag gis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag de bzhin bya'o// mi rgod dag gis phyag byas te dong ngo // dge slong dag gis kyang ji tsam ngoms pa chu 'thungs nas ril ba dang / bya ma bum
189a8: dag bkang ste dod nas de rim gyis mnyan yod du stegs so/ / dge slong dag gis 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i kun tu spyod pas kun tu spyad nas tshe dang ldan pa dag ci bde bar spyad dam zhes dris pa dang / de dag gis ji ltar gyur pa smras so// skabs de bcom

189b1: ldan 'das la dag slong dag gis bsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong dag gis gdang zag bcang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis gdang zag bcang bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa
189b2: dang / dge slong rnams kyis shin tu ring po dag 'chang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shin tu ring po yang bcad par mi bya'o// de dag shin tu thung du dag bcangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bul pa/ shin tu thang du yang bcang
189b3: bar mi bya'o/ / 'on kyang gdang zag gsum bcad par bya ste/ ring po dang / babring dang / thung ngu'o// ring po ni khru brgya lnga bcu'o// zung du ni khrab rtsa'o// de dag gi bar na 'bring ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis gdang thag gsum bkang bar bya'o zhes
189b4: gsungs pa dang / dge slong rnam pa 'chang par gyur te/ yul gzhan zhigan chu mod pa deng yang dge slong dag ga dang thag khyer te 'dod nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gdang bag ni yul rnams dang sbyar shing bcang bar bya'o// thos ni/ s+phu rbi
189b5: gdang dang sen gri dang / / smad tshar dang ni sngas shing dang // pad cha'i rigs la 'jim pa ni// dri yis yongs su bsgos pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
189b6: bzhugs so/ / dge slong zhig gi bla ring po ring por gyur te/ de 'breg mkhan gyi gan du song nas bzhin bzang ba bdag gi skra regs shig/ des bsams pa/ shag kya'i bu'i dge slong 'di dag ni nan che ste dran pa med par las byed 'jug pas gal te 'ding/
189b7: snga bregs na thos pa dang / gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur bas dus ring du bskyangs te bzhag pa dang / 'di rang gi blos ldog go snyam nas des dus btab pa/ 'phags pa gshegs la sang gnangs snga dro'am/ slad dro'am/ gdugs kyi gung zhig
189b8: la spyon cig/ de des bslus pas yang dang yang du 'gro'o// de la dge slong mdza' bshes shig yod pa des de yang dang yang du 'tho ba mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa khyod ci'i phyir 'dir yang dang yang du 'gro// ci 'di gnyen gyi khyim 'am/ rigs kyi

190a1: khyim yin/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de ni gnyen gyi khyim dang / rigs kyi khyim yang ma yin mod kyi 'on kyang bdag gi skra ring po ring por gyur nas bdag gis 'breg mkhan de la 'di skad du/ bdag gi skra ring po ring po regs shig dang / khyod la bsod
190a2: nams su 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang / des dus btab ste ma bregs so// des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa bzo bo la bden par sla pa dkon no zhes khyod kyis ma thos sam/ kho bo ni skra 'breg kyang mkhas na bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // de skabs
190a3: de dge slong dag la bsnyad pa dang / dge slong dag gis bcom ldan 'das pa gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis dge slong gang zhig shes pa des phyogs dben par sgra breg par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyor par mi bya'o
190a4: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gang zhig mkhas pa des phyogs dben par skra breg par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de dge slong de'i drung du song nas tshe dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gis sgra rigs shig des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
190a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang / ba ni legs na de ci 'dzub mos breg par bya 'am/ 'di la spu gri dang / gdar dang / sen gri dang / spar char dag kyang dgos so// des skabs de dge slong dag la smras pa/ nas dge slong dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la
190a6: gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta bas na gnang gis dge 'dun phyir spu gri'i lag cha bcang par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas n+ya gro d+hi'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan
190a7: 'das kyis sar skya na gnas pa'i shAkya'i rigs las re re rab tu phyur ba na de dag rab tu bzhon pa'i rang bzhin can yin pas de dag sngas shing med par kha bu ba tu nyal nas gnyid log go/ / de dag de bzhin du gnyid log pas khams ma snyoms te drong chung
190a8: bar gyur nas de dag sman pa'i drung du song ste smras pa/ bzhin bzangs bdag cag drod chung bar gyur na sman ston cig/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa bzhud cig dang khyed cag ci 'dra bar nyal zhing 'dug pa ltar 'dong ngo // de sor ba dang / ji tsam na sngas shing

190b1: med par khas bubatu nyal mthong nas des smras pa/ 'phags pa khyod cag las bub tu nyal bas de'i phyir khyed khams ma snyoms la drod chung bar gyur gyis sngas shing chug la nyol cig/ des smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // des
190b2: smras pa/ 'phags pa khyed kyi ston pa ni thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ de sta bas na gnang gis sngas shing bcugs te nas
190b3: bar bya'o/ / de dag sngas shing btsugs te nyal na 'on kyang sos par ma myur nas de dag gis yang sman pa la smras pa dang / des smras pa/ 'phags pa sngas nang tshangs can bcug ste nyal bar bya'o// bzhin bzangs bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo //
190b4: 'phags pa khyed kyi ston pa thugs rje can yin pas gnang bar 'gyur ro// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ de lta bas na ga nang gis dge slong gis sngas nang tshangs can bcang bar
190b5: bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdus nang tshangs can bcad par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis ci 'dra ba zhig bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ ras de ni srid du khru bzhi zhing du khru dor byas la drub ste/ de nas shing bal
190b6: gyis bkang la rdzas su gzhug par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i lab 'od ma'i chas phyags nad gaganas pa na zhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa pi la ni di'i bung bcu byung chun cad ces bya ba nas/ gnas brtan khyod kyis ce bcas shes bya'is
190b7: bar snga ma bzhin no/ / des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dris bsgos pa'i 'jim pa dag bcangs so// gnas btan de ci'i phyir mi bcad/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol
190b8: pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong nad pas dris bsgos pa'i 'jim pa bcad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyor bar mi bya'o// 'dul ba phran tshegs kyi gzhi las sgo gsum pa rdzogs s+ho/ bsdus pa'i sngon ni/ gnas brtan rab khyor dang /

191a1: nad pa dang ni rigs ngan phag/ ri mo lhung bzed med pa dang // gnas bca' ba dang shing bskyed pa'o// sdom ni/ gnas brtan re sos gzhan dang ni// gso sbyong mtshams ni sbyar ba dang // bdud pa rnams gnyis ldan pa dang // gtsug lag
191a2: khang ni dus kun pa'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sanyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis zla babyed byed cing gso skyong gi che 'aton gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal
191a3: ba dang / dge slong dag gis gang gis kha ton gdon par bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kha ton gdon par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis kha ton gdon par bya'o zhes bkara'
191a4: stsal nas/ dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan zla ba phyed byed cing gso sbyong gi tshe kha ton 'don par zhugs so// re shig cig na gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na gnas brtan zhig 'dug par de ba ton 'don mi nus pa dang / da la dge slo dag gis smras pa/ gnas brtan gso sbyong
191a5: nye bar gnas na ci mi sems par 'dug gam/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag gis mi nus na ji ltar bya/ skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis
191a6: mi nus na gnas brtan gnyis pas kha ton gdon par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan gnyis pas kha ton gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / re shig na gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na gnas brtan gnyis pas kyang ma nus nas skabs
191a7: de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gal te gnas brtan gnyis pas kyang ma nus na gnas brtan gsum pas kha ton gdon par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan gsum
191a8: pas kha ton gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / re shig cig na gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na gnas btan gsum pas kyang ma nus nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

191b1: pa gal te gnas brtan gsum pas kyang ma nus na dge slong rnams kyis res su blags de kha ton gdon par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams kyis res su blags te/ kha ton gdon par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong rnams res su thags
191b2: te kha ton gdon par brtsams pa dang / res su blags te kha ton pa de dag las kha cig ni nus pa la res bab/ kha cig ni mi nus pa la res bab nas/ de la nus pa gang yin pa des ni des bab pa na zla ba phyed phyed cing so sor thar pa'i mdog dodan pa 'dod par byed/ ma rus
191b3: ba gang yin pa de ni res bab pa ni mi shes na ji ltar bya zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ des kyang nus pa gang yin pa de la bcol bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis mi nus
191b4: pa la res bab pa gang yin pa des kyang gzhan la bcol bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / re shig cig na gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na mi nus pa la res bab pa des gang la bcol ba de ma btub nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol
191b5: ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nus pa gzhan gang yin pa de kho na la rtag du bcol bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis zla ba phyed phyed cing dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis so so thar pa'i mdogadon par bya'o// de med na gnas brtan gnyis pas
191b6: so/ / de yang med na gsum pas so// de yang med na res su blags te kha ton gdon par bya ba 'am/ gzhan nus pa gang yin pa de la bcol bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pa dang / gtsug lag khang gzhan zhig na so sor thar pa'i mdo bstan pa'i ri thon pa ni 'ga'
191b7: yang med mi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis phas pham par gyur pa'i chos bzhi bton te/ lhag ma mthon nas dge slong dag gis gso sbyong bzhag go// skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
191b8: gse skyed gzhag par mi bya'i 'on kyang gang gis gang thon pa des de gdon par bya ste/ gal te dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyis phas pham par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi thod na de dag gdod par bya zhing gzhan gyis dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum/ gzhan gyi sa sa

192a1: nges pa'i chos gnyis/ gzhan gyis spang ba'i skang byed kyi chos sum bcwa// gzhan gyis ltung byed kyi chos dgu bcu/ gzhan gyis so sor bshags par bya ba'i chos bzhi/ gzhan gyis bslab pa mang po'i chos rnams gzhan gyis brjod pa zhi bar byed pa'i chos bdun
192a2: te/ de ltar gse sbyong gi mtshams sbyar na gso sbyong gi bar chad du 'gyur bar nga mi smra'o// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la tsha dang ldan pa nye bar 'khor gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa dus su drang ba'i btung ba zhes kyang bka' stsal pa/
192a3: dus ma lags par drang ba zhes kyang bka' stsal pa/ btsun pa dus su rung ba ni gang lags/ dus ma lags par rung ba ni gang lags/ nye bar 'khor ma bcags pa ni dus su rung ba'o// bcags te chu dang bsras pa ni dus ma yin par rung ba'o// gleng bzhi na mnyan
192a4: yod nano/ / drug sde rnams sdig pa 'dod pa/ se mas mi rigs par gtsug la ga khang la yongs su spyod par byed de/ kha cig la ni dus thams cad pas/ kha cig la ni gnas resas gcod pas// kha cig la ni dus reg shig pas/ kha cig la ni ting gnon pas yongs su spyad
192a5: par byed do/ / de ltar du thams cad pas yin zhe na/ 'di ni bdag gi dgun gyi gtsug lag khang ngo ro// 'di ni dpyid kyi'o// 'di ni dbyar gyi'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar na dus thams cad pas yin no// ji ltar na gnas ngas su gcod pas yin zhe na/ 'di ni bdag gisang gi
192a6: lag la do/ / 'di ni ga nangs kyi'o// 'di ni gzhes kyi'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar gnas res su gcod pas yin no// ji ltar na dus re shig pas yin zhe na/ 'dir ni snga droganas so// 'dir ni phyi dro'o// zhes bya ba ste/ da ltar na dus re shig pas yin no/ de ltar na ting gnon pas yin zhe na/
192a7: 'di ni bdage gaslong dpon gyi gtsug la ga khang ngo do// 'di ni mkhan po dang / lhan cig gnas pa dang / nye gnas dang / gtam 'dres pa dang / bebs par smras pa'i'o zhes bya ba ste/ de ltar na ting gnon pas yin no// yul snasnga tshags na gnas pa dge slong dag lhags pa dang pongs
192a8: badrasar nas skabs dge slong mas kyis so na nas la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ de lta bas na dge slong gis gtsug lag khang dag la dus thams cad pa dang gnasapa mu gcod pa dang / dusar shig pa dang / de gnon gas yo tu spyad bar mi byed/ na

192b1: can du 'gyur ro/ / sdom ni// ra ba dang ni shing thags dang // la ma dang 'obs dang skar rgyal dang // chos gos bcags shing phyis pa dang // cha ga dang ni bra maze'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas
192b2: sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / gang gi tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis rgyal byed kyi tshal phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul ba de'i tshe 'jig rten dag rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi nang du dga' mgur 'gro zhing 'ong nas khyim bdag mgon med pas
192b3: sbyin gyis bsams pa/ bdag gi gtsug lag khang lam po cher gyur gyis de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis rabs bskor ro snyam du bsams nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba deng songs byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
192b4: mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ khyogs gcig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa gtsug lag khang 'di shul po cher gyur te de'i sgra dgal te bcom ldan 'das
192b5: kyis gnang na bdag gis 'dir bas bskor bar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag doH/ bas na gan rigs bskor cig/ nges rabs bskor ba dang / gang gi tshe dbyar gyis dus la bab pa'i tshe rgyal byed 'i tshal chus srung bzhin gang
192b6: ste 'dug go/ tsam na khyim bdag mgon med pas smin paco maldan 'das kyi nabs la phyag 'tshal du song ba dang / des rgyal byed kyi tshal chus spyang bzhin du gang ba mthong nas/ des bsams pa dag gis byas byed kyi tshal rapas bsod kyi sdor thur ma gtong
192b7: dasan 'i chus spyang bzhin dra gang / 'jugago// de'i phyi gas te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na stong khung gdod dasam dubasams nas/ com ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa padag gis rgyas byed kyi tshal bas bkar kyi stong 'a
192b8: ga bas pan di ba kyis myang bzhin pa pa ste chis so/ / de'i srang dug te mam ldan 'das kyis gan na bdag gis stor bu dgad bar bgyig// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyi mi bdag / khas na gnang gis por cig/ des stongs

193a1: gtong ngo / / lang dag 'ongs shing 'ongs nas rtsig pa la lus kyis bstogs shing rwas brud pa dang ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas kyis mthong nas des bsams pa/ bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal rabs bskor gyi shing thags ma zes pas des
193a2: na ba lang dag 'ongs shings 'ongs nas 'di la lus kyis stegs shing dras brud do/ / de'i phyir gal ta bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis 'di shing thags kyis bskor bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas// bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste/ byin nas bcom
193a3: ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs cig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis rgyal byad kyi tshal bas bskor gyi shing thags ma bres
193a4: pas pa lang dag mchis shing mchis nas de la lus kyis bsnyogs shing rwas brud de/ de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na shing thags ze bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de lta bas na gnang gis shing thags bras shig/
193a5: des shing thags bres pa dang / ma byin par len pa dag gis shing thags dral te brkus so// ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'chag cing song ba dang / shing thags par bang nas dral zhing shing de yang brkus par mthong ngo // des bsams/
193a6: pa bdag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal rabs bskor nas shing thags bres na/ 'di bar bar nas dral te shing yang brkus kyis de'i phyir gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis 'obs kyis bskor ro snyam du bsams nas bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste byin
193a7: nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ / phyogs cig tu 'dug nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bdag gis rgyal byed/ chal rabs bsko
193a8: cing shing thags zes na de 'obs kyi sa ma bskor bas par bar nas dral nas shing brkus na/ de'i slad du gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na bdag gis 'obs kyis bskor bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag de lta bu/

193b1: na gnang gis 'obs kyis bskor cig/ des 'obs kyis bskor to// gleng gzhi ni mnyan yod na'o// mnyan yod na dge slong ma skar rgyal zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa de skra ring po ring por gyur nas de 'breg mkhan gyi drung du song ste/ bu skra regs shig/ khyod la bsod/
193b2: rnams su 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang / des bsams pa/ ji ltar shAg kya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag nan che ba de ltar 'di dag kyang dran pa med par las byed du 'jug ste// gal te 'di'i sgra bregs na gzhan dang gzhan dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur bas dus ring du bshol te
193b3: bzhag pa dang / 'dirang gi blos ldog par 'gyur ro snyam nas/ des 'phags ma bzhud la sang gnangs snga dro'am/ nyi ma'i gung ngam/ slad du sbron cig ces dus btab po// de des bslus pas yang dang yang du 'gro ba dang / de'i spos 'drin dge slong ma zhig yod pa
193b4: des de yang dang yang du 'gro ba mthong nas/ des smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod ci'i phyir 'dir yang dang yang du 'gro/ ci 'di khyod kyi nye du'i khyi ma 'am/ rigs kyi khyim yin/ des smras pa/ 'phags ma 'di ni bdag gi nye du'i khyim yang ma yin/ rigs kyi khyim yang ma yin
193b5: mod kyi 'on kyang bdag gi sla ring po ring por gyur nas bdag gis 'brag mkhan 'o nil bu bdag gi sgra ring po ring po regs shig dang / khyod la bsod nams su 'gyur ro zhes byas na des ma bregs te dus btab bo// des smras pa/ 'phags ma khyod kyis bzo bo la bden par
193b6: smra ba dkon par ma thos sam/ kham ni skra 'breg sa las na 'od kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo // des skabs de dag slong ma rnams la bsnyad pa dang / dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la'o// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
193b7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong ma gang zhig mkhas pa des phyogs dben par skra breg par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong ma gang zhig mkhas pa des phyogs dben par sgra breg par bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas/ dge slong ma de'i drung du song ste/
193b8: 'phags ma bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang gis tshur spyon snga regs shig/ des smras pa/ 'phags ma gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang na legs na/ de ci'i sor mos breg gam/ 'di la spu gri dang / gdar dang / sen gri dang / smad char dag dgos so// des skabs de

194a1: dge slong ma rnams la bsnyad pa dang / dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la'o// dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de lta zas na gnang gis dge slong ma rnams
194a2: kyis dge 'dun gyi phyir spu gri'i spyang dag bcang bar bya'o/ / / 'dul ba phran tshigs kyi gzhi/ bam po bcwa brgyad pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//
194a3: gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo rab tu phyung ba de'i tshe de la bzang mos chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa dag mnyan yod du sbyar ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bos chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa sar pa ba sos byis pa dag bgos/
194a4: lhung bzed 'tsher bathogs nas dge slong rnams kyi 'dun na 'gying bag tu rlom nas skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/ nyes dmigs gang cung zad byung ba ni dge slong dag chos gos bcags pa
194a5: dang / rab tu bcags pa dag gyon pa las gyur to snyam du mkhyen nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de lta bas na skyes bu gti mug dga' bo ches gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa sar pa/ bsos byis pa dag bgos lhung bzed 'tsher ba
194a6: thogs nas/ dge slong rnams kyi mdun du 'gying bag tu rlom pa 'di ni mdzes pa ma yin zhing 'tsham pa ma yin no// de lta bas na dge slong gis chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa dag bcang bar mi bya ste/ 'chang na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro// bcom
194a7: ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa dag bcang bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal ba dang / bram ze dang khyim bdag dang ba can dag dge slong rnams la chos gos bcags shing rab tu bcags pa dag 'bul ba ni dge slong rnams kyis ma
194a8: blangs nas/ de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa dag gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dum byung ba de'i tshe ni mu stegs can rnams sbyin gnas lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung nad ltar byed sbyin gnas lags na/ gal te khyed mi

194b1: bzhes na ci bdag cag 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol tu dge ba'i lam rgyags ma mchis par mchi'am/ zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dang / de lta bas na
194b2: gnang gis blang bar bya zhing blangs nas 'tsher ba yal bar byas te yongs su longs spyad par bya'o/ / de dag gis lag pas mnyes na yal bar ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam pa/ zil ma la bzhag ste yal bar bya'o// zil/ ma la bzhag ste/ yal
194b3: bar byas na 'on kyang thams cad kyi thams cad du yal bar ma gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu'i nang du bsug par bya'o// dge slong dag gis chu'i nang du bsugs na 'on kyang yal bar ma gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de ltar
194b4: byas kyang ma yal na yongs su longs spyad par bya ste/ 'di la 'gyod par mi bya'o// de bzhin du bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis dge 'dun la chos gos bcags pa dang rab tu bcags pa dag phul na de la yang / rim pa 'di nyid kyis yongs su longs spyad
194b5: par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams stog khang du 'dus shing 'khod nas bar skabs kyi gtam
194b6: 'di ltar bu dag gleng ste/ dge sbyong gau tam bcom ldan 'das kyang bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin la/ de'i nyan thos rnams kyang bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin pas/ nyis na mu stegs can dag rung gi dge sbyong mgo reg de dag
194b7: ni ma yin no zhes zer ro/ / de na bram ze gcig cig gis smras pa/ kho bos dge sbyong gau ta ma bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ 'on te bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin can ma yin de'i nyan thos rnams bgo bsha' byed pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/
194b8: 'on te ma yin pas khyed kyis mngon sum du gyur par bya'o// de dag gis smras pa legs te/ de bzhin du kyis shig dang blta'o// des nges yug khyer nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste/ des ngas yul de gan pa'i mtha' logs su bzhag nas/ phyogs bzhin

195a1: dge slong gi dge 'dun la phul te/ 'phags pa bdag gis ras yug 'di dge 'dun la phul gyis ci bder mdzod cig ces byas pa dang / de la dge lun gyi gnas rten gyis smras pa/ bram ze chen po nad med par gyur cig/ sbyin pa 'dis khyod kyi sems kyi rgyan dang /
195a2: sems kyi yo byad dang / rnal 'byor gyi tshogs dang / don gyi mchog thob pa dang / lha dang ma'i gos dag thob par gyur cig ces byas pa dang / des bcos mar mgos phyag byas nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsam pa/ kun
195a3: dga' bo song la dge slong rnams laras yug 'a ni bram zes glags btsal ba'i phyir phul gyis de lta bas na khyed kyis mnyam par bgos la/ pha las ni cha gar thob shig/ la las ni sgrog gzungs su/ la las ni snyan par/ la las ni chos gos kyi sgro bur gyis shig ces
195a4: sgo shog/ btsun pa de ltar 'tshal le zhos tshe dang ldan kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas ras yug 'o ni bram zes glags btsal ba'i phyir phul gyis/ de lta bas na khyed kyis mnyam par
195a5: gos pa/ la las ni cha gar thob shig/ la las ni sgrog gzungs sa/ la las lhan par/ la las ni chos gos kyi spro bur gyis shig ces de skad ces bka' stsal pa// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsas pa/
195a6: de bzhin 'tshal le zhes de rnams kyis de mnyam pa shes/ de bzhin du bgos so// ji tsaman bram ze nang bar sngar langs nas mnyan yod kyi skon 'dug go// dge slong dag kyang snga dro shim thabs bgos/ lung bzed dang chos gos thogs te mnyan yod du bsod snyoms
195a7: kyi phy-ir 'jug par brtsams pa dang / bram zengs smras pa/ 'phags pa bdag gis dge 'dun la ras bral ba gang lags pa de khyed kyis cir bgyis/ de na dge slong gcig cig gis smras pa/ bram ze chen po de dge 'dun gyis mnyam par gses nas bgos te/
195a8: 'i skal pang yin pa de ni chagar btab pa 'di yin no// gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ kho bo ni sgog gzungs su btags pa 'di yin no// gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ kho bo'i ni ldan par btab pa 'di yin no// gzhan zhig gis smras pa/ kho bon chos

195b1: gang kyig zung sa pa ma Sha yas pa nam ben shA 'i dge sbyong rnams bgo bsha' byed pa'i dang tshul can ma yin no zhes zer ba ni byin zhig 'ardo te/ bdag nyid chen po 'di dag ni bgo bsha' byed pa'i nga tshul can yin pas 'di dag kho na'i nang du rang
195b2: tu 'thung ngo snyam pa nas/ de dad ba skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de sang ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo zos phyag 'tshas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di sad ces gsom so// btsun pa da shes par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
195b3: mang 'dzung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'khon bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngang tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsas pa/ bram ze legs so// legs so// khyod kyis sems bskyed pa ni bzang ste/ rab
195b4: Tha drung ba ni mchog go/ / phan yon snamathong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs te/ khrag she na/ bdag gis rang gi don ma 'dres pa thob par 'gyur ngo zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'thung ba khon mos par
195b5: bya ba'i rigs so/ / bdag gang dag gi ban dang mdag gzhug pa dang / bsro ba bzhin byed pa dang / rang dbang med pa dang / dga' mgur byed pa de dag gi yang mchod par bya ba dang / bsngags par bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mthong ba'i ma'asabs rab tu
195b6: drung bzonar mos par byaba'i rigs sa/ / thub pa dang bde bathan me sa myang nams 'das pa 'thob ba pa gyur zhes bya ba mthad ba'i mkhas pas rab tu thung gson mos par bya ba'i rigs so// bgadu la dang de san med canas dang/
195b7: pa thob pa las nyams kyang lharnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba khonar mos par bya ba'i rigs so// sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi na thos dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i byas bu
195b8: pa rnams kyis rab tu byung ba nam thangs du mang ba sngags so zhes bya ba mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'thung bakho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so/ / de lta bas na legs kyis rag byung shig de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge zong chu bshi zhes rgyan+da/

196a1: rab tu byung bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas gdams ngag gnang ba dang / des 'bad brtsal bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang mi g.yo ba cha lnga pa 'di nyid rig nas 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa ldung ba dang 'gyes pa dang
196a2: 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis 'joms par rtogs te nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sems bad ba dang gseng du ma'am pa/ nam mkha' da la/
196a3: mthil du mnyam pa/ ste'u dang tsan dan du mtshungs pa/ reg pas ma rig pa'i sgo ra'i sbubs dral ba/ mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa dang bkur stil rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang nyadabang du bcas par
196a4: lharnams kyis mchod pa ngarjed pa dang / gus par smra bar bya bar 'gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag tshad zin pa la phan yon 'di dang / gzhan dag kyang yod do// dge slong dag de lta bas na zas kyi rnyed
196a5: bzhig byung na/ 'u su'i lo ma tsam du yang mnyam par byas te bgo par bya'o// gos kyi rnyeng pa zhig byung na mar mo'i snying po tsam du yang mnyam par byas te bgo bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyis tshal mgon med zas
196a6: sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so/ / mnyan yod na bram ze gtsang sbra 'dod pa zhig ba tu 'byung bar 'dod pa des bsams pa/ gang zhig gi gtsang sbras bdag gi sems rangs pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu 'byung ngo snyam nas des mra stegs can gyi garba
196a7: dedag brul na/ de dag gis gtsang sbras de'i sems ma rangs so// des bsams pa/ bdag gis mu stegs can thams cad bgams na gang gis kyang bdag gi sems ma rangs kyis/ de ne shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong dag lus paso song ste de dag pagam par/
196a8: bya'o snyam nas de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ba dang / ji tsaman tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ril ba thogs te phyi rol du chab khung sar chas pa mthong nas des bsams pa/ dge sbyong gau ta ma nyan thos kyi mchog 'di yin pas re shig 'di khon gtsang sbra ji ltar byed

196b1: xxx/ xxx
196b2: mtha / / yang bamam pa la zhugs te/ tsa 'di la dge pa'i rtsa ba 'da' zhig yod dmangon te med snya ma na yod par mthong ba// sul dgalas snyaman padag khon la yin par mthong // des bsams nas/ byam pa/ chos gas dag bzhag ste/ de nas phyogs
196b3: gcig tus phrad bu bdun bzhag/ gzhan zhig tu bdun/ gzhan zhig tu yang sa'i phreng bu gnyis bzhag go// de nas sa phung bu gsum zhig khyer nas cinas bram ze des mthong ba de ltar bshad pa bya bar brtsams so// de nas bshangs zin nas sa phung gas/
196b4: gis rkub phyis/ gnyis kyis khrus byas so// de nas dal gyis la ngas nas phyogs der 'ongs te phyin nas lag pa g.yon pas sa phung bu bdun gyis khrus byas so// de nas gnyi gas phud bu bdun gyis khrus byas so// de nas sa phud bu bdun gcig gas
196b5: dpung ba man cad bkrus so/ / lag pa dag bkrus nas gnyis pas ril ba dag bkrus so// de nas ngal gyis langs te spyod lam zhi bas chos gos bgos nas rkang bdag bkrus pa dang / bram ze des mthong nas mngon par dad par gyur te/ des bsams
196b6: ga shAkya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi sa'i phung bu gcig ni mchog yin gyi mu stegs can rnams kyi brgya yang de lta ma yin no snyam du rig nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la gtugs nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bul 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa
196b7: shA ri'i bu bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob na/ bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ bram ze legs so// khyong
196b8: kyis sems bskyed pa ni bzang ste/ rab tu 'byung ba ni mchog go// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang phan yon lnga mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs te zhes bya ba nas/ sangs rgyas rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos/

197a1: dam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams kyis rab tu byung ba rnam grangs du mar bsngags so zhes bya bar mthong ba'i mkhas pas rab tu 'byung ba kho nar mos par bya ba'i rigs so zhes gsungs shes bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// de lta bas
197a2: na legs kyis rab tu phyung shig/ des de rab tu phyung bsten par rdzogs par byas te gdams ngag byin pa dang / des babar brtsol bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang mi g.yo bacha lnga pa 'di nyid gnas shes bya ba nas/ gus par smra bar bya bar gyur to zhes bya
197a3: ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no/ / dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus gtsang sbras bram ze 'di dang bar bgyis nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bskal te/ grub pa dang
197a4: bde ba bla na med pa shin tu mthar thug pa mya ngan las 'das pa la bzhag pa la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag 'di 'ba' shig tu ma zad kyi/ ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis 'di rkun po las bzlog ste btul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag
197a5: pa de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags shig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/ de dang lhan cig tse bar byed dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa
197a6: las dus gzhan zhig na chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to/ / de zla ba brgyad dam dgu'adas nas bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ bstan sdug pa mdzes pa zhig btsas te/ de btsas ston zhag bdun gsum nyi shu gcig tu rgya cher byas nas/ rigs dang 'thun pa'i
197a7: ming btags so/ / de bskyed pa srings te chen mo rtsu ba dang / re shig cig na ri brags der kun po lnga brgya zhig 'joms 'dod cing lags so// de dag gi sde dpon gang yin pa de skom pas gdungs nas bram ze de'i khyim du zhugs pa dang / ji tsam na bu mo de mthong ngo //
197a8: mthong nas kyang smras pa/ bu mo chu byin cig/ des smras pa/ re shig cung zhig gzhes shig/ de cang mi smra bar 'dug go// des myur ba myur bar mar me bus pa dang / rkun po'i sde dpon bu mo de la mig gtad de rtog go// bu mo de mar me bus nas tshul la ba dang / kun

197b1: bo'i sde dpon gyis smras pa/ bu mo tsi la lta/ des smras pa/ chu la lta'o// des smras pa/ de la bltar ci yod/ des smras pa/ 'dir sgur ma'am skra song du 'ong bas so// des smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni khyed la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin pas kho bo la dug
197b2: thad par bya ba yin na khyod kod skad smras pa zhig/ des tshigs su bcad de smras pa// gzhan gyi nor 'phrogs g.yo can gyis// bya ba gang de rkun po rnams// byed dam 'on te min yang rung // bdag gis chos ni rtag bsrung bya// de shin tu dga' nas smras pa/
197b3: bu mo khyod bdag gi sring mor bya na ci zhig bya smos shig/ des smras pa/ khyod gzhan gyi nor la mngon par chags pa bskyed pas mangs snad du bsnun nas dus byas par gyur na/ bdag ming po dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag cing cho nges 'debs na dga' bar
197b4: mi 'gyur bas rkun po byed pa'i ming po gang yin pa de lta bu ni bdag la mi dgos so/ / de lta bas na gal te khyod kyis brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga yang dag par len nus na de lta na bdag gis khyod kyi sring mo bya'o// des mi 'dod bzhin du tshig yid du 'ong bstan pa'i tshul
197b5: gyis smras pa dang / des de srid mo bya bar shin tu dga' zhing 'dod par gyur te/ des smras pa/ sring mo legs te de bzhin du bya'o// des de chom rkun las bzlog ste brtul zhugs kyi gnas lnga la bzhag go/ dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rkun po'i sde
197b6: dpo ni de ni bram ze 'di nyid yin no/ / de'i tshe 'di'i dus kyi bram ze'i bu mo de ni dge slong shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin te/ de'i tshe yang 'dis de rkun po las bzlog ste bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bzhag go// de ltar yang 'di gtsang sbras dad par byas nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las
197b7: bsgral te/ grub pa dang bde ba bla na med pa shin tu mthar thug pa'i mya ngan 'das pa la bzhag pa yin no// dge slong dag de ltar na gtsang sbra la phan yon 'di dang gzhan dag kyang yod do// de lta bas na ji ltar shA ri'i bus byas pa ltar dge slong dag gis rnam pa des gtsang
197b8: smra bya'o/ / sdom ni/ chag gzungs dang rdul zan dang / dge slong ma ni zla ba dang // gnas ni bca' ba drug ldan dang / khril gsum ni 'dug bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so//

198a1: de'i tshe dge slong dag gis dus su bgos pa'i chos gos rnams mi bsri bar spyad pas de dag gis mtha' ma'i skud pa rnams zegs so// skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos gos
198a2: zegs pa rnams kyi mthar chag gdab par bya'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gos zegs pa rnams kyi mthar chag gdab par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis chag btab nas spyad par brtsams nas/ 'on kyang skud pa rnams zegs par gyur nas/
198a3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bar bar du gzungs gdab par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar ni lpags pa
198a4: dang 'dra bar bsrung bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong gzhan dag cig la gos spyad par 'os pa gzhan med nas de dag gis rtag par snam sbyar bgos pas/ de so ga tsha ba'i dus su mchan khung gi phyogs kyi rdul zags pas dri ma can du gyur
198a5: cing dengs pa dang / dri mi zhim par gyur nas/ skabs de bcom ldan 'das la dge slong dag gis gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ mtshan khung gi phyogs su rdul zan bzhug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan
198a6: khung gi phyogs su snam sbyar gyi rdul zan gzhug par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis rdul zan ji lta bu bya ba mi shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gos chur khru phye dang ngo // zheng du mtho gang yin pa de phyogs der gzhug
198a7: par bya'o/ / dge slong dag gis drubs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nub par mi bya'o// de dri ma can du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dus dus su bkru zhing khabasgyur bar bya'o// dge slong dag gis dos gcig
198a8: du bcug nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dos gnyi gar gzhug par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis khab sgyur bar bya'o// zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong dag gis ngur smrig bcos nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

198b1: stsal pa/ dur smrig tu btse bar mi bya'i btsag gis la bsnur bar bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// mnyan yod na bram ze zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa
198b2: las chung ma blangs te/ de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod pa las dus gzhan zhig na de'i chung ma la sems can zhugs par gyur to// de zla ba dgu 'das pa dang /
198b3: bu mo zhag btsas te/ de'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas de'i ming zla ba zhes bya bar btags te/ de bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur to// ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI las rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang / de nas skye
198b4: dgu'i bdag mo chen po gau ta mI la 'khor lnga brgyas bskor te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song nas phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs cig tu 'dug go// phyogs cig tu 'dug pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis skye
198b5: dbu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mA la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par len du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng bstod par mdzad/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do// rnam grangs du mang chos dang ldan pa'i
198b6: gtal gyis yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par bskul/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de cang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mI stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das
198b7: ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa bcom 'das kyis dge slong rnams la dge slong gi 'dul ba bstan lags na/ kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/
198b8: dge slong ma rnams la dge slong ma'i 'dul ba bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gau ta mI de bzhin gshegs pa chos tshig re nas gsungs pa de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do// 'on kyang gal te dge slong ma 'ga'

199a1: zhig ngas lan cig bshad pa 'dzin par spron de ltar na ngas bstan par bya'o/ / de nas de'i tshe dge slong ma zla ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'dug par gyur to// de nas dge slong ma zla ba stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs
199a2: su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gcig bka' stsal pa/ bdag gis gzung bar 'tshal na bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bstan pa dang / des lan gcig
199a3: gsungs pa bzung ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de'i nyan thos kyis dge slong ma rnams kyi nang na thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs
199a4: thams cad du dge slong ma zla ba 'am/ zla ba lta bu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis kyang dge slong ma'i 'dul ba bzung nas bcang par bya zhing / dge slong ma rnams la yang bstan par bya/ kha ton byed pa dang / 'dri bar byed pa dag la
199a5: yang sbyin par bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag gal te dge slong ma zla bas nga las dge slong ma'i 'dul ba lan gcig bshad pa blangs mod kyi 'on kyang thams cad du dge slong ma zla ba 'am/ zla ba lta bu mi 'byung bas
199a6: dge slong dag gis kyang dge slong ma'i 'dul ba bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya zhing dge slong ma rnams la yang / bstan par bya/ kha ton byed pa dang / 'dri bar byed pa dgal yang sbyin par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshul khrims la brten cing tshul
199a7: khrims la gnas nas zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong gi chos gnyis bsgom par bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang / dge slong ma zlabs 'dul ba'i rjes su 'thun par tshul khrims la brten cing tshul khrims la gnas nas/ bsam gtan dang 'don pa'i sbyor bas
199a8: 'bad brtsel/ bsgrims pas 'khor ba'i 'khor lo g.yo ba dang mi g.yo bar lnga pa 'di nyid rig ste/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang / lung ba dang / 'gyes pa dang / 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyis 'joms par rtogs te/ nyon mongs pa thams

199b1: cad spangs nam dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas te/ dgra bcom pa khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/ sems gser dang bong bar mnyam pa/ nam mkha' dang lag mthil du mnyam pa/ ste'u dang tsan dan du mtshungs pa/ rig pas ma rig pa'i
199b2: sgo nga'i srubs dral ba/ mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams thob pa/ srid pa dang rnyed pa dang bkur stil rgyab kyis bltas pa/ dbang po dang nye dbang du bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / gus par smra
199b3: bar bya bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dade'i nyan thos dge slong ma rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba dang / spobs pa che ba dang / thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog ni 'di lta ste/ dge slong ma zla ba 'di yin no//
199b4: dge slong dag the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong ma zla bas las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas shes rab che zhing spobs pa che ba dang / bcom ldan
199b5: 'das kyis kyang thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge
199b6: sroslong maza ba nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa do tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/ lus can rnams la 'bras bur smin// ces bya ba'i bar snga ma bzhin no// dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad
199b7: khri thub pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba la sbyar ba blan med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/ sa
199b8: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams par gzigs shes bya ba ston pa 'jig rten du byung ste/ de 'khor dge slong drug khri nyis stong dang rgyal po'i khab gnyen ldan du gshegs te/ gnyen ldan gyi lan bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab

200a1: gnyen ldan na khyimi bdag cag 'dug pa das rigs mnyam pa las chung mablang te/ ring dang ldan cag rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mthar spyod par byed da// de rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mthar spyod par/
200a2: da pa la du ga ga zung ma la sems can zhugs par bzung // de zlab bya ba pa nas tha bzhan pacas te/ rab babs can cher byas nas dgas dang 'dun pa'i mang brtags te/ de byed bgying na tshan par gyur ba dang /
200a3: khyim bdag de dang pa can zhag pas dag ga dpo'i tshod khrid nas dge slong ma'i dbang khang du song ste/ des dge sdang ma rnams la so song la ba dang bril sogs pa'i ya byad kyis dge slong pa'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye byed do// bu ma des mdzes par mthong nas
200a4: dang bsnyes te/ bal smras pa/ yab bdag gis kyang ji zhig cag gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la dgag dbye brtsi'o// khyim bdag des smras pa/ bu mo legs te de bzhin dgag dbye kyis shishi des kha ba dang / pri dang / gser dang / dbyig la sogs pa
200a5: yo da kyi khya par dag gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la dgagang pe byas te/ rab dang brgyan pos rgan pa'i mtha' nas rkang ba la phyag 'tshal byis nas smon 'am btab pa/ bdag gis sems bskyed de sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su gang ba'i dge
200a6: chab 'dis shes rab ci zhing slobs pa che ba dang / thos pa 'dzin par gyur cig ces byas so// dge slong dag ji snyam dus pas/ khyim bdag gi bum gang yin pa de ni dge slong ma zla ba'adi nyid yin te/ 'dis gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam
200a7: da btsigs kyi ga slong po dge 'an la ba dang / bri dang / gse dang / dag las sams pa sa byed rjo pa dgags dgagar kyi rgyas dang / bdag gis sems pabaskyed cang sbyin par rgya mchos yongs su ga pa'i dag pa rtsa ba das dad/
200a8: gis rab chen spobs pa che ba dang / thos pa 'dzin par byang cig ces smon lam ga pa do las kyi rnam par thun pa pa de ltang shes rab che zhing spobs pa che dang / thos pa 'dzin par gyur to// yang bcom ldan 'das 'ong rung ga gsang nga b.las

200b1: rab tu byung bar gyur te/ des de na chog cig tu tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang yon tan gyi tshigs 'ga' yang thob paras gyur te// mkhan po gang las rab tu byung ba don bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bang srung gis thos pa
200b2: 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan to/ / den 'dis 'di ltar bdag gas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon gnas than mad pa'od srung gi sa ngam cha gcig gi bar rungangs par spyong pa srung bang yod tan kyi tshogs 'dar
200b3: yang thob par ma gyur gyis/ bdag dge ba' rtsa ba 'dis gang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis bram zo'i khye'u bra sa zhes bya ba la bra bzo'i khye'u khyod skyed bri 'tsholo brgya thub pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
200b4: nga'i sangs rgyas shAkya grub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa de'i bstan pa la bdag rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa nyid padon su pa du byas te/ dzi ltang bdag gi sakhan po bcom ldan 'das yang dag par
200b5: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ bskrun pa de bzhin du bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAH thub pa/ shA kya'i rgyal po'i gtso bdas thos pa 'dzin pa'i mchog tu bstan par byur cig ces smon lab bta go// de
200b6: tho pa dang dbyung gas da/ du ba gshegs pas thas pa 'dzin pa ma ga bstan pa yinan// de lta pas dge slong dgralas gcig gnag pa rnams kyirnam par smin pa yang ga shAg /
